name: Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel Hoi An
address: 116 Dao Duy Tu, Cam Pho Ward, Cẩm Phô, Hội An, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở thành phố Hội An, cách Chùa Cầu Nhật Bản 850 km, Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel Hoi An cung cấp chỗ nghỉ với nhà hàng, chỗ đỗ xe riêng miễn phí, xe máy cho khách sử dụng miễn phí và trung tâm thể dục. Trong số nhiều tiện nghi của khách sạn này còn có quầy bar, sảnh khách chung và khu vườn. Chỗ nghỉ cũng có lễ tân 24 giờ, bếp chung và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Phòng nghỉ tại Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel Hoi An được trang bị máy điều hòa, truyền hình cáp màn hình phẳng, tủ lạnh, ấm đun nước, bể sục, máy sấy tóc và bàn làm việc. Các phòng còn có phòng tắm riêng với chậu rửa vệ sinh (bidet) cùng đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và tầm nhìn ra vườn. Mỗi phòng đều được bố trí tủ để quần áo.

Chỗ nghỉ phục vụ bữa sáng tự chọn hàng ngày.

Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel Hoi An cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 4 sao với phòng xông hơi khô và sân hiên. Du khách có thể chơi bi-a và thuê xe máy cũng như xe hơi tại khách sạn.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel Hoi An bao gồm Hội quán Quảng Đông, Bảo tàng Lịch sử Hội An và Đình Cẩm Phô. Sân bay gần nhất là sân bay quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách đó 28 km, và chỗ nghỉ cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay với một khoản phụ phí.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The spa exceeded my expectations. 2 hours massage + 50 min salt scrub. They have a promo so it's really great value for money. Loved the aroma sea salt scrub - they use coarse salt and my skin feels so smooth even 1 week later. Staff were helpful as well. Bicycles are free for hotel guests to use so one can cycle around the ancient town area though navigating the roads is quite challenging during peak hours. Room is reasonably clean and neat. Laundry service was by load and very reasonably priced.
review.comment_negative: The hot water was fluctuating between very hot and cold but minor issue, just shower quicker. Bath tub is above average height so it takes quite a bit of effort to climb out safely as the tiles are quite smooth and there was no appropriate grab rails.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.rating: Wonderful property not far from Hoi Anh old town
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was fantastic, loved the variety and my room, spa and hotel service were perfect. A short walk from Hoi Anh old town area.
review.comment_negative: Nothing! Everything was wonderful. I hope to return some day.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Such a wonderful hotel! It's located perfectly for only a short walk to Ancient Town, but still quiet and peaceful. Rooftop pool offers great view of Hoi An, and it's made even better by the lovely coctails they make. Food was amazing, both the breakfast buffet and food from the full menu. Staff were very curtious and helpful, especially Hannah at reception was great at recommending whatever we asked for - places to eat, tailor, best route to the beach. We throughly enjoyed our stay.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: nhân viên thân thiện

review.comment_positive: nice staff, good stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location. Clean rooms and good staff
review.comment_negative: Was asked to pay for taking the laundry bag. Nothing against the hotel - but would have been nice to have been told this before checking out. Wasn’t charged eventually but it left a bad taste after a good stay. Never been asked to pay for taking a laundry bag before.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The room was absolutely beautiful! A very comfortable bed and gorgeous bathroom. Breakfast was delicious and the location was excellent - easy walking distance to the ancient town. The view from the rooftop was great!
review.comment_negative: For such a beautiful hotel, it was a shame that the pool was very unclean. With a good scrub it would have been ideal! The bathroom amenities were also not fully stocked when we arrived, but when we called reception we were provided with everything we needed.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Staff were briiliant Vy in particular was very helpful and obliging.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really ..breakfast was very good but other restaurant food  could have been better

review.rating: Free bikes to explore the area
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: All staff is very welcoming. Special compliment to Cindy for the short brief with insider tips on where to go and do. The hotel provides you with free bikes for the day. Breakfast buffet is amazing. Nice rooftop pool. Upgraded to main building for free.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: All the staff was incredibly nice, they helped us with everything we needed. The room was super comfortable and clean, the breakfast very good and varied. I have no bad words for Cozy Savvy!!
review.comment_negative: Maybe the view from our terrace wasn't as nice as expected, but it's worth it anyway.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Good location. Lovely staff. Good spa. Breakfast is good. Beds are very comfortable.
review.comment_negative: The bathroom layout not great, gets messy after a shower. The pool towel we got were not clean.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Absolutamente todo! El hotel está muy cuidado en cuanto a la decoración. La zona de la piscina no es muy grande pero es perfecta para refrescarte y tiene bonitas vistas! 
El personal es muy servicial, estan pendiente de todo y te ayudan con lo que sea! 

Contratamos todos los transfers a través del hotel, el precio es bastante interesante y resulta muy cómodo porque lo gestionan todo ellos. Tuvimos un pequeño problema con uno de los xofers y nos devolvieron una parte de lo que habíamos pagado! 


Nos hicimos cada día masaje/tratamiento en el SPA, la atención y el servicio fueron perfectos! 

El restaurante del hotel también propone platos tipicos que están buenísimos! 

El hotel está en una zona muy tranquila pero a la vez cerca del centro. 

Tenemos claro que si algún dia volvemos a Hoi An, volveremos a este hotel!!

review.comment_positive: Breakfast was excellent with many options to meet all our family’s requirements. The pool was beautiful and spa treatment was fantastic.
review.comment_negative: Dinner was great but slow service.

review.rating: Reasonable quality-price relation, but not really 5 stars
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Convenient and room had a nice design with a decently good view

Affordable
review.comment_negative:
We were given a room at level 7, highest level just below pool - lift access was only to level 6 and we needed to use a staircase to go up

Only one lift in the property, and we had to wait for very long at peak periods to go up or down

At level 7, water pressure was low and inconsistent. Especially for the hot water, it came and went inconsistently 

Below average gym, windowless and stuffy in basement, with very old equipment

Breakfast - below average, options very limited, some items appeared stale, and soaking in oil, a lot of mosquitoes and flies when we were there

Bike - free bikes were good, but most of them had some problems, whether it was a missing bell, non functional brakes, or damaged locking mechanisms

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Very helpful at the check in, and all of the staff at Cozy are very helpful, and offered free bikes, a nice breakfast. Probably the best hotel on our stay in Vietnam so far. Ms.V at the front desk and Kathy the manager were great, and very professional.
review.comment_negative: The location is fine, but the surroundings could be better, perhaps more of a garden. The floor in the restaurant, under the tables was a bit messy, unclean. Perhaps a drink on arrival might be nice for guests waiting to check in. Mabey a brochure on places to see and offers available for tours in Hoi An. Perhaps an ironing board in the rooms?

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: 員工服務態度良好，早餐很棒。

review.comment_positive: The breakfast was excellent, and the staff super kind. We add to leave around 6am to the airport and the prepared a breakfast box for us to take away. The pool on rooftop is excellent too.
review.comment_negative: Just some maintenance needs in the room, like humidity marks on ceiling, low pressure in the shower, and hairdryer with low power.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Room size was fantastic with quality furnishings and a gorgeous bathtub in the spacious bathroom too. The pool was clean, with great views and ample loungers. Breakfast offered great  variety. The staff were so attentive and helpful. We stayed for 6 nights and were sad to leave.
review.comment_negative: The only comment I have is to add cushioned pads to the loungers by the pool, as they are quite hard with just a towel.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.rating: Beautiful hotel with gorgeous rooftop pool
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Very nice hotel. My room was spacious, had a balcony and was really quiet. Very good breakfast. I absolutely LOVED the rooftop pool. It was so nice to chill there in the evening after a full day sightseeing. And the view was so beautiful! 
Staff is very friendly and helpful. I also had a massage and treatment at the SPA and it was very good too. 
The hotel is about 10 min walk from the centre but that was a good thing, as it's away from the noise. I'm a female solo traveller and I always felt really safe walking around (there are many hotels and shops in the area).
review.comment_negative: I had a couple of dinners at the restaurant of the hotel and they were ok, but I wouldn't say great.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Sehr freundliches Personal, das viele gute Tipps für Restaurants und Aktivitäten in Hoi An und Umgebung hat.
Das Hotel liegt fußläufig zur Altstadt, aber trotzdem in sehr ruhiger Lage.

review.comment_positive: Excellent accueil et le personnel est à vos petits soins. Il y a une salle de fitness et un spa et possibilité d'avoir un massage. Je vous invite de le faire à l'extérieur car les prix sont un peu prohibitif pour le pays.
review.comment_negative: La chambre est spacieuse et vous avez tout le confort possible.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: located in quiet end of Hoi An.  Rooms spacious.  Daisy the hotel manager was great
review.comment_negative: we had a discrepancy between bookings.com room description and room we got.  this property is over 2 sites and we were taken to second site down an ally and placed on ground level on a walkway with limited privacy and no view.  spoke with Daisy and eventually we come to a compromise of the issue and were moved room on the second day in site 1 with a view.

review.rating: スタッフのサービスが抜群
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: 中心地から離れていたため静かで混雑も少なかった。スタッフが非常に親切で、おすすめしてもらったレストランや施設はすべて満足のいくものだった。朝食もおしゃれな雰囲気の中、ベトナム食と西洋食を選択することができて気分によって変えることができた。
review.comment_negative: 中心地から離れているからこそ、市街地へのアクセスでは少し不便があった。ホテルによってはゴルフカートのようなもので送迎があったため、同様なものがあるとよかった。プールの利用時間が20：00までで、閉鎖時間が少し早いように感じた。

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: The staff are very helpful & friendly. The location is perfect as it’s away from the hustle and bustle but still a walking distance from the centre. The hotel itself is also modern.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
El hotel está en una zona tranquila de la ciudad, a unos 5-10 minutos caminando al centro con opción de coger bici del hotel gratis. 
La habitación era muy limpia y amplia además de tranquila, pero sobre todo el hotel destaca por la amabilidad de su personal. Son muy atentos y ayudan en todo lo que necesites. El desayuno muy muy bueno y variado. 
Buena piscina en la azotea del hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing experience at the Cozy Savvy. The breakfast was fantastic with a wide variety of options to choose from. The service was outstanding, with the staff being very polite and accommodating. We truly felt like at home. We highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

review.rating: Excellent rooms and very hospitable staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Everything about our stay was excellent! From the beautiful rooms and interior to the extensive breakfast and the helpful and friendly staff who always greeted us with our names whenever they saw us and provided us with the best recommendations! We were welcomed with the most delicious welcome drink and enjoyed our stay thoroughly. Would definitely recommend and come back!
review.comment_negative: The only minor suggestion would be that the water in our shower could have been a little bit warmer.

review.comment_negative: Zero.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: 離會安主街大約10～15分鐘的步行距離，適合悠閒的旅行，晚上寧靜不會有吵雜聲，旅店房間設計整體很符合會安古城的設計，喜歡門口大片九重葛的花牆，讓每天早上出門心情都很美麗

review.rating: Cozy base for your visit to Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The whole hotel including the rooms is very tastefully decorated. The room was spacious, with a very good bed and quiet in the night. Breakfast is high quality and you have broad choice of Vietnamese and Western style dishes including delicious soup of the day and eggs/omelette station. The staff is very friendly, helpful and competent, especially Ms. Vii. They recommended a lot of activities in and around Hoi An and also arranged them and even bargained with the local partners. The hotel is around 5-10 min walking distance from the old town city center, this ensures also that it is very quite at night. You have free hotel bicycles available.

review.rating: Cute small hotel with helpful staff in beautiful Hoi An
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay in Hoi An; our hotel was a big part of this positive experience. The team made us feel at home with welcome drinks and provided excellent recommendations for tailors and sightseeing activities. Because the city can be very touristy at times, the staff briefed us about tourist traps that needed to be avoided. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the city's center, which makes the area pleasant and quiet. The breakfast was delicious and diverse, and we enjoyed lounging by the pool after a long day of sightseeing.
review.comment_negative: We didn't encounter any issues the front desk team couldn't address. I would thoroughly recommend the place.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: ALL the staff were friendly and wanted to make our stay as pleasant and relaxing as possible. The tours and restaurant recommendations were excellent. The rooms smell divine. The quality and choice of the breakfast was excellent.

review.comment_positive: 飯店位於古城區的外圍，散步到夜市區大概要十餘分鐘(可以跟飯店借腳踏車)，但也因此附近很安靜，可以好好休息。飯店整體布置得既古典又有度假感覺，房間整潔乾淨，頂樓有一個小小的無邊際泳池可以玩水。早餐菜色豐富好吃
review.comment_negative: 飯店提供的吹風機風力太弱，女生要吹很久頭髮才會乾。

review.rating: Perfect stay! We will be back!
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved our stay at Cozy Savvy! We arrived expecting to be put up in a room within the hotel but to our surprise, we had booked a villa room 20 seconds away which really did feel like our own private flat rather than a room! It isn't located within the main hotel but a very short walk away - not a problem for us as the room was gorgeous! Beautifully decorated and very spacious, with the pool just around the corner - we couldn't have asked for anything more.

The breakfast selection was huge - lots of savoury and sweet options with plenty of Vietnamese options, perfect if you want to try some local dishes. All delicious.

Before booking I read some reviews about the location. Yes you do have to walk about 10 mins to reach the old town but that shouldn't be seen as a negative. The short walk is a joy, a great opportunity to see the real Hoi An away from the tourist bustle. And Hoi An isn't just the old town, there is so much more to see.

If you do anything, make the most of the hotel's free bike hire, this totally transformed our trip for us! And this is when you benefit from being slightly away from the old town (especially if you're not a confident cyclist). The location of the hotel meant we had easier access to Kim Bong Carpentry Village, An Bang Beach and Thanh Ha Pottery Village. The countryside is so beautiful and a must see.

Overall, we loved our stay at Cozy Savvy and Hoi An. We will definitely be back in the future!

review.comment_positive:
Das beste Hotel auf unserer Vietnamreise:

- Außerordentlich nettes Personal, kümmert sich ehrlich und authentisch um deine Anliegen. Gibt gute Empfehlungen für Shops und Restaurants und sammelt ebenso dein Feedback um die Weiterempfehlungen zu verbessern.

- Optimale Lage, besser geht es nicht. Direkt im Zentrum, 5 Minuten Fußweg zur Altstadt und dem Night Market. Kostenlose Fahrräder zum Ausleihen.

- Zimmer sehr gemütlich und top Bäder. Reinigung täglich und gründlich.

- Sehr gutes internationales Frühstück. Bleiben keine Wünsche offen.

Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen und können es jedem ans Herz legen hier in Hoi an zu bleiben.

They stuff even helped us with our late flight providing space for a quick shower while keeping our luggages safe.
review.comment_negative: You could definitely hear noises from nearby rooms from people just talking. I’m the morning the was quite much noise in the corridors, just outside of our room. Breakfast has had a lot of variety but as I’m not much of a savoury person, pastry options weren’t that good. We’d be willing to spend some time and enjoy cocktails in the rooftop bar but it was only a very small bar with some seats around the pool. Finally, the pool was not heated.

review.rating: We will look to stay here again next time we come back to Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great breakfast, great staff. Location was great for us - close enough to walk to the old town, but far enough away to escape the bustle. Staff were fantastic!

review.rating: Visiting Old Town Hoi An there is really only one place to be. Cozy Savvy
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: From the moment you arrive the staff at Cozy could not do more for you.  The hotel is in a quiet location but an easy walkin distance into the old town.  If you want the beach get transportation 5km away for $3-5 journey. They helped us arrange Covid testing back to Tokyo, sorted our transport to the airport on departure and were there whenever we needed something. Ling was especially helpful, 28 weeks pregnant but always there to ensure we were having the best time in Hoi An.  Thank you and good luck with your impending arrival. Great rooftop pool, excellent breakfast service just the best value for money!!
review.comment_negative: Leaving!

review.comment_positive: From the first moment we arrived, we were greeted with the warmest welcome. Cindy was amazing and gave us welcome drinks and gave us lots of recommendations about our stay. Even though we arrived before our check in time, our room was ready. The room was clean and quiet. The service was impeccable and would recommend to anyone coming to Hoi An

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: La ragazza alla reception Ngoc Giau Joy e’ stata gentilissima, ci  ha accolti e ci ha offerto un drink di benvenuto con dei creckers vietnamiti! Nel salottino ci ha spiegato tantissime cose di hoi an dal ticket per le 5 attrazioni, ai ristoranti, al giro in bicicletta gratuito nel villaggio vicino! Ci ha spiegato tutto sull’ hotel: dove mangiare, la piscina la Spa ecc.. così gentile e sempre con il sorriso! L’hotel è stupendo: così curato nei particolari! Camera grande con terrazzo, frigobar, bollitore e caffè omaggio! Bagno grande con tanti prodotti .. la colazione era fantastica la più bella di tutto il viaggio e degna di un 5 stelle hotel boutique! Tutti i ragazzi e ragazza dalla reception, alla colazione alle camere sono gentilissimi e sempre con il sorriso! Mai visto un sorriso sforzato.  Per la partenza ci ha fatto assistenza Thao Vi Anne Fho schift leader: ci ha fatto il Cambio da euro in dang, organizzato il transfert ad un prezzo veramente vantaggioso! Così gentile e premurosa che fossimo in orario per l aeroporto e che avessimo preso tutto dalla camera! Veramente devo dare un voto 10 a questo boutique hotel perché ha reso questo soggiorno ad Hoi an unico e strepitoso! Grazie
review.comment_negative: Tutto era perfetto ..

review.rating: We enjoyed our stay at the Cozy Savvy Boutique hotel and most importantly the hospitality.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
review.comment_positive: The breakfast spread was delicious and the hotel being centrally located, was just a stone's throw away from the Hoi an night market. The rooms were lovely and the staff went out of their way to provide us with the information we requested for and also suggested several places to eat, visit and have our custom-made clothes stitched. They also assisted us in hiring motorbikes to tour the city and made quick arrangements for us to visit the coconut village nearby. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and the hospitality. We couldn't have asked for more.

review.comment_negative: only issue was the door to the room which they fixed that same day and the shower wasn’t as warm as I liked but everything else was perfect

review.rating: Ein guter Aufenthalt mit kleinen Abstrichen.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Das Zimmer ist groß, gut eingerichtet und sehr sauber. 
Das Hotel liegt auch nur wenig Minuten von der Altstadt entfernt (10 Gehminuten), was sehr komfortabel ist und wodurch es auch weitgehend in einer ruhigen Umgebung liegt.
Das Frühstücksbuffet ist sehr groß und reicht von warmen Speisen, Brot und Obst.
Das Personal ist freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben auch problemlos und einfach Touren buchen können sowie einen Transfer zum Flughafen nach Da Nang.
Gerne wieder.
review.comment_negative:
Es ist leider etwas hellhörig, wodurch man die Nachbarn hören kann.
Beim Frühstück wäre es hilfreich vegetarische/vegane Speisen auszuschließen. Zwar ist das Frühstücksangebot groß und hochwertig, allerdings könnte es vegetarierfreundlicher sein (z.B. enthielten der Papayasalat und die Baked Beans Fleisch).

review.rating: A really pretty boutique hotel in a great location with the most beautiful staff! 💕

review.comment_positive: This is a beautiful hotel, set just 5 minutes walk outside the hustle and bustle of the main area (which is a plus point in my opinion). The hotel itself is really pretty! It has a lovely roof top pool area which is great for a refreshing dip after a hot day exploring the city. The breakfast is excellent and is served in a nice space where you can choose to sit either inside or out. I loved everything about this hotel, but what made it extra special was the staff. They really went the extra mile to remember your names and stop and have a chat every day, which made our time at this hotel really memorable. 💕

Mention speciale à la piscine en roof top pour se rafraîchir après une longue journée soud la chaleur de Hoi An. Très bon rapport qualité prix, nous reviendrons !

They helped me to book local tours and transport to Hue. Breakfast was excellent with a wide spread of local and international cuisine. review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Das Personal ist wirklich besonders aufmerksam. Hannah und Lyn waren hervorragend ausgebildet und sprachen sehr gut Englisch. Man hat sich Zeit genommen beim Check in um auf unsere Pläne für die kurze Zeit in Hoi An einzugehen. Als wir sagten, dass wir gerne Kajak fahren würden, wurde uns eine private Tour organisiert, die wirklich super war. Auch wurde für uns das Zugticket nach Hue gebucht und ein Transfer organisiert. Das Frühstück ist sehr lecker, abwechslungsreich und variiert jeden Tag. Mein Freund hatte Geburtstag, was aus seinem Pass ersichtlich war. Wir hatten nichts hierzu gesagt und wurden trotzdem mit einem Kuchen überrascht. Das Hotel ist gut gelegen, es gibt kostenlose Räder und alles ist sauber. Alles im allen ein wirklich besonderes Hotel!

review.rating: Un 5 estrellas? He estado en 3 estrellas mucho mejores
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Desayuno correcto. Ubicación correcta, apartado del ruido del centro
review.comment_negative:
Atención buena, aunque muy poco profesional encontrar personal durmiendo llegando después de cenar (antes de las 12 de la noche). Habitación justa y muy ruidosa (personal de limpieza, se escucha todo de habitaciones contiguas...).
Que con todos estos puntos negativos el alojamiento tenga categoría de 5 estrellas es algo a tener muy en cuenta para organizar alojamientos en Vietnam ya que esta desproporción es algo muy generalizado allí.
Y lo que viene ahora es lo mejorcito y lo que me ha hecho ampliar la review: el alojamiento me ha contactado ofreciéndome una compensación económica por retirar la review, algo que me parece ya de traca y por lo que he empeorado mi valoración. Primera vez que me ocurre y me temo que no he sido el único, por lo que entiendo la nota tan alta del hotel.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The staff were very welcoming and helpful, particularly Hannah, who helped us book a transfer and gave us a lot of useful information for our holiday. The room was very clean and spacious, with beautiful views across the river. The breakfast was good, with fresh eggs available to order. The swimming pool was lovely and had panoramic views of the town and river.

review.rating: Exceptional hotel. The perfect base for exploring Hoi An.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: This may be the best hotel we’ve ever stayed at. Staff are friendly, helpful and genuinely want you to enjoy your time in Hoi An. Vi, in particular was exceptional. Rooftop pool is fantastic and has spectacular views. Rooms are tastefully decorated with private decks. Adjoining rooms for families is a bonus. Breakfast is great. Beds are comfy. 10 minute walk to the old town. Free bike usage. Value for money is outstanding.
review.comment_negative: Whilst free to use, bike are badly in need of some maintenance. Half of them don’t have working bells, and the brakes are on all of them are pretty shoddy.  Water pressure in the showers isn’t great. These are very minor points, and don’t detract from an otherwise excellent stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The staff was very courteous and gave us useful recommendations. The room was nice and clean, with prompt room service. Would definitely recommend it for a stay.

review.rating: Have an awesome time in Hoi An by staying at this great hotel with its friendly staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: My wife and I traveled to Hoi An in June 2022 shortly after the country opened after the pandemic. This hotel was a great place to stay during our quick trip. The location was great and it was easy to walk to the old quarter. The hotel also had bikes you could borrow to get places further away. We were grateful for this so we could get to An Bang Beach, which is beautiful! The hotel itself is very clean and comfortable with a nice pool. Our room was spacious and very clean. The breakfast served in the restaurant was really tasty as well. The staff was super friendly and very sweet as well.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and laid back place to stay in Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: The gym was underwhelming. It's located in the basement and there are no windows.  There's only one treadmill and a sad all-in-one training structure.

review.rating: Good price for an amazing stay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Very cozy adorable decoration. Clean and tidy.
Breakfast is decent and staff are very nice, friendly.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Superbe séjour. Nous y retournerons sans hésitation.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Hôtel bien situé, à 10 minutes à pieds du centre de Hoi An. Prêt de vélos pour se rendre à la plage. Navette pour se rendre à l'attraction "Coconut". Petit déjeuner copieux. Gentillesse du personnel.
review.comment_negative: Rien.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The hotel and facilities are great, the staff is extremely keen to help. We booked a couple of activities through them plus airport taxi and they also recommended a nice bicycle (free!) morning trip around Hoi An we would have never done otherwise. The breakfast is also 11/10!!!

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
From the moment we arrived till the time we left, everything was excellent. The rooms were very spacious and clean, the breakfast selection was wide and good, and the staff were very friendly and attentive. Kudos to the hotel for having a team of exceptional staff who were always one step ahead of every need. A shoutout to Lyn and Cathy, you both made our stay superb. Lyn was the first person who met us when we arrived. Her warm personality and attention to detail left a very good first impression and was a foretaste of the kind of level of service that was to come throughout our stay. It was a joy meeting her whenever we went out and came back. She also gave us a lot of useful information and recommendations and every single one was really good. Cathy, your Mandarin is good and we enjoyed conversing with you in the language. Thank you for your excellent service and also for the totally unexpected service recovery when you got to know of a tiny, and I really mean insignificant, hiccup on the last day of our stay. We will definitely recommend your hotel to anyone who is visiting Hoi An.

The location of the hotel is near to the Old Town especially if you cycle, which we did every day using the bikes provided by the hotel. The bikes were so useful as they got us to our destinations quickly in the sweltering heat.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: Comfy bed, nice restaurant great spa, very friendly and helpful staff.
review.comment_negative: No specific issues with anything. Hotel is a little bit outside the centre but still within walking distance to all the main attractions.

review.rating: The Cozy Boutique Hotel is a rare gem. Clean, good service and very family friendly.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was opened in 2019. The facilities were new and clean when we visited. We booked the family connecting rooms. They looked exactly like the photos on Booking.com. Service was excellent. Special mention goes to guest service officers Tam and Lyn and our porter. 

Tips: 
- The hotel restaurant was not fully opened due to limited visitors as of June 2022. However, a chef is available. Breakfast sets (local and Western options) are available for about USD5 at the hotel restaurant. Lunch and dinner can be ordered. For example, their fish and chips was delicious, substansial and inexpensive for my son who needed some familiar foods for comfort.  
- There's a beautiful, Instagramable cafe 2 mins walk from the hotel. Head there for coffee and quiet work. The cafe also calms down grumpy teenagers. :)
review.comment_negative: None! For families travelling with young children or the elderly, consider bringing slippers to wear in bathrooms. Like most Vietnamese hotels, bathroom floors are super clean but slippery by Western standards.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Was here for over a week and very much enjoyed my stay. The staff are all lovely and very helpful. Hannah is a superstar and gave amazing local recommendations. It's an easy walk to Ancient Town, in a relatively quiet little section of town but still several restaurants, cafe and things very close. For in-room comfort, wifi and aircon are great (important for those steamy Hoi An days). Really appreciated the daily water bottle top-up. Highlight was definitely the staff who genuinely care about you having a nice stay and enjoying your experience in Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Nice and helpful staff
Location was pretty close to city center
review.comment_negative:
The massages at the spa were okay. Some treatments were conducted by external staff and were somewhat uncoordinated, possibly due to the Buy 1 get 1 Free offer. Perhaps a focus on quality rather than quantity would be more advantageous overall.

The layout of the bathroom is somewhat impractical.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Absolutely everything! It was so clean, so beautiful, the facilities such as the pool and spa were luxurious, and the staff were extremely helpful and welcoming. The location is so close and walkable to everything, but also on a peaceful street. There is literally nothing to fault!
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike! Could not recommend more highly :)

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Daisy helped us with everything during our trip. she recommended us restaurants, places, and all the things that we needed. The hotel was very clean. The best relation price/quality
review.comment_negative: Nothing, everything was good

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Très bel hôtel, chambre spacieuse avec une décoration de très bon goût.  Le petit-déjeuner est bon est généreux. La piscine sur le rooftop est grande et très agréable. Nois avons beaucoup aimé notre séjour dans cet hôtel !

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Friendly staff and good location, would definitely recommend this hotel to stay !

review.comment_positive: The staff were really friendly and gave great recommendations for food and places to go. The room was nice and about a 10 minute walk into old quarter. The rooftop pool was an added bonus!

review.rating: It is amazing, you HAVE to go there!

review.comment_positive: (Written by an 8 year old). The hotel was amazing. There was a rooftop swimming pool which was delightful and the breakfast was really tasty! The room was cosy and comfortable, and the hotel was just fantasic! The staff were welcoming when we arrived and showed us around!

review.rating: 體驗很好，值得再次入住。
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: 入住時飯店人員會很詳細的了解你在會安的行程規劃，視情況介紹景點與行程，入住說明大約需要20分鐘。住宿地點離老城區近，會安老城區夜晚有車輛管制，一般汽車無法進入，可以請飯店協助叫電車。
review.comment_negative: 提供的沐浴乳、洗髮精、潤髮乳不好用，如果是有要求的人，建議自己攜帶。

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Upon arrival the staff were so friendly. They offered a cold drink which was really welcome. The check in process was very quick and they offered advice on the area and our questions.
They even made a written map which help during my stay.
They explained about the hotel services and walked me to my room
review.comment_negative:
Very little, the hotel in just is on the outside of the old town in a quiet location which is great, but for that you have about a 15 minute walk into town which is no great issue as long as you don't mind the heat. 
During the time I was there the bar at the roof top pool was not open but you could still order drinks.
The buffet breakfast was very good I arrived most days towards the end of service and there was always food and before they cleared away they asked if I wanted anything else.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel war sehr schön und der ganze Aufenthalt hat uns so sehr gefallen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Gần trung tâm, chất lượng dịch vụ tốt!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
We were welcomed by Anne who gave us a summary of all facilities and local places of interest and day tours.
Our room was lovely and quite spacious, bed very comfy.
We really enjoyed their Happy hours by the pool.
All staff were only too happy to help us with anything special mention to Anne, Genna, Daisy & Alice.
We had to catch our flight very early in the morning they even arranged for us to take a packed breakfast , so thoughtful.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: L'emplacement est idéal pour profiter de la ville, de la campagne, de la plage à vélo.
review.comment_negative: Nous n'avons pas apprécié le fait d'être dans un autre bâtiment que le cosy savvy boutique, nous étions au cosy village. La piscine manque d'entretien, ainsi que les chambres.

review.rating: A small boutique hotel with an exceptional personal touch.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was very good, and the staff made it excellent. If you are looking for a small boutique hotel with a personal touch, then I would highly recommend the Cozy Savvy. Cindy, in particular, looked after us from the moment we arrived, and we felt like she really cared about making our stay enjoyable. The hotel is about 10 mins from the old town and is at the end of a long road right before the main river area. For us, this was great as it was close enough to walk into the old town, but far enough away to be quiet and peaceful (apart from the ubiquitous cockerels). 
Breakfast was lovely  the pool was great and we had a fantastic stay.
review.comment_negative: The street outside was a bit noisy at night over the weekend, and Hoi An itself is absolutely heaving on Saturday and Sunday. You also have to get used to the early morning cockerel (but don't let that put you off).

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
感謝所有遇到的飯店員工，每個人都讓我們有賓至如歸的感覺。特別感謝Hannah, Alice見到面時都會記住我們的名字且關心我們在會安的旅程以及特別推薦的餐廳與咖啡！ 
待在那邊三天兩夜的我們都都享受了飯店的spa服務，品質價格都非常滿意，感謝按摩師Lisa，技術非常到位！
早餐選擇多樣且包含了一些會安的特色小吃，在飯店就可以品嚐會安特色小吃，美式咖啡要額外付費(不過也不貴)

review.comment_positive: Een prachtig hotel, met mooie en ruime kamers. In een rustige straat, maar op loopafstand van de drukte van de stad. Fijn dat je gratis fietsen kunt gebruiken om de omgeving te verkennen. Heerlijk zwembad!

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
review.comment_positive:
The staff at Cozy Savvy were wonderful and attentive. When we checked it Daisy told us all about the town & gave us tips on places to visit & eat if we wanted. 

The rooftop pool is cool, although we didn’t use it & the breakfast was really good. 

They allow you to borrow their bicycles for free which is awesome to pop into town.
review.comment_negative: There was a musty smell in our room from the humidity but the staff helped us with it & it was sorted.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We loved our stay here at Cozy Savy Boutique, everything from the staff to the buffet breakfast, could not be faulted. The location is a short, 5-10 minute walk from Hoi An old town however, the hotel provides free use of bicycles for getting around. The staff were amazing, extremely kind and helpful with great English, meaning they were able to help with anything you needed. Buffet breakfast was great with a large selection of food, including eggs, fresh fruit, juice, cereal, baked goods, home made jam and Asian options as well. The rooftop pool was great to spend time relaxing and cooling off from the hot, midday sun. We really enjoyed our time here land look forward to returning.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:

Also the swimming pool

review.comment_positive: The staff were so friendly, couldn't do enough for you. They checked how we were every morning at breakfast and recommended a fantastic tailor in town. The room was cleaned daily. The swimming pool was great - towels were provided by the pool for swimming. The on site spa and massages were great. I couldn't recommend this hotel enough.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Free bikes are an amazing touch, great way to get around! Very happy to accommodate an early tour depart time (4:30am) and provide us with breakfast boxes. Hannah was extremely helpful, superb English and helped with lots of local advice - particularly thankful for the recommendation to go to the Bamboo theatre. Pool was an incredible location and made our stay extra special with the vast views.

review.rating: a due passi dal centro antico di Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: camera pulita, spaziosa e profumata (candela alla citronella accesa appena siamo arrivati..buonissima); posizione in una strada tranquilla ma vicino al centro raggiungibile a piedi in Max 10 minuti; colazione buonissima e possibilità di avere le uova cucinate al momento; staff gentile e disponibile per suggerimenti di locali, ristoranti e negozi di sartoria (molto famosi a Hoi An); piscina carina sul tetto dell’hotel; a disposizione gratuitamente le bici per un giro in città o per raggiungere le spiagge vicine; abbiamo usufruito del servizio lavanderia e in nemmeno 7 ore era tutto pronto pulito e stirato (si sono pure dispiaciuti perché abbiamo portato noi il sacco lavanderia mentre dovevamo lasciarlo in camera)
review.comment_negative: se vogliamo essere noiosi la porta del bagno in legno scorrevole si incastrava e non si chiudeva bene

review.rating: A lovely and relaxing stay in a sunny, bright and welcoming room and town.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
the staff is very attentive, it’s a real luxury to stay here. the room was light and bright and the bathroom was big, clean and good.
The in-house massage was a pleasant experience as well.
for breakfast you have to pay extra for a cappuccino, white Vietnamese coffee is available on the buffet. For vegetarians it’s a little hard to find food here except fruit or eggs (which don’t work for vegans).
review.comment_negative: Our room was in the first floor, located directly above the restaurant which made it a little loud in the mornings. if you’re a light sleeper you won’t have late mornings. Considering there’s a lot to see and do in Hoi An this is not so much of a problem though.

review.rating: Fantastic hotel in Hoi an with great service and facilities
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The interiors were great, loved everything!
review.comment_negative: It is slightly further than the old town but it was really not an issue at all for us.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our stay at Cozy Hotel. We spent five nights here, and it was amazing. Originally, we had booked a hotel in Danang, but we changed it quite last minute, and it turned out to be a really good decision. Hoi An is a lovely and cozy city that has a lot to offer, including day trips to other places. We especially loved the rooftop swimming pool; it was a fantastic place to relax after a long day. Everyone in the hotel was super friendly and helpful. We received plenty of recommendations for trips and things to see. The breakfast was great. The hotel's location is also very good; it is situated in a calm area, but you can easily walk to the center. We also appreciated the bike rental service.
review.comment_negative: The only sad thing was the fact that we could't stay longer

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.comment_positive: Proximity to river banks and night markets. Free bicycle to share. Good spread of choices

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
This is our first visit to Vietnam, and we are happy that we chose to stay in Cozy Savvy during our time in Hoi An. The hotel is cute with good facilities and only a short walking distance to the Old Town. Our room is clean and very comfortable. My husband had a cold on our second day here. The accessibility of Netflix, YouTube, etc, on the TV made me very happy to stay in our room!
Great shout out to the three lovely receptionists we met so far at the front desk: Joy, Daisy and Cindy. They made us feel welcome the minute we arrived at the hotel. They are so friendly and delightful for a chat and sharing their culture. We appreciate their insightful recommendations for local attractions/food and suggestions regarding our daily plans.
Overall, we have had an enjoyable experience during our stay here!

review.comment_positive:
This hotel is amazing value! The location is superb - 50m from the river and a short stroll to Old Town.

The rooms are generously appointed and well designed - beds are incredible!

The rooftop pool is very nice and has a great sweeping view of the surrounding area.

The staff are first class, from bellboys and cleaners through to reception, breakfast, bars and management- a special shout out to Kathy, Vy and Joy who went above and beyond in making sure my stay was fantastic!

I can’t be more praiseworthy of this hotel.

review.comment_positive:
Everything! Big clean rooms, 10 minute walk from the old town, friendly and helpful staff. 

A big shout out to Daisy (Phuong) who welcomed us and provided us excellent recommendations for activities and restaurants. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Hannah gave us some great tips at check in. All staff were very friendly and eager to help.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: This place had to be the absolute number one place during my stay in Vietnam. The views were great, the staff went far far far beyond expectation, the room was amazing, the tub was beautiful, the breakfast amazing, one of the best spa experiences we received as well. This place literally has it all. It was my girlfriend's birthday and I chose this place because of its fantastic reviews and it didn't disappoint. My partner went to the spa and said it was "life-changing." They allowed us to check in a little early, I prepared a birthday surprise for her and the staff knew, gave her all special treatment in the spa and even got us a beautiful cake just for her. No extra cost, they just went the extra mile. Any request was fulfilled beyond what was required and always asked if there was anything else, and to never hesitate to talk with them. The room was beautiful, but the shining beauty was definitely the bath tub. It was gorgeous and was a perfect way to end a birthday with relaxation. I cannot express how grateful and astonished by how wonderful Cozy Savvy was. When I return to Hoi An, I will not even look for another place to stay.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, everything was perfect. More so even.

review.rating: Nice and clean hotel a couple of minutes away from the old town
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: The cozy savvy hotel is very tasteful and high class. The location and the staff is great. The breakfast is very varied and nutritious. Also the rooftop pool is basically very nice, but holds too few beds for the amount of guests.
review.comment_negative: Although we had actually booked a room in the cozy Savvy Hotel, we were accommodated in the "Villa" hotel next door. Both are marketed separately and but are apparently also connected via booking.com, although the Villa is much cheaper when booked directly. Accordingly, there was an unpleasant feeling of being misled for a short time. However, the staff organised a change to the other hotel, so we were satisfied in the end. However, I consider the practice of interconnected hotel bookings problematic.

review.comment_positive: The location was great. Quiet and off the main road. Walking distance to the old town. The room was very clean and comfortable and the AC worked well. We weren’t aware that there were two different separate buildings and we stayed in the “back” building. The rooms appear to be exactly the same (layout and decor), and if anything, the second building seemed to offer more privacy and solitude. Vi was very helpful at check in taking the time to share a map of the area and share recommendations.
review.comment_negative: No elevator in the second building but the staff carried our bags at check in and check out which we appreciated. The bed sheets are a little pilly and rough against your skin. The pools weren’t very clean (sticks, bugs and a used cigarette floating around) and the water temp was a little too warm.

review.comment_positive:
Everything was just great. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Big thankyou to Lyn who checked us in and continued to check every day that we were happy with the room, breakfast and gave good advice on places to go and dining options. Breakfast was always good. Lots of fresh fruit, cereals, eggs to order and of course noodle and rice dishes.
The lunch options were good value and more convenient than walking up the road in the heat of the day. We enjoyed many hours just hanging by the pool with a book and enjoying the view.

Ojalá volver pronto!

review.rating: The service here was amazing, we love it!
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
The hotel's proximity to the old town made it convenient for us, either through a short walk or a very affordable taxi ride.

- The rooftop pool was a standout, providing a relaxing and enjoyable retreat.

- The staff, particularly Daisy, Lyn, and the front desk team, played a pivotal role in making our stay memorable. Their genuine hospitality, personalised service, and valuable recommendations truly set them apart.

- The service at Cozy Savvy was unparalleled, standing out as the best among all our stays in Vietnam.

- The bedrooms were impressive, featuring comfortable mattresses, spacious layouts, and fantastic bathrooms.

- Breakfast, while having room for improvement, offered a good selection to start the day.

- The rooftop pool was a highlight, even though we didn't use the gym due to its small size.

Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel Hoi An exceeded our expectations, and we would unquestionably choose to stay here again, whether with a partner or family. A heartfelt thank you to the exceptional staff for making our stay truly memorable.
review.comment_negative: - The spa, while not the absolute best, provided a decent experience, although staff attire could be improved for a more spa-like ambiance.

Zimmer

review.comment_positive: We had the best time staying here. Everything from the hotel, to the family room, the breakfast and the location were perfect. We have been to quite a few places in Vietnam including many hotels and what stands out is always the service. However the service at this hotel was just a level above. We got exellent recommendations for both restaurant, tours and taylor from Daisy (not able to write her real vietnamese name) and we tried most of them out. They all turned out to be fantastic - a great selection of local food at both more turisty restaurants to more local ones. We got excellent help renting motorbikes and they even packed us breakfast, when we had an early flight out.

review.rating: Amazing staff and a large, clean, comfortable room. Recommend to all!
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Every single member of staff was warm, friendly and helpful. 
The rooms were clean and the bed, bedding and pillows were really comfortable. It was a large room so we could fit 2 cots (provided by the hotel) with still enough room for the girls to crawl around and play in! The walls were thick and we didn’t hear any noise from other rooms (although the real test would be to ask the people next to us!). Great, thick curtains that blocked out all the light, making nap time a breeze! Powerful air con.
The shower was powerful and the bath was amazing - easy to get it hot enough.
The breakfast was vast and varied.
It was a short walk to the old town/night market.
Great, big umbrellas for those rainy days.

We didn’t use it - but the rooftop bar looked incredible. And the bikes would have been amazing!

We came away with our 10 month old twins and the staff couldn’t have been more helpful; from giving us directions and booking taxis, to entertaining them and asking about them when they had a fever. Our girls are very messy eaters (self weaning) but we were never made to feel unwelcome or a pain - despite the mess we created. We would certainly return to Cozy Savvy and recommend to all friends, either with family, friends or a couple.

Thank you so much

Biggest disappointment was you could not take advantage of happy hour at the pool because the bar there is not operational. You have to dial down to reception on a dodgy phone and it takes too long to get the drinks sent up so that was a let down.

review.comment_positive: This hotel is a jewel: great building and rooms, eccellent breakfast, super friendly and efficient staff! A special thanks to Anne for helping us organizing a very complex trip to Hue!

review.rating: Highly recommended for any visitor to Hoi An.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The staff were fabulous. Special shout out to Daisy and Lyn for their absolutely wonderful hospitality, they really made us feel special. Our rooms were gorgeous and kids loved to pool.

very clean, well

review.comment_positive: Lovely staff and very good breakfast. Room was very nice.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.rating: A beautiful romantic getaway in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The hotel and rooms were gorgeous. And not only that, the staff was very kind, very helpful. They gave us tips around the city, and took great care of us.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing to dislike.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our stay! The staff was amazing, extremely helpful and friendly!! We booked some activities recommended by the hotel such as a cooking class, which I can highly recommend. The hotel provides bicycles and many suggestions for restaurants! Spa is great too. Perfect if you are looking for a cozy stay in Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: Our room had a connecting door to another room, which is why we could hear the people in the other room all the time. Also the gym is very basic.

review.rating: Una maravilla de opción en Hoi An
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: La decoración de la habitación, cuidada. Todo muy limpio. No se oyen ruidos por la noche. El servicio del hotel, Anne y Joy un encanto. Atentas cada día a lo que necesitásemos. Tienen dos piscinas una en azotea y otra abajo. Genial para refrescarte. La ducha y el baño todo fenomenal. El desayuno muy bien con muchas opciones. Te recomiendan cositas de la zona. Da gusto llegar a este hotel.
review.comment_negative: Nada, todo fenomenal

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Comfortable. Provided water and the staff were friendly. Make sure to go for a massage! They were great and they have deals on too (worthwhile deals)
review.comment_negative:
The staff didn’t speak much English at all, didn’t understand us for most of our conversations and told the spa the wrong length massage so booked it wrong. In the restaurant they didn’t understand dietary requirements either. When we arrived the check in was just them talking recommendations at you for half an hour but it was understandable.
The water pressure was awful, it was just a trickle.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Location was great, only a few minutes walk from old town. We used the hotels bikes to cycle to An Bang beach. Staff were so friendly and helpful, especially Lin and Vie. Breakfast was very good. So glad we stayed here

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
我們提早抵達飯店，雖然還不能入住，但飯店的前台員工很熱心的介紹會安好吃好玩的地方。

房間空間大，有浴缸，住起來很舒適。早餐豐盛選擇多，供應的時間長，可以好好放鬆享用美食。
review.comment_negative: 礦泉水只給小小的兩瓶，吹風機小隻（Panasonic), 因爲雨季拜訪，飯店有附雨傘（但有點小漏水，出門前要注意一下）其他沒什麼特別不好的地方。

review.rating: đáng tiền, thoải mái thư giãn

We has the most incredible stay here. The hotel is perfectly located - not too close to the main area, but within very easy walking distance, This meant that it was really quiet, which meant we slept like a log in the fantastic room. 

The best thing about this hotel however, is the staff. The could not do enough for us - as soon as we got there, they provided us with their local knowledge and helped us book some amazing excursions. I couldn't recommend this hotel highly enough.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Greetings from the staff at a hotel, giving you tips on what to do and where to go, friendly, and helpful. The rooms were amazing. The breakfast was a delight and we all look forward to it. Every day they had Vietnamese Coffee, Pho available, eggs cooked how you like, fantastic chef, and plenty of variety of fruits and dishes. The fruit basket in the room after coming late in from the airport in DaNang was so refreshing. So many details even the drains in the hotel room are pieces of art (photo below) to the adorable teapot and cups in the room. To top it off, I could not resist taking a bath every night in that lovely bathtub. https://share.icloud.com/photos/0ebPl7cB2aY15WAfJtjS7k0Bw

review.rating: 家族４人で充実のホイアン滞在
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
親子４人でコネクティングルームで過ごしました。インテリアが、ホイアンにちなんでランタンモチーフがさりげなくちりばめられていて、とても素敵でした。部屋についているテラスで、朝いちばんに外の風景を眺めるのが気持ちよかったです。ニワトリの鳴き声が聞こえてきたり、とてものどかな雰囲気です。
暑い日が続いていたので、ホテルの屋上プールは、子供達との滞在に重宝しました。プールからの眺めも広々していて良かった。
朝食ブッフェは、ベトナムらしい料理も並び、色々楽しめました。
スタッフの皆さん、とても親切でした。受付では、色々なお勧めレストランや、テイラーなどを教えてもらえて役立ちました。

Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.rating: Amazing hotel! Incredible staff, Great location, great facilities and lovely and clean. Everything you need and more for
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Me and my Mum visited in May and cannot recommend this hotel more! 
Amazing staff, great location, lovely breakfast, great facilities and everything you need for such a perfect stay in Hoi Ann. 
The staff really do go above and beyond!! They cannot help you enough and it really made our trip. Special thank you to Lyn and Vi for always being so lovely and helpful. 
The hotel is a very short walk in to the main town and the walk is very safe. The breakfast offers both Western and Vietnamese with plenty of choice! The gym is basic but more than enough equipment. The pool area is lovely with a nice chilled atmosphere. We borrowed bikes twice which were free and a great addition. The rooms and hotel itself was so clean! 
Would 100% come back and recommend this to anyone wanted a great hotel in Hoi An! 
It really made our stay….Thank you ☺️

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: This place is incredible. Really comfortable, well furnished and spacious enough room. Ours had a lovely view over the water. Impeccably clean. The breakfasts were my favourite from all the hotels on our trip so far. The highlight is definitely the staff. Vy (not sure if I have the spelling right) and Hanna were the standouts, they went out of their way to ask about our stay and give very personalized tips while here. But really all the staff went above and beyond for us. The hotel is a short walk (or even shorter bike ride) into the old town. I really felt at home here.
review.comment_negative: The only issue we had was with the bikes. My partner is 6 feet tall and none of the bikes were quite big enough for him.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Clean really nice staff with beautiful swimming pool
review.comment_negative: It has ok location there are better locations but it is really walking distance from the main places as well

review.rating: Das Hotel ist für einen Aufenthalt in Hoi An zu empfehlen
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft liegt nahe der Altstadt. Es sind ca. 10 Minuten Fußweg bis man das Zentrum erreicht. Die Zimmer sind geräumig, schön designed und spiegeln das Flair von Hoi An sehr gut wider. Außerdem besaß das Zimmer eine Badewanne und eine Regendusche, wo man sich bei einem heissen Tag gut abkühlen kann. Der Pool mit herrlichem Ausblick über Hoi An hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Das Frühstück bat eine Vielfalt von asiatischen und westlichen Gerichten an, sodass jeder Gast definitiv was für seinen Geschmacksgaumen finden kann.
review.comment_negative:
Zusammengefasst gibt es kaum Dinge, die zu bemängeln sind. 

Das Personal war abgesehen von einigen Personen sehr nett. Bei manchen hat man das Gefühl, dass Augenkontakt vermieden wird. 

Beim Check-In hat uns keine Person mit unserem Gepäck in Empfang genommen. Das wurde bereits mit dem Hotel besprochen und uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie aktuell einen Ressourcenmangel haben und nach Personal für den Job suchen. Trotz der Umstände fanden wir es sehr nett, dass bei unserer Ausreise eine Person organisiert wurde, die uns mit dem Gepäck half.

The buffet breakfast was fantastic,  as was our dinner, massages, and cocktails. We would definitely stay here again.

review.comment_positive:
A very beautiful boutique hotel with 5 star service.
After some time in Vietnam,I found here the most diverse and amazing breakfast.
The rooms are just lovely and really big and comfortable.
The Spa is excellent, a real spa atmosphere. 
The staff is very kind and professional.
Overall a 10 score from a very demanding client ( myself :)).
Free bikes and just 10 minutes walk to the center. Location is perfect.
review.comment_negative:
I wanted to extend my booking of 2 nights but the hotel was fully booked for one of the date.
I could still stay one more night and i asked to receive the same room rate but they wanted to charge more because it was a different room.
So I had to leave and find another hotel.

The gym is really really basic. Only one bike and one run machine and weights. Enough for training but small.

She organized airport shuttle, shuttle to our next location, wrote down recommendations on a map, and booked our basket boat activity. And the property is sparkling clean and the shower was amazing! Plus the free breakfast is delicious. 

We strongly would recommend anyone we know to check out this place!

The staff are all wonderful and gave me very detailed tips on where to go in Hoi An. Special thanks to Daisy, Cindy and Anne for all the kindness during my stay!

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
This hotel was incredible. The staff was friendly and helpful even before we arrived through our email correspondence. They were able to accept a package I had delivered there, which was easily handled.

When we first arrived, Lynn helped me and my fellow travelers out as we got our welcome drink. She spent a lot of time with us helping to design our entire stay. She pointed out several coffee, lunch, & dinner spots. She helped us out with a reservation overlooking the water at one of the higher demand restaurants. She also suggested a few tailor shops (because that was a major priority for me in Hoi An!). She also said that if we had any suggestions at the end of the stay (things that didn’t work out or great new finds), to let the Cozy Savvy Staff know so that they can share the info with future guests. 

The hotel was the perfect distance away from the hustle bustle of the old town. I’m definitely staying here again when I come back to Hoi An!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We had an amazing one night stay at Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel. Our room was beautiful and very clean, the bed and pillows were so comfortable and the shower was amazing! The location is great - it’s just a short (and safe) 10 min walk into the old town. The breakfast was great with food for all tastes and good vegetarian options. The highlight of our stay was the staff - it was our birthday and the staff brought us cake at breakfast in the morning, which was a really sweet and kind gesture. It really made our day. I don’t remember the names of all the staff members who made our stay special but there was Kati who was very attentive and helpful.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

review.rating: Would stay here again if we visit Hoi An in the future.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located a little out of the Old Town so it's quiet and nice. The rooms are spacious and the bathrooms have beautiful brass fittings and lovely bath tubs. The hotel is about a 10-15 minute walk to the Old Town and there are bicycles available for guests too. There are mini marts and restaurants near the hotel so it's very convenient. The front desk staff are very helpful and friendly. They speak good English and are always willing to answer any questions from guests. We booked the coconut bamboo boat ride with them and it was excellent! We also did a massage at their spa. The service was good and the rooms were clean. Highly recommend this hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
We loved our time at Cozy Savvy so much that we extended our stay with another night! The hotel feels cosy, has a great artsy vibe and you can tell even from check-in that they are very customer focused. 

As we arrived, Tracy took 15min to give us the best recommendations and advice on how to plan our days in Hoi An. Then Kathy looked after us for the duration of our stay, booking all the day tours, another night of accommodation and even sharing her coconut coffee with me! ❤️
Fantastic customer care!

review.comment_negative: The hotel gives you tips on places to eat etc, but also tailors, please be wary as the tailors hotel reccomend are more expensive and the hotels do get a cut of the sale. We have used better tailors in HCM and Hanoi.

My husband and I both ended up with mild cases of swimmers itch after we took a swim in the ground floor pool.

review.rating: Although Hoi an is a bit too touristy for our taste the hotel could not have been better

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Cozy Savvy Hotel is een fijn en rustig gelegen hotel. De kamers zijn ruim en beschikken over een balkon. Het ontbijt is met een keuze aan Vietnamese en Westerse gerechten erg gevarieerd. Er is een heel fijn rooftop zwembad met een geweldig uitzicht. Fietsen zijn gratis beschikbaar. De uiterst charmante Lynn heeft ons uitstekende tips bezorgd voor lekkere restaurants, de beste kledingzaken en leuke activiteiten.
review.comment_negative: Niets

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Everything! Our flight were delayed so we checked in quite late in the evening, and the staff helped to order the food as per our request. The room was spacious and super clean. The location was great as well as it was close to the old town. My friend's birthday was on the checkout day but they prepared a birthday cake for him anyway! Much appreciated! We will defo return the next time we come to Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Excelente staff, especially Tam was fantastic. We lost our camera the day before in a taxi and she helped us to find her and get to us again. Everything was perfect.

review.rating: A fantastic hotel to stay in while you visit Hoi An!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Nos encantó la ubicación, el desayuno, la cama y la habitación en general. El personal muy atento y amable. La piscina en el Rooftop es un plus. Quizá ll que más destacaría sería el SPA, nos dimos el masaje vietnamita y creo que de los mejores que me han hecho en mi vida.
review.comment_negative: La verdad que en general todo nos gustó mucho, pero en la habitación que nos tocó, que estaba en el sexto piso (creo que no pasa en el resto de pisos), se oía constantemente el ruido del motor de la piscina, lo que fue un poco molesto por las noches y también por las mañanas, que nos despertaba. También mencionaría que, aunque nos encantó la piscina en el rooftop, el servicio allí dejó un poco que desear.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 員工友善，主動服務
review.comment_negative: 地點較徧僻

review.rating: Sejour agreable dans un bon hotel avec facilites de contact avec le personnel.

Nv ở đây thân thiện cực , lúc 1h sáng gọi điện hỏi nv , nv vẫn thúc trực trả lời! 
Nv gương mặt rất hiền và phúc hậu luôn
review.comment_negative: Sàn nhà hơi bẩn , tất dính đen luôn

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
I booked a room for me and my girlfriend for 3 nights. It was my girlfriends birthday so I asked for balloons and flowers. They decorated the room so nice and they gave us one of the best rooms in the hotel with a nice view! The breakfast was one of the best we've had in Vietnam (they have yoghurt :) ) The Wifi works good in the room. 

The hotel has free bicycles that you can take to explore the old town (you can't drive with a motorbike in the old town) They also gave us a map and some recommendations of Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: The laundry service is a bit expensive (70K for 1 kg).

review.rating: loved Hoi An for its old charm and great food.  Cao Lao is a must try

El desayuno muy muy bueno, buffet muy completo. El cafe de 10. 
La piscina muy bien, con vistas y limpia.
