Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Well positioned - excellent staff with extremely helpful attitude. Brilliant breakfasts with lots of choice. Beautiful roof top swimming pool in main building
review.comment_negative:
Not many sun beds but it didn’t seem to be an issue. 

Had to move room initially twice as no bath in first room and second room was ground floor and I felt exposed. I was then transferred to the main building and was very happy there.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Good location. Attentive staff. Nice big clean room with all the amenitiies.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
La atención del personal fue exquisita, las instalaciones limpias y de gran calidad, el buffet del desayuno era súper completo y la habitación amplia, luminosa y con un baño grande.
Además dispone de un rooftop con piscina, gimnasio y spa de gran calidad.
Ofrecen todo tipo de actividades, desplazamientos y facilidades.
Ubicado a 10-15 minutos caminando del centro, que para nosotros resultó ideal.
review.comment_negative: Nos gustó todo.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Beautiful facilities and staff. Breakfast was amazing. Hannah from reception met me when I arrived with a map and pointed out the best places to eat and explore with information on what to do. I did around 6 things she suggested and all of them were amazing. Can't fault a thing. 10min walk to main area, but that means at night/morning it's nice and quiet. Highly recommend
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Fantastic experience all round, would definitely stay again
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: The staff were incredibly welcoming; Daisy, Joy and Lynn went above and beyond to help us at every opportunity. The location was around ten minutes walk from the old town, meaning you can avoid the noise of the old town when you're trying to sleep. Daisy sat down with us for around ten minutes when we first arrived and went into great detail on where we should visit on our trip.
review.comment_negative: The room service food was ok, nothing special.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The rooms were extremely clean and well decorated. Felt very homey while still retaining that holiday feel. The breakfast buffet was great (some good vegetarian options dependent on the day). But above all the service was spectacular. We had Hannah who provided us with above and beyond welcoming service and information about the area and what to do. We really appreciated her enthusiasm, detailed knowledge, and advice. All other staff were also great. The service was a good balance between anticipating and meeting our needs without being too overbearing. Would return again!
review.comment_negative: None

review.rating: Le meilleur hôtel de notre séjour au Vietnam
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Accueil exceptionnel, un grand merci à Vi qui a pris le temps de nous expliquer tout ce qu’il y avait à voir à Hoi An ainsi qu’où trouver les meilleures spécialités culinaires. L’ensemble du personnel est aux petits soins. 
Les photos Booking sont identiques à la réalité. La chambre était très propre et très bien décorée. La piscine très agréable. Nous avons mis quelques vêtements à laver, rapport qualité/prix excellent! 
Les prix du spa sont corrects et de très bonne qualité (full body massage et soins visage pour nous).
Le petit déjeuner était excellent.
review.comment_negative: rien à dire, tout était parfait.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: La situación es excelente. Habitaciones cómodas. Nosotros tuvimos dos conectadas para nuestros hijos. Desayuno correcto. Recibimiento excelente, y lo mejor, el personal. Anne nos recibió a las mil maravillas y nos resolvió todas las dudas.
review.comment_negative: Todo correcto

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Fantastic staff. Great rooms. loved the decor in the rooms. very close to old town. you can rent by cycle from the hotel. Fabulous breakfast
review.comment_negative: nothing really

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: 非常喜歡飯店的裝潢，服務也都很好，早餐也很棒，只是離古鎮有一段距離，大概走路10分鐘，飯店有提供免費腳踏車，但其實古鎮下午4點後，人就開始多起來，其實腳踏車也很難前進

review.rating: The staff at Cozy Savvi led by Daisy were always exceptional.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
The staff at Cozy Savvi led by Daisy were always exceptional ensuring that my stay was to the expectations of what I was looking for. 
The buffet breakfast was just the way to start the day and to have Emily ensure that I had a Coffee each morning made my day.
Excellent location being only 5 min walk from Hoi An old town.
The rooftop Pool is a perfect place to spend an afternoon for any family.
review.comment_negative: The shop outside the villa's. Always tring to encurage trade.

review.rating: Nice hotel and excellent service here.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Very close to the old town but locate in a quiet place. All the staff here were very friendly and welcoming. We had a nice stay here.
review.comment_negative: At first night we were arranged to stay at another building but I didn't really get what the reception tried to introduce to me. I was quite confused about the arrangement. The room at another building was ok but for the breakfast, you need to go through the narrow alley to the main building. Felt like having breakfast at another hotel.

review.rating: Hochwertiges Hotel in guter Lage mit sehr aufmerksamem Personal
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
- Extrem freundliches und aufmerksames Personal 
- Super hilfreiche Unterstützung bei Planung des Aufenthalts und Buchung von Freizeitaktivitäten (vor allem von Daisy)
- Schön eingerichtetes Zimmer
- Leckeres und abwechslungsreiches Frühstück
review.comment_negative: - Nichts

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Super mooi hotel! Uitgebreid ontbijt! Leuk zwembad op het dak van het hotel! Zeer vriendelijk personeel, elke dag vroegen ze ons hoe alles ons beviel, of we nog suggesties hadden..

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 飯店的所有員工都很和善，讓人如沐春風，非常自在
review.comment_negative: 飯店設施有些可能因為維修不易，如蓮蓬頭，浴缸排水孔，都有些狀況，但是瑕不掩瑜，整體還是非常好

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Customer service is the best we have experienced in Vietnam. Hannah went out of her way to help us when we were struggling with a payment at a restaurant due to card not working. Breakfast is great, loved the happy hour by the pool and happy hour on wine in the evening drinks reasonably priced. Room is clean and comfortable. Location is good - 10 min walk to the bars and markets etc. followed recommendations made by Hannah and had excellent food whilst there. Go to Cam (1 min walk on same street) for a coffee, beautifully decorated and beautiful amazing coffee

review.rating: Breakfast was so good, and different each day! The location was quiet which I was so happy about.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was so good, and different each day! The location was quiet which I was so happy about. It was close to Old Town and so easy to get to. Lyn helped us a lot by recommending a great tailor in town and we got beautiful clothes made there.
review.comment_negative: It was really one of the best properties I've stayed at.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.rating: An excellently run hotel with all you need on the quieter side of town - standout was the staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The staff were excellent - offering tips for your stay and asking if any improvements could be made. When problems arose they were very quick to fix. Bikes for guests use was a great addition. Breakfast was exceptional.
review.comment_negative: The photos did rather make this place look slightly more luxurious than it was in person. But it was very nice nevertheless.

review.rating: Lovely stay just outside of old town!

Phòng gia đình
review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi ở mức khá. Vị trí hơi xa trung tâm.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Comfortable hotel, not too big, quiet location
review.comment_negative: A bit far from old town

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait. La chambre et la salle de bain sont très élégantes. Le personnel est très gentil et nous a beaucoup aidé : Vi, en particulier, nous a recommandé beaucoup d'adresses locales, avec beaucoup d'enthousiasme pour sa ville : elle est d'un excellent conseil.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
L’hôtel est très bien placé au calme
De plus, le prêt gratuit de vélo permet de se déplacer plus facilement
La chambre était spacieuse et le lit très confortable
Il y avait un frigidaire, une bouilloire (+ thé et café) un sèche-cheveux, un bureau, un coffre, une penderie
La salle de bain était très bien avec une grande douche et de l’eau chaude à toutes heures de la journée
Le balcon était très bien avec sa petite table
Le personnel est très gentil et ils m’ont rendu service.
La télévision, la climatisation et la wifi fonctionnaient très bien.
Le petit déjeuner était exceptionnel, un buffet avec énormément de choix
Je recommande vivement

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The reception staff, Alice, was very helpful. She provided food and shop (for custom made leather shoes) recommendations as well as assisted with the booking of the Hoi An Memories Show and the private transport to the airport. The breakfast spread was also excellent.
review.comment_negative: However, the hotel is slightly further away from the old town and it is more comfortable to grab instead of walk between the hotel and the old town, especially under the hot sun.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Only stayed for one night, but no complaints. Very happy with the room and breakfast was great.  I would definitely stay there again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Amazing reception with Ms Vi! She helped us so much with a lot(!) of local recommendations to do in and around Hoi An. Having someone like her on the hotel staff is so precious and is a very nice surplus. We recieved very good advice on the transfer to the airport and on the transfer to our next hotel. 
As the room is concerned, this was very spacious with a large bathroom. Really enjoyed the shower! Breakfast buffet is very elaborate and everything is fresh and delicious. 
We had a very nice massage in the spa of the hotel at a very nice price.
review.comment_negative: The bath plug was not working properly, resulting the bath to drain before it could fill up.

review.rating: Would recomend the hotel to anyone going to Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: All of the staff were really friendly especially Daisy and Vee   who organised trips taxis etc without any issues. The hotel is close enough to walk to everything but away from any noise

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in a beautiful place!
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
The staff are amazing. Extremely attentive and helpful. 
The rooms are spacious and clean, wifi works really well.
The pool is fantastic and the location is a quick 5min walk into the Old Town.
Breakfast is delicious and there is so much food.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Perfecto para estadía corta de 2-3 días, muy hogareño
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Buena ubicación, a 5 minutos caminando desde Old Town al hotel. Desayuno tipo buffet bien variado, rico... Ofrecen Salt Coffee con cargo adicional, recomendado. Habitación con buena vista a la ciudad y baño impecable. El Staff sumamente preocupado por una situación que vivimos en el aeropuerto, gestionando el traslado más tarde. Nada que decir, todo muy bueno, en especial la atención desde Recepción con Hannah y sus compañeras. Nos orientaron en todo lo turístico, entregándote un mapa, etc
review.comment_negative: Nada

review.rating: Im Großen und Ganzem eine super Unterkunft
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war super nett und pro-aktiv. Darüber hinaus war es praktisch, dass man sich Fahrräder einfach ausleihen konnte, um schneller ins Stadtzentrum zu kommen (auch wenn man es auch zu Fuß schafft).
Wir waren darüber hinaus auch im Spa, was wir ebenfalls als sehr gut empfunden haben.

Das Frühstück war reichhaltig und vielseitig. Bei einem fünftägigen Aufenthalt fehlte uns nur irgendwann die Abwechslung.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war stets sehr hilfsbereit und aufmerksam. Beim Frühstück gab es eine große gute Auswahl. Der Pool war schön und groß. Das Zentrum war fußläufig schnell zu erreichen. Zudem kann man Fahrräder kostenlos leihen. Würden das Hotel Familie und Freunden weiterempfehlen.

review.rating: Will highly recommend this property for service, location and cleanliness
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: the breakfast was absolutley amazing , so much variety

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: phòng đẹp
review.comment_negative: không gian xung quanh

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Good location, great facilities, delicious breakfast and above all superb staff. They have good restaurant, shops and tour recommendations. 
I got sick during my stay and they arranged a doctor's appointment very early in the morning, also the taxi, stop at the ATM, copy of my passport, everything. They were really invested that I got medical attention as soon as possible. This made me feel safe being so far away from home. Alice in reception was amazing. 
Highly recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: very good value for the money . great pool and view. nice room with balcony. every day fresh fruits at the breakfast.
review.comment_negative:
it is a bit noisy. every morning at 5 o'clock a dog barks and a very loud rooster crows.
when the neighbors are watching tv, you can hear it too.

review.rating: Great hotel for a very good price!
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Ms. Daisy welcomed us and told us all kinds of recommendations (food, tailor, etc.) and drew them on a map for us. She was always very helpful and made sure that we‘re having a great stay. The room was very nice, it even had a balcony. Also breakfast was really good, there were not too many options but they varied and offered enough for everyone. On our last day we were able to leave our luggage there (our pick up to the airport was scheduled at 6pm) and they let us use the rooftop pool and the public shower on the top floor. (Everything was very clean!) Location is okay, it‘s about a 15 minute walk to the center.
All in all it was a great hotel for a very good price!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Best value for money, and most kind and professional staff

The hotel is a little bit away from the crowds, enough to be quiet and close enough to  just walk over when you want. Could not been better!!

review.rating: Perfect stay, thank you Daisy and staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Staff very friendly, especially Daisy, who made our stay very comfortable and gave us great recommendations for food/tailoring/tours. Rooms spacious and clean. Good location

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The only good thing about this hotel was the location and I think staff name was Hanna who was quite friendly and helpful upon arrival.
review.comment_negative:
The bed was the most uncomfortable bed I’ve ever slept on. It would make a loud banging noise every time I sat, stood or turned over. 
There was an ant infestation in the room to which I didn’t complain but mentioned if they could clean and they tried to blame having Unopened chips packet on it. No apology or just a simple clean but ridiculous excuses. 
Upon going downstairs to the dining area there was a huge RAT running around which I had to point out to staff. This was on my first day, again I did not complain however didn’t feel comfortable eating my paid for breakfast for the 3 day stay.
The least the staff could have done was to offer a refund on the breakfast as I didn’t say anything. 
Overall I was disgusted in the service and lack of guest comfort or care and would never recommend staying at this hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

Staff molto disponibile, l’ultimo giorno avevamo un volo serale e ci hanno consentito di rimanere in piscina e fare una doccia oltre il check out.

We'd love to stay here again one day!

review.rating: Lovely stay in a great hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Cosy is the name and and an excellent  description of the hotel as well. We have travelled Asia and Malaysia for about 6 months and this has been the best hotel we have stayed in. 
The staff have been excellent, many of them address us personally and they were attentive to any requests such as we asked for black tea bags being British instead of the green tea and they quickly changed it for us and also remembered each day that it was our preference. 
Nothing felt like too much trouble for them. The rooms were well appointed and clean, I am particular about cleanliness. 
Great location just a few streets away from the centre so far enough not to be bothered by any early early morning bar noise but very close too. 
We borrowed the hotel bikes most days so we could take a ride into town and we went to the beach one day which is further out , we’re not fit but the ride is pretty much flat there and back so perfect really. 
I shall be hopeful that the hotels on our forward journey are as good as this. Also the breakfast choice was the best we’ve had so far as well. 
Thank you Daisy & Anne 😁

The staff at Cozy Savvy are the stars of this boutique hotel! Vi and the rest of reception were incredibly kind and helpful.  I was always guaranteed smile (and a vietnamese lesson!) Ha in the spa was also terrific. 

The hotel is in a great location and a short walk to the center of Old Town. The room was bright, clean and well serviced.  The breakfast offered a huge selection. 

All in all, this was a two thumbs up, 5 star experience and highly recommended.

Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Lovely hotel with comfortable room and bed. 
Staff were very friendly and helpful.
Breakfast buffet was delicious, especially loved the banana pancakes!
Location was great, just outside of ancient town so that you don’t hear the noise of the hustle and bustle, whilst still being close enough to easily walk everywhere.
We loved being able to use the hotel bikes for free, was wonderful to ride around Hoi An and nearby locations.
We also absolutely loved the rooftop pool, absolutely gorgeous view! It was great to be able to order food and cocktails up to the pool so that we could lounge around and enjoy an afternoon drink.
review.comment_negative:
Noise from floors above and below is easily heard through the door, which made it difficult to sleep at times. I could easily hear people talking at night two floor below, just because of the way the design of the building is and how close our bed was to our door. If you’re a light sleeper I would highly recommend earplugs or a sound machine.
Shower door doesn’t have proper sealing, so water runs out and onto the floor. Easy to clean up, but got a bit annoying after a few days of mopping up the water after each shower

review.rating: Super schönes und authentisches Hotel in dem jeder Wunsch erfüllt wird
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel ist sehr schön ausgestattet und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Es ist fußläufig zur Altstadt gelegen und bietet einen Fahrradverleih an. Unser Zimmer war großzügig geschnitten und verfügte über einen Balkon. Das Frühstück war vielfältig und sehr lecker. Das Personal war äußerst freundlich und hilfsbereit. Insbesondere Cindy - die Rezeptionistin war sehr zuvorkommend, versorgte uns mit zahlreichen Restaurant- und Café-Tipps (wir testeten alles und waren super happy, da es keine Touri-Spots waren)! Sie kannte sogar unsere Namen und fragte immer wie unsere Ausflüge waren. Es herrscht eine total familiäre und angenehme Atmosphäre. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen und würden das Hotel Freunden und Familie weiterempfehlen.

review.rating: ein traumhafter Aufenthalt in diesem wunderbaren Hotel
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
…es waren wunderschöne 5 Tage in diesem richtig netten Hotel! Schon beim Empfang wurden wir sehr freundlich von allen willkommen geheißen und sehr persönlich und ausführlich von Daisy informiert!
Dazu haben wir 3 uns an einen Tisch gesetzt und konnten auch alles fragen, was uns auf dem Herzen lag!
Auch das Ambiente des Hotels war sehr schön, ebenso unser Zimmer mit einem großen Balkon und Flussblick, gute Matratze, tolles Bad, mit allem ausgestattet , was man sich wünscht,alles super sauber, überhaupt im gesamten Hotel!
Das Frühstück war himmlisch! Abwechslungsreiches Angebot!
Auch konnte man sich täglich Fahrräder leihen,kostenlos!
Mein Mann hatte in unserem Aufenthalt Geburtstag…und wurde mit einem Geburtstagsliedchen und auch einer köstlichen persönlichen Torte zum Frühstück überrascht! Einfach wunderschön!
Der Service im gesamten Hotel, in allen Bereichen war einzigartig, immer sehr freundlich, persönlich, hilfsbereit!
Erwähnen möchte ich hier das Management, persönlich:
Emily, Kathie, Cindy, Ann, Daisy, Tai und VuTam!!!
Euch allen nochmals vielen vielen lieben Dank für alles! Herzliche Grüße aus Germany!
review.comment_negative: Man kann nichts besser machen 👍👍👍

review.rating: Beautiful surroundings, excellent breakfasts and fabulous staff
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: The staff were, without exception very personable and engaging. They wanted to help with any of our requirements, checked on our day and plans and were very courteous. It felt that hotel management had a policy of ensuring a good level of English for all staff. Even the cleaners greeted us with a friendly hello or goodbye.
review.comment_negative: Very little, though we did say that we really rate hotels with a zero plastic policy who provide glass water bottles to be refilled and reused with water from large tanks. We have stayed in hotels with a water filling station on each floor.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: We had been moved to a different location as part of the hotel as they were fully booked. As I had a road accident, I wasn't able to walk upstairs very well (no lift) but the staff changed our room so we were on a ground floor room. The second room was much better with a nice bathtub.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast is served in the main hotel which I wasn't able to access due to my leg injury. My partner went and said it was meat heavy and really not suitable for vegetarians.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: excellent staff, yummy breakfast, luxurious and clean room

review.rating: 3 stars at best. Definitely not a five star hotel.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
review.comment_positive: Absolutely loved Hoi An, but there wasn't much I liked about this hotel at all. The positive is it was a 10-15 minute walk to the main part of town, which is fine because it's safe to walk at night. Lots of local spa places on the street which were good. Also there's a little store behind the hotel with a really lovely Vietnamese lady that runs it if you need anything.
review.comment_negative:
I've stayed at plenty of five star hotels, including others in Vietnam and this is absolutely far from it. 
- The check in experience was poor. I checked in after 9pm so she said she wouldn't show me the amenities and I had to figure it out myself - never checked into a five 5 star hotel that was this apathetic to a guest.
- This hotel has two buildings which I wasn't told of, and my room was in a different building down an alley. At night there's a random guy sleeping in the hallway on a trundle bed. (again, not a five star experience and felt very unsafe) 
- My room was on the ground floor which I wasn't told when booking. There's no real door, just a sliding door with a key that's difficult to use. There's a few stairs as well which are not easy when you have a suitcase. 
- Bathroom was old and mouldy (see photos)
- I asked for a late check in and they wanted to charge me 500,000VD - they ended up waiving it when I said no

The hotel is located only a 5 minute walk from the main town area but is still quiet. There is also a lovely pool on the roof which gets the sun all day. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Hoian for a few days and I would definitely return again.

La chambre est très propre, la baignoire fait rêver et le lit est gigantesque. 
Le personnel est très gentil. Merci à la dame qui a rapporter la veste de mon mari juste avant qu’on saute dans le taxi !

Ze boden dagtochten naar My Son aan en hielpen ons een autochauffeur te boeken naar Hue (inclusief marble mountains, hai van pass, lang co lagune en zwemmen in een waterval!)

review.comment_positive:
Our stay was really exceptional. 
The hotel itself is great:
- comfortable rooms
- Nice pool with a view
- Good breakfast with a big variety
- Free bikes 
- Good location, near to the old town, and yet still quiet 
What I really would love to mention is the people and their services, which went beyond. My partner was sick and they helped us with tea and soup. 
Highly appreciated and loved by us. I would like to thank the whole hotel team for this warmth!

Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Mooi hotel aan de rand van de stad Hoi An, lopend binnen 10 min in het centrum. Gratis fietsen beschikbaar, om de stad te verkennen. Wij zijn ermee ook naar het strand gegaan 4-5 km verder op. Top. Kamer aan de voorkant met balkon, fijn om even te zitten en over de stad te kunnen kijken. Mooi koffie zaak CAM aan de overkant, ligt een beetje verscholen, maar hier zeker een Vietnamese koffie gaan drinken.
review.comment_negative: Kamer was opties wel schoon, maar achter het bad en onder het badmeubel bleven wel zaken liggen die niet werden opgeruimd in de 3 dagen dat we hier geslapen hebben. Vloer voelde vaak plakkerig. Ontbijt matig, veel Aziatische gerechten, maar brood was oud, weinig Europese opties.

review.room_type: Phòng gia đình
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn ổn so với giá tiền. Phù hợp cho các nhóm đi du lịch tiết kiệm.

review.rating: Great value for money, comfortable, convenient with lovely staff. Definitely consider this hotel for your stay in hoi an
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: We loved everything. The rooms were comfortable and spacious. The staff were fabulous - the most friendly out of any hotel we stayed at in Vietnam. Vi took care of us when we arrived, showing us plenty of places to visit and eat by annotating a map without it feeling like she was just promoting the businesses of family/friends. We did end up visiting many of the places she recommended. The pools were so lovely with a fantastic view from the rooftop pool. It was so hot while we were in Hoi An, but the room was well air conditioned. The breakfast was lovely as was the restaurant. We loved the cocktails here as well. It’s walking distance to the old town and all the main attractions, but the strip you walk down to get there also has great restaurants and cafes too.
review.comment_negative: Nothing. Everything was great.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: The cozy savvy hotel was the second to last place we stayed on a 3 week trip to Vietnam and Thailand. My partner and I both agree it was our favorite accommodation we’ve had so far. The staff was absolutely incredible. Daisy worked reception at our building, the cozy Villas and she treated us like family. we arranged for staff to pick us up from the airport and drop us back off at the airport, a 45 minute drive. our driver met us as soon as we stepped foot out from baggage and brought us to a car with AC and cold water bottles. when we arrived we were promptly given a map of Hanoi and the sweet front desk attendant showed us her favorite markets, beaches, restaurants coffee shops etc. our room was very clean and the cleaning service was thorough. the pool is kept very cold which was a life saver during the times of the day that were over 100 degrees. we will be coming back and staying with these wonderful folks!

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
review.comment_positive: The room was spacious and the bed was comfy. The staff were extremely friendly and gave us lots of information on Hoi An when we checked in. Lots of great restaurant recommendations which we used ☺️ short stroll into the town but it was nice being away from the hustle and bustle.

review.rating: Very good-value comfortable hotel in a very pleasant quieter area
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Delightful helpful friendly staff, very comfortable beds and rooms, good breakfast, loved the swimming pool on the roof top, had very relaxing massages
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Tolles Zimmer, schicke Einrichtung, sehr komfortabel, gutes Frühstück, gute Lage am Rande der Old Town.
review.comment_negative: Leider extrem hellhörig (haben morgens den Wecker aus dem Nachbarzimmer gehört)

review.rating: A great place to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in a convenient location close to the river and the Old Town. The rooms are very comfortable and the breakfast selection is excellent. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful, Cindy and Anna in particular; they gave us daily food recommendations for where to eat locally - all of which were great! They also organised trips out for us and made a point of checking that everything had gone smoothly each time. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Thank you all!
review.comment_negative: We liked everything!

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Location was excellent, just a short walk away from the old town. The hotel was exceptional, the staff were so friendly and attentive. Special mention to Hannah, who gave us a great welcome introduction with brilliant recommendations for food, shops and activities - we did them all! The spa was an added benefit, had a great massage at a reasonable price. It didn't feel like the hotel added on extras to rip you off, we hired a motorbike through them and did some laundry and it was all reasonably priced and saved us time shopping about.
Breakfast was great, brilliant selection. Bed was huge and so comfy.
review.comment_negative: Honestly nothing, was all beyond our expectations

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Hannah was fantastic - the whole place was gorgeous and walking distance to old town
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Séjour agréable dans un hôtel accueillant
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Très bon emplacement, à proximité du centre ancien. Très jolie vue depuis la chambre.
Chambre spacieuse décorée avec goût.
Petit déjeuner exceptionnel, copieux, varié, tout est fait maison. Un régal tous les matins.
Le personnel est très attentionné, aimable et souriant, de bon conseil, parle anglais correctement. Un grand merci particulier à Kathy et Tracy.
Prêt gracieux de vélos.
Nous y retournerons sans hésiter !
review.comment_negative:
Les femmes de ménage devraient éviter de faire du bruit (par exemple en déplaçant les meubles) tôt le matin.
Les vélos de prêt ne sont pas tous très bien entretenus.

review.rating: Fantasic staff & beautiful hotel. 10/10 would recommend!
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Lovely staff who were VERY helpful throughout our stay. Big shout out to Tracy who gave us a fantastic welcome and lots of information and hints about the local area. Not one of her suggestions failed to impress! 
Rooms were gorgeous, clean and comfortable and all other facilities were equally great.
review.comment_negative: That we had to leave.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
十分推薦飯店的早餐，以及優秀且熱心的服務品質。
一到飯店服務人員會仔細介紹在地推薦的景點與餐廳，令人有賓至如歸的感覺。讚！

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Unser bestes Hotel auf unserer Vietnamreise.
Super Pool auf dem Dach. 
Das Personal ist äußerst hilfsbereit. Beim einchecken hat sich Daisy mit uns hingesetzt und auf der Karte alles wichtige erklärt und uns sogar Essenstipps mitgegeben. Wir konnten außerdem Ausflüge buchen und wir konnten den Hotelshuttle buchen, der uns dann nach Da Nang gebracht hat.
Frühstücksbuffet ist ausgezeichnet.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Tolle Lage, tolles Hotel, super Frühstück. Das Personal war unglaublich bemüht und sehr freundlich.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Joli hôtel avec le personnel au top

Les chambres sont spacieuses et bien équipées. Le petit déjeuner est très varié surtout en spécialités locales. Qui a besoin de croissants au Vietnam ?

La piscine sur le

review.rating: Excellent 3day stay . Walking distance to hoi an centre.

review.rating: The hotel was the perfect choice for Hoi An.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: This hotel is a total gem in Hoi An. The staff is amazing, attentive, hard working, and so kind (they always made a point to say hello and check-in on your stay. The decor of the room was very well done and the cleanliness was top notch. The location is perfect and a short walk or bike ride (they have free bikes  into the old town area where the charm of Hoi An truly comes to life. The are tons of great cafe's and restaurants in the area, but the hotels' restaurant was good too. We would definitely stay there again if we are lucky enough to travel to Hoi An again.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Lovely place to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: It’s a beautiful hotel with lovely character. Rooms are very comfortable and breakfast is good. The staff, especially Fung (Daisy), are lovely.
review.comment_negative: The shower is very small and water gets everywhere outside, as the shower head points to the side with no door. Makes the whole bathroom wet and a little dangerous.

review.rating: A really nice hotel, great buffet breakfast, lovely staff. clean and comfortable rooms.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was very well run. clean, comfortable and the staff were extremely good. So helpful and friendly. Hannah looked after us from the moment we arrived and throughout our stay. All the staff we met were polite and professional.
Good sized rooms, quiet aircon. and great buffet breakfast. 
I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family.
review.comment_negative: Nothing in particular comes to mind.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: I loved this little hotel! From the airport pick up, which was reasonably priced, right through to the end of my stay, it was brilliant. The staff were friendly and helpful, especially Vee! She recommend lots of local food to try, things to see and do, and even tried calling the airlines to book me a flight, thinking she’d be able to get a cheaper deal than what was showing online (she couldn’t). Room smelt nice and the bed was comfortable. Breakfast had a good spread of local vs western, healthy and indulgent. Free bicycles were useful.
review.comment_negative: The gym. There is basically just a spin bike, with one pedal strap missing, meaning you can’t go fast. And a treadmill which didn’t work on the second day (it may have been fixed now - I reported it and the staff were very apologetic and said they’d get it repaired). Other than that there was a multifunctional weights machine, which was great.

review.rating: Perfect , it was the best out of all the hotels we visited
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
We will be giving 5 stars to this hotel. 

We stayed at this hotel , we had the best experience out of it. The staff were very kind , attentive and very respectful. 

We are more than happy to come and stay again with no doubt. 
Special shout out to the restless staff , they made sure to create an everlasting relationship with the guests , you are the best. 

Wish you the best and see you soon. 

Zee and Zianne
review.comment_negative: nothing -

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng khá ngon, nhưng không đa dạng
review.comment_negative: Nước ở khách sạn lúc nóng lúc lạnh mặc dù đang xả nước nóng, nước yếu

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We had the most beautiful stay at Cozy Savvy during our time in Hoi An. Lin checked us in and did everything in her power to make sure we were comfortable and knew all the information about the area. She gave us the most amazing restaurant recommendations (we highly suggest you go to all of them) and checked in each day to make sure we were enjoying our stay. The rooms are gorgeous and had a really luxurious feel with traditional decor. The location was also perfect as we could walk to whatever we needed as it’s close (but not too close) to the Main Street in the old town. Thank you to all the staff for our amazing stay!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 한적하고 편안하고 사진 그대로의 숙박 시설이예요. 특히 직원 하나씨가 신경써주려 하는게 고마웠어요. 수영장은 생각보단 작았지만 깊이가 다양해서 어른이 가볍게 놀기 좋았어요.

breakfast is nice

review.rating: Truly cozy stay, lovely staff who make it wonderful

review.comment_positive: The staff are exceptional - going above and beyond to answer questions and ask me how my stay is throughout. They addressed any concerns immediately and were phenomenal. The breakfast was great and I enjoyed the spa as well as the laundry service. It was super quick and they even mended a dress for me that I didn't explicitly ask to, they're just so truly thoughtful! The hotel is a quick 10 minute walk east to the old town. Highly highly recommend this hotel!

review.comment_positive: Couldn’t recommend more! From the second we arrived to the moment we were dropped at the airport, every single staff member did absolutely everything they could to make our stay special. Laundry turned around within hours of handing it in, to-go breakfast boxes on check out day to enjoy on the way to the airport, given all of the best recommendations of things to do and places to eat, our room being made up each day even if we only left for 10mins, the list goes on. Amazing location and beautiful hotel. Stay here!!

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Amazing stay! Literally the best hotel in Vietnam. Tracy at the reception welcomed us very friendly and with a good english.
SPA at the hotel is definitely worth visiting.
Breakfast was delicious.
Room was very spacious, clean and comfortable.
Perfect location. You can go to the city center by walking or you can take a free bicycle that the hotel offers.
All staff was very helpful. They organized a transport to a next destination with a very good price. While we were checking out the cleaning staff went to our room and made sure we did not leave anything.
There is absolutely nothing I could think of that they could have done better. Really, you cannot ask for more.

Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Des del primer moment el personal ens va atendre amb gentilesa, amabilitat i amb voluntat d’ajuda. Ens vam sentir molt a gust. L’habitació era àmplia, el llit era molt còmode i les instal·lacions eren boniques i ben cuodades (dues piscines, bar, etc). L’esmorzar era bo i divers. Els còctels de la piscina bons i amb “happy hour”. Les vistes des de la piscina del rooftop, eren bones i l’espai era agradable.
review.comment_negative:
Les úniques coses dolentes que puc dir són:
1- Ens va tocar l’habitació en un edifici que no era el principal i, per tant, no teníem ascensor. A més a més, el carrer que separa ambdós edificis és millorable..
2- A la piscina hi ha poques gandules i espai, en general, per tant si l’hotel està ple pot costar de trobar-hi espai.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Everything was wonderful. The staff especially go above and beyond to help with everything (booking tours, restaurant recommendations, cheap laundry service which they then hung up in our room!)
review.comment_negative: The gym was quite poor. No weights and very very small. Felt more it was there to say they had a gym rather than actually designed for people who want to use it

review.comment_negative: Shower fixtures

review.comment_positive: We loved our stay at Cozy Savvy! The hotel is really nice, the rooftop pool is a great place to hang out and the staff are lovely and always ready to help 😊

review.rating: Excellent place to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Nice location
Friendly staff
Good breakfast

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Great location a little bit away from the crowds but only 5 mins walk to the start of the Old Town. Breakfast was great with very varied options and a fresh eggs station is always nice. Loved chilling out by the pool and the happy hour is a nice touch. Was also really nice to be able to use the free bicycles every day. All in all a fantastic stay!
review.comment_negative: Honestly not a big deal but it would be nice if there were smart TV’s so that one could cast to them but I was so busy with various activities that this didn’t really matter. Just would have made it A++ rather then A+ :)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Zum Ende unserer Backpack Reise wollten wir ein wenig schicker schlafen und das war die richtige Entscheidung! Das immer war wunderschön, hell, wunderbarer Blick. Das Bad sehr angenehm und natürlich super sauber! Das Personal war durchweg freundlich, ich hatte mich zuvor in Hue verletzt und mir wurde ganz unkompliziert ein Taxi zum Krankenhaus organisiert und sogar immer wieder gefragt wie es mir geht. Das hatte ich nicht erwartet :). Auch die Eco Basketboat Trip war ein Highlight unserer Reise und wurde souverän organisiert! Hervorzuheben sind hier zwei Damen an der Rezeption, deren Name ich leider vergessen habe, ich hoffe, dass das Lob ankommt!!  Das Frühstück war an allen fünf Tagen sehr abwechslungsreich und für jeden Geschmack etwas geboten! Wir waren begeistert! Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder kommen! Fahrräder wurden aufgrund der Verletzung nicht getestet, sahen aber sehr gut gewartet aus! Kokosnusskaffee ist auch lecker!
review.comment_negative: Der Pool bräuchte vielleicht bei den Liegen mehr Schatten, sonst alles tiptop!! Bissl hellhörig hat aber unseren Schlaf nie beeinträchtigt! :)

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal mit vielen Tipps zu Hoi an. Old town ist zu Fuss super zu erreichen und Fahrräder können kostenlos ausgeliehen werden. Frühstück ist ausreichend und auch einladent gestaltet.
review.comment_negative: Hotel wir in der Kategorie 5* angeboten, welches es in keiner Weise gerechtfertigt. Zudem gibt es ein Haupt und Nebenhaus (etwas 50m eine kleine Gasse entlang) was aus der Zimmerauswahl nicht hervorgeht. Unser Zimmer im Nebenhaus (war ehemals ein eigenständiges Hotel) entsprach mit Augen zudrücken noch einem 3 Sterne Standard. Beide Pools sind auch nicht wirklich einladend und dienen höchstens Mal zum kurzen abkühlen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Struttura coloniale stupenda, piscina e servizi ottimi. Staff competente e gentile, camere davvero belle e colazione ottima!!! Posizione comoda e silenziosa solo stesso tempo.

review.rating: A true gem in HoiAn! Worth every dong spent!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
This has been one of the best hotel stays I've had so far! Truly a gem considering the price I paid for. The staff were not only genuinely hospitable. The best part was their generosity in sharing valuable local information about tours, attractions, activities and other 'know-hows' in HoiAn. My stay was nothing but pleasant and relaxing. 

The breakfast buffet offered a wide range of dishes. I really appreciated the assortment of salads, fruits, breads, and homemade spreads. Beverages were also varied! My problem is that there's just too many choices. 

The laundry service was also impeccable. The turn around time was only a few hours and my clothes came back looking fresh and smelling clean.
review.comment_negative: None! I love everything about this hotel.

review.rating: Nice clean hotel with welcoming staff

review.rating: Heel erg genoten van ons verblijf in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Prima hotel voor een verblijf in het toeristische Hoi An. Rustig gelegen en toch vlakbij de oude stad (enkele minuten op wandelafstand).
Heel goed ontbijt. Alle nodige faciliteifen en geen enkele moeite is te veel voor het heel vriendelijke personeel. We gaan zeker terug!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Muy buen hotel, limpio y cómodo. Habitaciones amplias y bien equipadas. El desayuno increíble. Tienen bicicletas gratis para poder recorrer la ciudad, y también puedes alquilar una moto para hacer lo mismo. Muy recomendado.
review.comment_negative: La verdad todo muy bien. Quizás el personal puede ser un poco mas atento, pero en general super bien.

review.rating: It’s accessible which is very rare to find with hotels lately. They made sure that it’s inclusive for everyone
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: It had a very light and warm aura. The staff and the other guests were friendly. Cindy welcomed me to the hotel and shared some local restaurant recommendations with me as soon as I arrived. I pretty much spoke to her everyday while I was there, which made travelling solo easier.
review.comment_negative: There aren’t that many faults with the hotel. It’s set right next to all the attractions but with some breathing room to be away from the noise. I would have the smoking area be a little bit further from the entrance.

review.rating: Good quality, good location, good breakfast, clean and comfortable beds..
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Really liked the hotel, friendly, room well thought out, breakfast excellent choice and quality..Staff are wonderful and very helpful especially providing information on local activities. Beds comfortable. Great value for money..The swimming pool is rather nice. The location was good all in walking distance but in a quiet area. It's a sociable hotel due to the layout and other guests are happy to share stories. I would definitely return
review.comment_negative: Shower didn't drain quickly and floor could be slippery when using shampoo etc. We were provided with enough bath mats to deal with this though.Air conditioning very effective to a point it was  cold for me and the fan was strong, meaning it blew on me in the far bed at night. You could always turn the temperature up to deal with it though.

review.rating: Enjoyed our 3 night stay and would definitely return to this hotel , the staff made our stay memorable
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Very clean and comfortable rooms .
Excellent location 
Everything you would need for a break 
Food , staff , the whole package was excellent
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Chambre et literie confortable, bon petit déjeuner. Piscine sur le toit appréciable. Initialement au 2e étage, nous sommes allé pour les 5 dernières nuits au 4e plus aérée et avec une plus jolie vue. Tachez de demander une chambre entre le 4ème et le 6ème étage. Une chambre au 7ème, mansardée, plus petite et située juste en-dessous du local technique de la piscine est à éviter absolument pour le même prix. Donc au final, le rapport qualité-prix est bon mais cet hôtel ne correspond pas à un 5 étoiles annoncé sur booking.
review.comment_negative: que les 6 nuits avaient été débitées sur la carte visa 3 jours avant notre arrivée lors que nous voulions payer en cash. Remboursement visa après environ 3 semaines mais nous nous serions bien passés de ce contretemps. Nous voulions être sûre de ne pas payer 2 fois la note et avoir les reçus attestant que nous serions bien remboursés.

review.rating: sehr gutes Hotel in guter zentraler Lage
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: sehr freundliches Personal-besonders Hannah hat uns gleich beim Check-in sehr freundlich empfangen und uns mit wertvollen Tipps rund um Ha Noi versorgt. die Lage ist ca 10 Minuten zu Fuß von der Altstadt/japanischen Brücke entfernt. schöner Pool auf dem Skydeck. Sehr gutes und abwechslungsreiches Frühstück-auch hier hat sich Vi jeden Tag nach unserem Wohlbefinden erkundigt und uns sehr nett unterhalten. Fahrräder kostenlos vorhanden. kann man alles sehr empfehlen
review.comment_negative: dass sich in einer Nacht eine Horde Jugendlicher einquartiert haben und diese bis spät nach Mitternacht eine Poolparty veranstaltet hatten-schlafen unmöglich

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Tout. Personnel adorable.

review.rating: Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in diesem hübschen, gemütlichen Hotel und würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war überaus freundlich und hilfsbereit, die Lage in der Nähe des Zentrums für uns perfekt. Das Zimmer war sehr geräumig, das Bad ebenfalls und sehr gut ausgestattet. Das Frühstücksbuffet kann man sehr empfehlen, es gab jeden Tag verschiedene vientamesische und westliche Speisen zur Auswahl. Der Fahrradverleih des Hotels war kostenlos und wurde unkompliziert gehandhabt. Außerdem wird ein Fahrservice zum Flughafen angeboten, der nur die Hälfte des üblichen Taxipreises kostet.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
A wonderful new hotel on the outskirts of the old town.  Still walkable but we usually hailed the gold electric golf carts that run around the roads for just a few dollars.  The staff were extremely friendly and knowledgeable, especially Hannah.  They were able to supply a wonderful cake for our daughter's birthday (at breakfast!)  and the small restaurant was great for a bite to eat.  Breakfasts were varied and plentiful with lots of fruit and eggs cooked to order.  The roof pool area was never crowded and just what was needed after walking around in the heat.  Everywhere was beautifully furnished and decorated.  Comfy beds and strong showers.  Massages available onsite too.  A great little coffee shop just a few doors up the street.
Interconnecting rooms make this a great family hotel, or for groups of friends.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.  Would definitely stay again and recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The staff were extremely helpful. The rooftop and breakfast were great. We really enjoyed our stay.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

review.comment_negative: it’s a bit noisy, if you’re a light sleeper bring earplugs.

review.comment_positive: Totalt veldig bra! Vennlige' hyggelige og hjelpsomme personale. Grei bemiggenhet.
review.comment_negative: Resturant/frokost sallå litt for nært en skrotete uteplass .ed mye søppel. Medførte en del fluer i resturanten.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Beautiful boutique hotel. Staff frendly and supportive.
review.comment_negative: All went well.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
The very friendly staff at this beautifully appointed boutique hotel take customer service to a new level .  
Nhung  (Katie ) spoke with us every day , taking time to make sure we were comfortable  and  giving us great tips on what to see and where to eat in Hoi An . 
Other notable staff members ;Hannah helped us with information and recommendations for the best tours and cooking classes . Nothing was too much bother .  The staff even took time to follow up to check that the tours we picked met our expectations . 
Harry the driver made sure we were picked up and dropped off at the Airport on time both trips . 
The Hotel  has a good roof top pool . The rooms are well furnished and very comfortable .
The Hotel location suited us as it is an easy walk into the old town  but in a quieter street . 
The excellent buffet breakfast has a wide variety  of fresh  western and local style food . 
Highly recommend this hotel for a stay in Hoi An .
review.comment_negative: All good

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:

review.comment_negative: Rien

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Nice rooms and comfortable beds. Breakfast is good.
review.comment_negative:
This 5 star hotel is not up to 5 stars as i know if from other countries:
- only 1 elevator, shared with the staff
- to enter you'll have to carry up your luggage up stairs (i guess this is to be safe for floodings, however they should help you without asking)
- staff only says hello if you would speak to them
- checkin is lengthy, but also good food recommendations
- rooftop pool is small and not as fancy as it looks on the pictures
- cleaning lady left several long hairs in the room

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
The food recommendations from the front staff were impeccable! The room smelt AMAZING and was big with a balcony. Great breakfast and great value for money all around. Close to everything but felt quiet. Restaurant across the road ran tours and had yummy food and lovely staff too!!
At the hotel the free bikes were awesome as well!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: location, swimming pool , bath
review.comment_negative:
It was disappointing that we paid quite a bit extra for a buffet breakfast for each room but there was only a buffet one morning out of three. If we had known, we would not have paid extra and gone elsewhere for breakfast. 
The staff were also not clear on the prices of things including laundry. It was more expensive then we had thought. It was a nice hotel but double the price of what it should have been.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Well designed, clean rooms. Air conditioning works like it should, cools the room quietly, and not positioned directly over your head. Very kind, attentive staff, direct you towards the genuine locations. Daisy was especially helpful in arranging our transfer to the Cham Islands. Secluded location but not out the way. The rooftop pool is excellent (closes at 10pm, there's such thing as a bedtime here!)
review.comment_negative: There's a convenience store next door, cheaper than the hotel for water, drinks, laundry etc, but still a markup over even the busiest of tourist spots. Not the hotel's problem, the convenience remains of benefit should you wish to take it...certainly cheaper than the hotel minibar...yet at an extra 25% to the equivalent stores down the road... There's no obligation.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay here. The staff were all amazing and always ready to help. Thanks especially to Alice who checked us in. Great location, quiet and very comfortable room and bed. The rooftop pool is a great place to relax too! I would highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was amazing, the location is perfect ( 5 minutes walking), the stuff very nice and kind and the room was as showed in the pictures.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: I liked the size, the cleanliness, and the aesthetic appeal of the rooms. I also appreciated the friendly staff. The food was amazing!
review.comment_negative: Not much to not like.

review.rating: Personal experienced stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We received a very warm welcome from Vi, who gave us lots of information on what to do and where to eat in Hoi An. During our stay, she checked in multiple times with us to see if we liked our stay and whether we had any questions. This was a very personal experience, which we very much enjoyed.

review.comment_positive:
Hello, we are a couple that has gone to hoi an for 2 nights.
We would like to say that our experience has been amazing, the location of the hotel is wonderful, just 5-10 minutues to the center of hoi an. The hotel has a swimming pool in the rooftop which is very helpful when the heat is horrible, the views are nice though.

The breakfast is buffet style and is complete, there are lot of vietnamesse kind of food so we did not try much of that but you can also have normal food.

They will keep your lugggage either if you arrive earlier than check in or leave later than check out.
Our room was big enough, cozzy with a bath tub that we definetly try. Of coyrse you will have aircon.


But what made oyr stay great was the staff, we would like to special mention Lyn, who helped us to settle in and gave us any kind of information that we needed during those days. Also the guy that keep our luggage was Tam Tai, a very smily guy that was also very profesional.

Overall a fantastic experience that we recommend to anybody

review.rating: Le meilleur accueil de notre voyage
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Nous sommes restés deux nuits avec ma compagne, et cette parenthèse dans notre voyage au Vietnam était un bonheur.

Les chambres sont propres, spacieuses et récentes. Dans la salle de bain vous pouvez profiter d'une baignoire et d'une douche !

Au dernier étage vous pouvez profiter d'une piscine sur le toit, parfait pour le couché de soleil !! Petit plus l'hôtel propose aussi un SPA et des massages. Sans doute le meilleur massage du Vietnam.

Le petit déjeuner est délicieux, je recommande les Pancakes à la banane :)

Ne vous inquiétez pas pour la localisation un tout petit peu excentré car l'hôtel offre des vélos, vous serez dans la vielle ville en 5 min.

Honnêtement c'est le meilleur rapport qualité prix que nous avons eu depuis très longtemps !!

Enfin je termine ce commentaire pour remercier le Staff de cet Hotel, nous sommes actuellement en tour du monde et c'est de loin le meilleur accueil que nous avons eu tous pays confondus !! Ils sont gentils, réactif, vous donne un maximum d'infos dès votre arrivée pour vous conseiller durant votre séjour, et se soucient tous les jours de votre expérience dans l'hôtel.

Allez y sans hésiter !!

A bientôt !

Romain et Chloé :)
review.comment_negative: Rien à dire

review.rating: Sehr nettes Hotel in guter Lage mit etwas Verbesserungspotenzial
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Die Lage ist optimal. Sehr nahe zur Altstadt. Sehr netten kleines, feines Hotel.
Die Mitarbeiter sind alle extrem freundlich, hilfsbereit und aufmerksam und können super Englisch. Die Kommunikation ist so sehr einfach. Und alle sind sehr kompetent.
Das Hotel ist sehr hübsch und liebevoll dekoriert.
Das Frühstücksbuffet ist genial.
Fahrräder kann man jederzeit nutzen und bei unserer Fahrt zum Strand haben wir auch gleich Badetücher mitbekommen.
review.comment_negative:
Der Obstkorb, den wir am ersten Tag am Zimmer hatten, war am nächsten Tag einfach kommentarlos verschwunden. 
Wir haben Wäsche waschen lassen und die saubere Wäsche wurde zum Teil lose auf einen Koffer gelegt, der natürlich vom herumreisen schmutzig ist. Keine Ahnung, warum da frisch gewaschene Wäsche drauflegt. Normalerweise bekommen wir in anderen Hotels saubere Wäsche in einem sauberen Sack. Am frisch bezogenen Bett wäre es auch viel besser aufgehoben gewesen. Der andere Teil wurde in den Kasten gehägt. Das finde ich auch nicht ok, dass man den Kasten, in den meine privaten Sachen sind, öffnet und was umräumt (Privatspäre).
Die Hotelmanagerin hat uns beim ersten Frühstück mitten im Gespräch angesprochen. Dabei stand sie immer links hinter mir, was total unangenehm ist. Sie hat zwar meinen Partner angesehen, aber mir stand sie quasi immer im Nacken. Das erste Gespräch war auch sehr unangenehm, weil sie immer wieder nachgehakt hat, welche Infos wir schon von den Mitarbeitern erhalten haben und wir sollen uns doch mit ihr zusammensetzen und irgendeine Liste mit Dingen durchgehen. 
Das Hotel ist so hübsch, schade dass nicht mehr Wert auf Wartung/Erhaltung gelegt wird. Z.B. Schmutzrand auf den Fliesen um den ganzen Pool, also oberste Fliesenreihe, die aus dem Wasser schaut. Polster am Sessel hatte Flecken. Ich habe ihn umgedreht, aber das sollte doch gesehen werden, bevor ich das Zimmer beziehe.
Ganz prominent liegt eine Preisliste auf, was was kostet, wenn man im Zimmer etwas kaputt macht. Da hat man gleich das Gefühl, dass man besser nicht angreift und nutzt, um nicht die zerbrechlichen Gegenstände des Zimmers kaputt zu machen.
Das Licht am Balkon kann man icht selbt ein- und ausschalten. Es gibt einfach generelle Zeiten, wann es brennt.
Unser Zimmer im sechsten Stock war oft vom lauten Brummen der Poolanlage beeinträchtigt. Fairerweise muss ich sagen, dass uns angeboten wurde, das Zimmer zu wechseln, aber dann wäre der Ausblick weg gewesen.

review.rating: An amazing hotel that in an amazing City
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
We Spent 15 nights at this amazing hotel, all the staff are friendly and very helpful, nothing was too much trouble.
Every evening the staff would ask if we wanted a taxi, which they organised for us on 2 occasions, otherwise it was safe to take a 10-minute stroll the centre of Hoi An where all the restaurants, bars and shops were.
The roof top pool was lovely with a wonderful view of the city and river. Everyday had a happy hour between 2:30 – 4:30 where the staff served amazing cocktails.
The hotel spa was very good and not expensive, we had a massage after a day trip and my wife had a manicure the day after we arrived.
A special thank you to Hannah, Kathy, Tracy and Tony who went above and beyond in ensuring our stay was an enjoyable one.
We would stay again at Cozy Savy the next time we visit Hoi An.

- Le style de l'hôtel est à couper le souffle. Une vraie claque visuelle
- Le personnel est super serviable et force de proposition. Dès l'arrivée, ils nous ont conseillé sur les lieux de visite, les bons restaurants et aidé à réserver le spectacle de Hoi An Memories
- La propreté des lieux
- Le petit-déjeuner buffet. Il y en a pour tous les goûts : asiatique, occidental, sucré, salé
- La proximité avec le Hoi An old town (ligne droite)
- Les vélos en libre-service
- La piscine ouverte dont la profondeur est indiquée et ascendante/descendante parfait pour toutes les tailles
- Leur thé au gingembre est succulent
Un hôtel que je recommande vivement. Toute ma famille a adoré. Le meilleur dans lequel j'ai séjourné au VN, j'y retournerai sans hésiter.

review.comment_positive:
먼저 여기 머물면서 어떤 개인적인 문제나 분쟁은 없었음을 밝힙니다.

객실 상태는 깨끗했구요.

조식은 다양했습니다.
review.comment_negative:
일부 직원들 직업 정신이 부족합니다.

말을 끝까지 듣지않고 자기 해야할 말만 합니다.
고객이 아니라 호텔을 위한 일만 하는게 느껴집니다.

비품을 옮기고, 물건을 나르느라 엘리베이터는 사용하기 어렵습니다. (규모에 비해 엘리베이터는 엄청작습니다. 짐없이 4명타면 꽉 찹니다)

올드타운 갔다가 11시전에 들어오는데, 호텔 입구 및 로비에 불은 다 꺼져있고, 누군가 자고 있습니다.

복도에서 시끄럽게 떠드는 사람은 투숙객이 아니고 직원들이었습니다. 

마치 남의 개인 주택에 얹혀지내는 느낌 입니다.

위치는 올드타운 숙소 거리의 제일 끝에 있습니다.

전반적으로 관리가 안되는 느낌입니다.

저는 여행과 출장을 자주 다녔지만, 지금까지 낮은 평점을 준 경험은 없습니다.

지금 평가가 어쩌면 지나치게 낮게 주는 것 일수 있습니다.

하지만, 분명히 구글과 Booking의 평점(그리고 별 갯수)은 비상식적으로 높습니다. 

바로 옆에 위치, 시설, 가격 등이 훨씬 좋은 숙소가 즐비합니다. 

호텔 측에서 좋은 리뷰를 부탁했지만, 그럴수 없어서 미안 합니다.

제 선택을 너무 후회합니다.

저같은 선의의 피해자를 방지하려면 Booking.com 에서는 이곳이 왜 별 다섯개인지 상세히 설명하던지, 아니면 다시 조정을 해야 할 것 입니다.

review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing—the nicest and most helpful people. They informed us of the best places to go and even made me an incredible cake for my birthday, which they realized on their own from my passport. The hotel is gorgeous down to every detail. The location is excellent, situated in the center yet quiet, and all this for such a low price; what a steal! I would recommend it to everyone.

review.rating: one of our best stay in Vietnam

review.rating: Perfect place to start your stay in Hoi An with easy access to the Old Town area.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: My family and I had a great stay at the The Cozy. We booked for 3 nights. A beautiful boutique style hotel. Very clean rooms with lots of space and very comfy beds. The buffet breakfast was fantastic with a great range of both Asian and Western options. Beautiful views from the rooftop pool of the hinterland and sunsets. Also great to have bikes available to use. Very easy access to town with a 5 min walk getting you to the Old town area. We had a great stay here and highly recommend for travellers looking for a place just outside the hustle and bustle of the old town area but close enough to walk everywhere! Thank you to staff member Ling also who was a great help with places to visit etc. All the staff were fantastic and very welcoming!
review.comment_negative: Gym was quite small and not much gear available for use.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Wir sind in der Nacht angekommen, nachdem sich unsere Pläne kurzfristig geändert haben. Wir haben kurz vor unserer Ankunft gebucht und obwohl die Buchung noch nicht im System war, wurde alles geregelt und wir bekamen unser Zimmer wie gewünscht. Der Aufenthalt hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Die Zimmer sind gross, sehr sauber, bequem und man hat alles was man braucht. Das Frühstück hatte eine gute Auswahl an verschiedenen Gerichten und man konnte frisch zubereitete Eier bestellen. Die Angestellten waren sehr nett und zuvorkommend. Sie haben sich immer darum gekümmert, dass alles in Ordnung ist und wir uns wohl fühlen. Ausserdem haben sie uns Tipps für Aktivitäten gegeben und diese für uns auch organisiert. An dieser Stelle vielen Dank an Hanna, Alice und das ganze Team.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
We loved our stay at the Cozy Savvy Hotel and made our trip to Hoi An very enjoyable despite heavy rain storms. The room was wonderfully decorated and the hotel had all the facilities we would wish for: Pool, Massage, in house laundry service and free bikes. Also the breakfast was great, it had western and vietnamese options and local fruits.
What really stood out though was the personal help and advice from Anne(Vi). She gave us so many helpful tips about restaurants, coffee places and tailoring. The kind interactions with her made us feel very well taken care of.
review.comment_negative: The room was sound proof, though noise from the hallway could be heard. A neighbor woke us up in the middle of the night by knocking loudly on their door for minutes.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
The staff was extremely nice and helpful.
Location was pretty good, 10-15 minute walk to the old town.
The breakfast was amazing.
The hotel restaurant wasn't up to our expectations but they do recommend a lot of great street food places that were fantastic.
The room was nice and comfortable.

review.rating: Our stay at this Hoi An hotel, highlighted by Anne's exceptional hospitality, outstanding amenities, and convenient
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Our stay at this hotel was unparalleled. Anne from the front office made us feel more welcomed than even in pricier 5-star hotels. The massage, pool, and breakfast exceeded expectations. Despite minor noise from housekeeping walkie-talkies, the rooms provided a quiet retreat. Though not directly in the city center, everything is conveniently within walking distance. If we return to Hoi An, there's no doubt we'll choose this hotel again.

review.rating: The best hotel in Hoi An. Highly recommended⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: My husband and I stayed two nights in Cozy Savvy. When I checked in, the hotelier Vi gave us some recommendations on local food, attractions, and general tips to travel around. The map she gave us was really useful, and we used it frequently. We borrowed a bike from the hotel for free, and rode the bike in the town. That was a very memorable activity for us in Hoi An. Our room was cozy and we had a great view of the river. The hotel spa has a good deal and it was the best spa during trip. The breakfast has western food and Vietnamese. Super tasty 😋. All staffs in the hotel were warm and kind. We will definitely come back!😆👍
review.comment_negative: Everything was good.

review.rating: まさにCOZYなホテルステイ！
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
素晴らしいの一言に尽きます！
2019年に開業したそうですが、パンデミックもあったからかとても綺麗なホテルで、ホイアンらしいランタンが施された内装がお洒落！
人で溢れ返る旧市街の中心部からはゆっくり歩いて10分弱の距離にありつつも辺りは静かなので、のんびりステイを好む人には打ってつけです。
そして、何よりもスタッフの皆さんのホスピタリティが素晴らしい！おすすめスポットなども丁寧に教えてもらい、充実したホイアン滞在ができました。
今まで色んなホテルに泊まりましたが、ここまですべてにおいて満足したのは初めてかもしれません。

While the room was very nice this building did not have an elevator and we had to walk (50 meters) to the main building for breakfast and access to the rooftop swimming pool or gym (which was much nicer than the swimming pool in the second building).
As long as it is nice weather this is not a problem but during heatwaves or rain this becomes a bit annoying considering the price of the room.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
staffのみなさんがとてもフレンドリーで優しかったです。特にDaisy,Vie,Hanaさん達にはとてもお世話になりました。素敵なお店をたくさん教えてくれたり、毎回タクシーを呼んでくださったり、5泊だったのでツアーやアクティビティ、ショーの案内もしてくださりました。おかげでホイアンの毎日がとても充実したものになりました。
また、オーダーメイドをしようと思っていたのですが、オススメのテーラーを教えてくださったおかげでとても良い体験になりました。他にも、ちょうどダナンで花火大会があったのですがダナンからホイアンへ行く方法を真剣に考えて下さり、専用の車を手配してくれたので安心して楽しむことができました。DaisyさんとHanaさんのおかげです。また、Vieさんもおすすめのコーヒーショップを教えてくれたり、いつも笑顔で挨拶してくれたので滞在中不安になることはありませんでした。みなさんゲストの名前を覚えて下さるので、とても暖かな気持ちになります。
設備ですが全体的に細かいところまでデザインがこだわっホテルです。バスタブとシャワールームがあり、洗面台からは温水も出ます。洗濯も有料ですが専用の袋を置いておけば洗濯してくれます。朝食は毎日違うバイキングでオムレツなどもその場で焼いてくれます。快適なのはもちろん、センスもありホイアンの風情を感じることが出来ます。
中心街からは少し離れていますが、その分静かでリラックスできます。中心街までタクシー（またはgrab）で3分、200円くらいです。
滞在中何も不便に感じることはありませんでした。またホイアンに来た時にはこのホテルに泊まりたいです。
みなさん本当にありがとうございました！
review.comment_negative: 無し

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: We stayed at Cozy for 4 nights while we visited Hoi An. We loved our stay at the hotel. The staff were exceptional and we felt very welcomed with their customer centred care and guidance. We were taken back by the information and time given to us on our arrival from Cindy. She took the time to discuss with us what we wanted to do while in Hoi An the experiences we wanted to have. She provided us with a map and recommended local restaurants and costs for different tourist activities. The staff were very friendly everyday checking in on us and asking if they could improve our stay. Our Room was clean and beautifully decorated. We got our Laundry done on our arrival and it was collected and returned the next morning. The breakfast buffet was wonderful with many options to suit all food preferences - they hotel offered western coffee options too (cappuccino, latte ect.) We visited the gym a few times - though small, it had a treadmill, an exercise bike and one weight machine. We found it easy to access the path along the river from the hotel and were able to run/walk along their to the busy areas. It took us about 10 minutes to walk to the main street of Tran Phu. The hotel offered free bikes to cycle around. We did not use them as we preferred to walk but they looked in good working order. The roof top pool was a good size with loungers at either end with under cover areas. The 360 degree view is great at sunset and sunrise. Highly recommend staying at Cozy if you are after exceptional service and care. Thankyou to all the Cozy staff for our stay, especially Cindy and Daisy who assisted us with our travel plans.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.comment_positive: The stay was absolutely incredible. The staff couldn't be more helpful and friendly. They really care about the guests. The facilities are amazing. It is close to the center within 5 minutes walk, but far enough to stay away from all the noise.

review.comment_positive: Geschmackvoll eingerichtetes Hotel unweit der schönen Altstadt von Hoi An, ca. 10 min Fussweg. Der Rooftop Pool bietet eine tolle Sicht über die Stadt und den Fluss. Super vielfältiges Frühstück (vietnamesisch & westlich). Es gibt kostenlose Fahrräder zum Ausleihen. Besonders nett fanden wir das Personal, das sich um alles wunderbar gekümmert hat.
review.comment_negative: Leider hatte sich in unserem Zimmer bei hoher Luftfeuchtigkeit etwas Kondenswasser am Boden gebildet. War zum Glück aber nur am letzten Tag vor der Abreise.

review.rating: Hotel, todo en uno, de calidad y a buen precio
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Hotel increíble, muy bonito, limpio y bien atendido. El personal siempre servicial y dispuesto a ayudar en lo que se le requiera. En las 4 noches que nos alojamos, contratamos una excursión de un día a My Son con ellos (súper fácil y, de precio, 500k dongs/persona sin comida), el transfer al aeropuerto de Da Nang (por 400k dongs, precio similar a Grab) y una sesión de spa (el masaje genial, muy profesional y bueno, en cambio, la manicura y pedicura, algo mejorable en cuanto al resultado).

También he de destacar el servicio de bicicletas gratuitas, la piscina en la azotea y, el buffet, bastante variado con platos locales, desayuno continental, fruta y bollería.

Muy recomendable para disfrutar, descansar y estar cerca del centro de Hoi An (10 min andando). Si volvemos, volveremos a alojarnos aquí. Gracias a Vi por sus recomendaciones.
review.comment_negative: Nada, ha sido uno de los mejores hoteles que hemos estado en Vietnam.

review.comment_positive:
整間飯店的色調和設計很喜歡!是莫蘭迪色，房間的燈籠設計也好可愛，浴室也有超大的浴缸，飯店地點離古鎮走路也只要十分鐘，飯店人員跟我們介紹很多會安的景點和美食!服務很好很親切
也很注重房客的住房體驗，早餐的部分則是比較普通 
整體而言:是物美價廉的飯店，服務人員的服務也很好，給飯店服務人員100分

I really like the color scheme and design of the entire hotel! It has a lovely Moroccan-inspired tone, and the lantern designs in the rooms are adorable. The bathroom even features a large bathtub. The hotel is conveniently located, just a ten-minute walk from the old town. The staff at the hotel provided us with a lot of recommendations for attractions and local cuisine in Hoi An. Their service was excellent and very friendly.
They also paid attention to the guests' accommodation experience. However, the breakfast was somewhat average.
Overall, it is a value-for-money hotel, and the service provided by the staff is excellent. I would give the hotel staff a score of 100 for their service.
