review.rating: Wonderful - great location (close, but not too close to the old town)
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
The facilities and hotel were clean and accommodating. Some highlights for us: the rooftop pool was nice and a great place to chill for some downtime; the breakfast had a lot of options and the dining area was super nice (indoor/outdoor seating on a quiet street); the room was clean and had a nice balcony.

The location is kind of perfect - it's on a quiet street with some restaurants and spas and is maybe a 8-10 min walk to the main quarters, So nice to be tucked away from the busy-ness of the main area.

The staff were also great. We ended up having to switch rooms because of an overwhelming lemongrass scent in our original room but the staff were super accommodating in this change. Throughout the stay, they checked-in to see how we were doing and always willing to help.
review.comment_negative: While the breakfast was quite diverse in options, the overall quality didn't meet some of the other hotels we stayed in.

review.rating: Super Boutiquehotel mit ganz kleinen Sbstrichen.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Wir waren fünf Nächte hier. Haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Zimmer waren sauber, groß, komfortabel und stylisch.
Das Hotel liegt am Ende einer Strasse und damit ist es leise. Trotzdem ist man innerhalb von max. 10 Gehminuten in der Altstadt.
Vom Dachpool sieht man gut auf den Fluß und kann dort, u.a. bei den Happy Hour Getränken am Nachmittag,  gut entspannen.
Das Frühstück lässt keine Wünsche offen. Alles ist da. Sogar der Kaffee schmeckt.
Wir sind mit den kostenlosen Fahrrädern des Hotel viel umher gefahren.
review.comment_negative:
Die Fahhräder benötigen dringend eine Wartung.
Die Möbel am Pool könnten mal modernisiert werden, sind aber noch ok.
Poolreinigung der Wände sollte mal durchgeführt werden.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_negative: We’ve stayed for 5 days and we’ve spent approx 600€ there (14.000.000 vnd). Half of these 600€ were extras (SPA massages, food, room service etc). We were already sitting in the car outside the hotel about to leave to the airport and we’ve literally been chased by a receptionist that asked us to pay 1€ (one euro - 30000 vnd) worth of water from the minibar. I mean, a five star hotel. Chasing two guests that spent on extras as much as for staying (they told us at the moment of paying the whole bill that we have been their most generous customers - extras wise) and you’re chasing me outside when I’m in the car to ask me for 1/600th of what I just spent and paid. Surreal experience.

review.comment_positive: The room and bathroom are big clean and nice and rooftop swimming pool provides a nice relax area. The breakfast buffet offers a good variety and changes a bit every day; the egg station is a plus. The staff is extremely helpful and made our stay great. Recommend !

The location is not exactly on the river and a bit off the main areas (which could could be a plus if you are looking for a quite place).

On a side note, we found the pillows to be a bit too high and firm; it would be good to provide a variety. But this is just a small thing, out stay was great !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Hotel is very stylish and quite new. We liked that it is a short walk (about 10 min) away from the crowded and noisy Old Town of Hoi An (Please note that that also means away from the restraurants and shops. We didn‘t mind to walk before and after our meals but one need to be aware of that.)
The beds are comfy and the breakfast gets 8 out of 10. The staff is very friendly and eager to help. Extra thanks to let us leave early and refund us the one night. Also they arranged airport transfer from and to Da Nang.
review.comment_negative: Although the staff was very attentive, their only basic English language skills often were a barrier.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Tendría q decir q todo. El hotel y sus servicios es impecable. Pero si eso no es poco el personal es como si fueran de tu familia, te cuidan, buscan lo mejor para ti, te ayudan. Si les pides algo para el siguiente día no hace falta q se lo recuerdas, al levantarte ya lo tienen listo para ti. Se preocupan cada día porque todo salga bien. Es ideal para poder descansar. Esta a 6 minutos del centro ( 3 en bici) pero es lo mejor porque el centro es muy ruidoso y no podrías descansar igual
review.comment_negative: Imposible decir nada en este apartado

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 마사지 정말 좋았어요! 다낭 마사지샵에서 두번, 호이안 와서 이 호텔에서 한번 받았는데 최고였어요. 다낭에서 굳이 마사지받고 마사지샵 드롭으로 호이안 오시지 말고, 그냥 그렙으로 바로 호이안 와서 여기서 마사지 받으세요. 다낭보다 가격도 훨~~~~~씬 착해요. 전체 가격에 비해 시설은 아쉬운데(방 인테리어, 방 뷰, 수영장 뷰 아쉽. 화장실은 괜찮음) 다른 서비스들(마사지, 직원 친절도)이 좋아서 재방문의사 있습니다. 직원분들 진짜 친절하세요. 잊지말고 마사지!!!! 받으세요
review.comment_negative: 야시장/올드타운 초입까지 7분정도 걸어야해요. 멀지는 않았는데 밤에 여자혼자 다니기엔 위험할 거 같아요(여럿이면 괜찮음). 위치가 호텔촌 가장 안쪽이고 길에 불빛이 없더라고요. 그리고 다낭과 달리 전부 영어만 사용합니다. 직원들 모두 한국어 못알아듣고 + 영어 잘 하시지만 베트남식 발음이라 영어 못하면 불편할 거 같아요. 베트남 여행하면서 유일하게 영어만 쓰는 곳(+영어 잘 하는 곳)이었습니다. 수영장은 은근 깊어서 수영 못하면 중간에서만 놀아야 해요

review.rating: Good family hotel, definitely recommend for short stay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Our room was spacious, with a nice balcony. Comfortable bed.
Breakfast and even otherwise the restaurant was pretty good too! 
We faced a flooded Hoi An during our stay, and the staff really helped us by advising us correctly to stay indoors and even helped us move to their Da Nang hotel a day before when we expressed our interest to move to the city. This involved quite a few steps and we appreciate the support they offered. Thank you :)
On our last day we could finally use the bikes and they were such fun!!
review.comment_negative:
There weren't any facilities on the property that we could enjoy on the day we had to be indoors as the rest of Hoi An was nearly flooded. 
The gym was not operational and the spa being in the basement was also water logged. Although this is a situation that is in no one's control, what I mean is that - when you are forced to stay indoors, the property did not have anything to offer because everything is in basement and that was flooded.

review.rating: The hotel is perfect and very well located.  With a very attentive staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

窓が大きく、景色が良かった。
部屋がとにかく可愛い💕
バスタブも付いているのでゆっくり浸かって疲れが取れる！
最上階のプールも利用したが、空とプールの青が繋がっているようでとても綺麗だった！
2月でも気温が30℃近くあったので、プールも入れた👌
朝食のビュッフェも美味しい！テラス席？もあり、小鳥のさえずりが聞こえて爽やかな風を感じながら朝食を食べれて良かった。
スタッフも皆丁寧に対応してくれて、笑顔が良かった。
review.comment_negative:
3部屋のうち、アメニティ（歯磨きやひげ剃り）が部屋によって補充されていなかった💦
スタッフに伝えればすぐに持ってきてくれた👌
スタッフの英語がベトナム訛り強めなのでジェスチャーやわかりやすい単語でコミュニケーションをとった方がいいかなと思う。

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
A Memorable Stay at Cosy Savvy Boutique Hotel in Hoi An
Review:
We recently had the pleasure of staying at the Cosy Savvy Boutique Hotel in Hoi An and were thoroughly impressed with every aspect of our experience. From the comfortable accommodation to the exceptional service and the delightful recommendations from Lyn, our stay was nothing short of outstanding.
The accommodation at Cosy Savvy Boutique Hotel was simply perfect. Our room was cozy, well-designed, and provided a relaxing atmosphere after a long day of exploring Hoi An. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful sleep every night. The attention to detail in the room's decor and amenities added an extra touch of luxury.
The service at this hotel was truly exceptional. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our stay was unforgettable. Lyn, in particular, stood out with her warm and friendly nature. She welcomed us with a genuine smile and took the time to recommend the best places to dine in town. Her suggestions, including Morning Glory, Bale Well, Nu Eatery, and Ms V's Market, were spot-on and allowed us to savor the delicious local cuisine. Lyn also provided us with excellent recommendations for tailors, making our shopping experience in Hoi An even more enjoyable.
The overall service at Cosy Savvy Boutique Hotel deserves a five-star rating. Every staff member we encountered was attentive, polite, and eager to assist us with any requests or inquiries. The personalized attention and care we received made us feel truly valued as guests.
In terms of facilities, Cosy Savvy Boutique Hotel exceeded our expectations. The entire property was well-maintained, and the cleanliness was impeccable. The common areas, including the lobby and dining area, were inviting and tastefully decorated. The attention to detail in maintaining the cleanliness and freshness of the facilities contributed to the overall pleasant atmosphere of the hotel.

review.comment_positive: Everything! The staff who greet us and took our luggage from the taxi to our room. having a delicious dinner there on our first night. all the staff were brilliant. so friendly, happy and helpful, especially Lyn, she took time to patiently explain the sights to see. The hotel was spotless. our room cleaned daily to a very high standard. The included buffet breakfast was amazing. So much to choose from. then there is the free bikes, not just half a dozen, must be getting on for 15 to 20! The rooftop infinity pool and bar is great too, great to cool off with a dip and a cold beer. The location is also worth mentioning. review.rating: 한국인 부부 해외여행 만족 만족 개만족
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
행복한 크리스마스를 여기에서 보내다니 꿈만 같았습니다.
복잡한게 싫어서 호이안을 여행지로 선택했으며 그 선택지는 옳았다는 것을 알게 되었습니다.
객실의 조도는 훌륭하였으며 직원들은 정말 친절했습니다.
 한국어를 할 수 있는 "하나"라는 직원과 공항으로 편하게 갈 수 있게 Grab 보다 좋은 가격을 안내해준 "Joy"
그리고 이름을 물어보지 못했지만 체크인 과정에서 주변의 지리와 맛집 등 많은 정보를 준 직원이 있었습니다.
 다양한 방법으로 감사를 표현했지만 (초콜렛과 젤리를 나눠줬네요.) 감사하다는 말을 남기는 것이 중요하다고 생각해서 글을 남깁니다.
와이프는 베트남이 처음이라 긴장을 많이 했습니다.
하지만 호텔에서 좋은 기억이 베트남의 추억으로 남게 되어 정말 감사합니다.
행복한 추억을 갖게 해줘서 감사합니다.

Ps. 조식에서 쌀국수는 꼭 먹으세요. 정말 맛있습니다.

Được trải qua Giáng sinh hạnh phúc ở đây như một giấc mơ.
Không thích phức tạp nên chọn Hội An làm điểm du lịch, tôi phát hiện ra sự lựa chọn đó là đúng.
Ánh sáng trong phòng rất tuyệt vời và các nhân viên rất thân thiện.
"Joy", người hướng dẫn giá tốt hơn Grab cho nhân viên "một" có thể nói tiếng Hàn và thoải mái ra sân bay.
Và tôi không thể hỏi tên họ, nhưng trong quá trình check-in, có một nhân viên cung cấp rất nhiều thông tin như địa lý và quán ăn ngon xung quanh.
Tôi đã bày tỏ lòng biết ơn bằng nhiều cách khác nhau, nhưng tôi nghĩ điều quan trọng là phải nói lời cảm ơn.
Vợ tôi rất căng thẳng vì đây là lần đầu tiên tôi đến Việt Nam.
Nhưng cảm ơn các bạn vì đã để lại những kỷ niệm đẹp ở Việt Nam trong khách sạn.
Cảm ơn vì đã cho tôi có những kỷ niệm hạnh phúc.

Ps. Các bạn nhất định phải ăn Phở vào bữa sáng nha. Thật sự rất ngon.

￼John Rinaldi5/516 hours ago on ￼ Google

A wonderful hotel in a wonderful city, l will aways have very fond memories of Hoi An and of this hotel, by far the best accommodation on our 4 week trip to Asia.
The hotel is positioned on the edge of the old town, so most things are within walking distance. The hotel has everything you could need, breakfast was very good as was the restaurant service available throughout the day. They made a special effort to cater for my partner's gluten intolerance.
The staff were friendly, approachable and respectful. This young team are a credit to the hotel, the polar opposite of the indifferent service we get in the UK. Vi in particular chatted with us daily to make sure everything was in order. Her courtesy and efficiency were outstanding.
review.comment_negative: The room had a slight damp smell to it, the hotel immediately provided a dehumidifier and citronella candle. The walls are very thin!

review.rating: Durch den sehr günstigen Preis mit Abstrichen zu rechtfertigen
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Die Lage ist recht gut, innerhalb von 8 Minuten war man zu Fuss in der Altstadt. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich, speziell die Lobby. Sehr günstiger Übernachtungspreis mit solidem Frühstück. Das war die mit Abstand günstigste Unterkunft unserer Rundreise, deswegen muss man den Preis mit in die Bewertung einbeziehen. Trotz der negativen Punkte würden wir wieder kommen, allerdings in eine höhere Zimmerkategorie. Wer aber „Hochglanz“ gemäß Bewertungen und Bilder erwartet ist hier falsch. Es handelt sich um ein besseres Hostel.
review.comment_negative: Wir haben uns etwas von den überdurchschnittlich guten Bewertungen täuschen lassen, vermutlich zieht der günstige Preis auch das einfachere Publikum an. Nur so kann ich mir die unkritischen Bewertungen erklären. Außerdem haben wir uns selbst reingelegt, da wir nur ein Deluxe Zimmer mit Stadtblick gebucht haben für 3 Nächte. Das erste Zimmer lag im EG direkt neben dem Aufzug wo alle für das Frühstück vorbeikommen. Das schlechteste Zimmer im ganzen Hotel. Auf Nachfrage konnten wir aber sehr schnell noch am gleichen Tag zumindest einen Stock höher ziehen. So war es OK. Die Zimmer selbst wirken schon abgewohnt, und etwas schmuddelig. Beispiel, Wasserschaden an der Wand. Schmutzige Hotelmappe, schmutzige Vorhänge und Bettwäsche und im ersten Zimmer waren gelbe Flecken(konnte man wegwischen)auf der Toilettenbrille, im 2. Bad war die Toilettenbrille lose und mit dunklen Flecken. Falls es das Management Interesse an Bildern hat, stelle ich diese gerne zur Verfügung. Wenn die Instandhaltung allerdings so weitergeht, sind die Zimmer in wenigen Jahren komplett abgewohnt.

review.rating: If you stay in Hoi An, go to the Cozy Savvy
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
- Lage: Die Altstadt ist problemlos zu Fuß in wenigen Gehminuten erreichbar
- Gastfreundlichkeit: Superfreundlicje Begrüßung durch Lynn an der Rezeption. Sie hat so viele Ideen und Vorschläge, dass ein Tag mehr als 24h haben sollte. Auch für Fragen standen Lynn und ihr Team immer parat.
- Frühstück: Das Buffet ist abwechslungsreich und bietet von lokalen Gerichten auch kontinentale Frühstücksgerichte. Eigerichte werden auf Wunsch frisch von einem Koch für einen zubereitet.
- Ausstattung: Es ist alles vorhanden für tolle Tage in Hoi An. Auch das kostenlose ausleihen von Fahrrädern war überhaupt kein Problem.
review.comment_negative: - Zimmer war leider sehr hellhörig. Hat uns nicht am Schlaf gehindert, aber man verliert gefühlt etwas an Privatsphäre.

review.comment_positive:

The facilities are good
Breakfast is small and lovely, the dining area do have a great view
One of the receptionists was super nice, she drew us a map with everything you need to know about the town when we checked in, must took her like 20 mins to show us around. and she kept smiling and chatting sincerely all the time, too bad I didn’t catch her name, but big thank you to this lady. review.comment_negative:
Just double check with the bill you signed. 
They overcharged me for the room, and when I questioned it’s not same as what I booked, instead of checking with their own mistakes, they asked me to double check with booking company. Even when I showed all my booking details with price and everything they just insisted on what they are doing, and assumed I was wrong. 
After a long discussion I decided to check in first and before I called booking.com they figured out whats wrong. 
So how difficult could it to be done when I first said it’s not my bill? Just double check or say something like we will take a second look, instead of saying “you must be wrong, you call the booking company, it always happens.”
Still a long way to go for the receptionist training session

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: This is a gem of a hotel providing an oasis of peace, comfort and courteous service within walking distance of the town. We were greeted by Daisy with chilled cloths and tea. She then sat with us and chatted to find out what we might like to do. She provided a map of the town which she marked with places of interest for us. She regularly greeted us by name during our stay as did some other members of staff. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful and often asked how we were getting on.  The rooftop pool is gorgeous. Our room was fabulous and the breakfast was excellent with a large variety of choices. The hotel's decor was lovely. We would have liked to have been able to stay longer but had to move on due to previous arrangements. There is a very nice spa in the hotel which I used and was very happy with. There is also a gym available for use. I didn't use it so can't comment!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Ontvangst hartelijk met goede tips en tops van Hannah. Uitstekend personeel bij het ontbijt olv Emily, bediening bij het diner door Toean helemaal top en niet te vergeten, Daisy, Lin, Tracy, de trainees , de jongen die steeds zorgde dat wij op de fiets weg konden, de efficiente facilitaire ploeg en ieder die we vergeten te noemen. Kortom wij hebben het 8 dagen zeer naar ons zin gehad in het schone gezellige hotel. Airco werkt goed, Bedden kunnen iets zachter maar dat is persoonlijke smaak. Ontbijt is prima, vers, ruime keuze en als hoogtepunt: er wordt zeer goed rekening gehouden met een glutenvrij dieet. De ligging is prima voor bezoeken van de ancient city, markt,  koffie drinken in de straat bij King coffee,met de fiets in omgeving en rijstvelden touren en met een taxi ben je in nog geen tien minuten op het strand bij An Bang. Mochten we terugkeren naar Vietnam staat Cozy Savvy en Hoi An zeker weer op ons lijstje

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Excellent stay at Cozy, check in with a nice refreshing welcome drink and lots of info was a nice treat. The staff were very helpful with any questions, with suggestions and we could tell they wanted to do anything to make our stay as pleasant as possible. The breakfast was incredible, fresh fruit, juices and a nice mix of local cuisine. We really enjoyed using the bikes to go down to the centre and the beach, and although a little cold during our stay, liked the pool too. We also made use of the hotels car service on our last day to stop off at Ba Ana hills and then to the airport. Perfectly arranged and very pleasant driver Henry. Felt like a very luxury stay, Highly recomendable!

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Tolles Personal.

review.rating: Great stay, highly recommend for anyone coming to Hoi An to relax.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is located a short walk from the main area of old town. This was great for us as it was away from the hustle and bustle but close enough to reach. The hotel offers a free bike service to speed up the journey which we used everyday. You can also rent a scooter for 150k Dong + 30k dong for petrol. 

The property was very clean, the rooms were very nice and spacious. The hotel has a roof top pool which was great to chill at during the day. Food and drinks can be ordered to the pool. 

 The best part about the hotel was the service: The staff were attentive and very helpful with providing recommendations for coffee, restaurants and things to do. They were always there whenever you need them and can be reached from your room by a quick call.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: The staff are the most kindest I have ever met, they introduce the old town and also recommend some local food.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: El alojamiento está a dos cuadras de la zona central de Hoi An, el personal es muy amable y te brindan todas las opciones para ayudarte con lo que necesites. Las instalaciones cómodas, la cama es confortable al igual que las almohadas

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Das schöne Hotel liegt ruhig und ein wenig abseits der Aldstadt von Hoi An an guter Lage.
Man kann zu Fuss (ca. 10min.) bis zum Beginn/Eingang der Altstadt laufen.
Der Check in verlief super und war sehr persönlich & informativ. Man erhält viel Infos über die Gegend und mögliche Aktivitäten. Der Welcome Drink ist sehr lecker! :)
Frau Anne (Rezeptionistin) und auch alle anderen Angestellten waren sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
Das Zimmer war gross und schön gestaltet mit auch kleinen Details. Das Bett war bequem.
Das Frühstück war lecker und hatte täglich ein wenig Abwechslung. Vor allem der Lemon Ice Tea und die Bananen-Pancake waren hammer :) Man konnte friedlich auf der Aussen-Terrasse frühstücken.
Von der Dachterrasse mit Pool hat man einen tollen Rundumblick und kann schöne Sonnenuntergänge beobachten.
Der Wäscheservice verlief super und schnell.
Das Hotel bietet kostenlose Velos an, um die Gegend zu erkunden, sind aber einfach ein wenig in die Jahre gekommen ;) 
Alles in allem war es super und kann ich sehr empfehlen bei einem Aufenthalt in Hoi An! 
Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt völlig!
review.comment_negative: Das Zimmer war eher ringhörig und man hörte die Nachbarn zum Teil sehr gut.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Cozy Savvy was the perfect end to our Vietnam holiday. We basked in the heat by the swimming pool during the day and enjoyed the night market and lights at night which was walking distance. The buffet breakfast was one of the best we've had on our trip. 

Room - modern, beautifully laid out, clean, spacious, nothing better. 

Nearby Activities - walking distance to everywhere but away from the crowds. Safe even walking at night.

Food & drinks - best buffet breakfast we've had. We were lazy and ate dinner at the hotel too. Great options and reasonable prices especially if you compare to tourist restaurants in the centre.

Swimming pool was such a relief during the day when it was hot. Loved hanging by the pool.
review.comment_negative:
No Netflix available on the TVs.
Laundry was expensive so we went to a local provider.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Hospitality, cleanliness.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast variety was not there. Rooms need some sound proofing as other room notice is easily picked up.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: It was my first time staying in Hoi An, but thanks to this hotel, I was able to spend a very comfortable time. I used a connecting room, but the room is very spacious and cute, and I am very satisfied. All the staff were kind and helped me by teaching me various things. It was convenient to rent a bicycle. In addition, it is hotel which we want to use.

review.comment_positive: accueil , essentiel du confort

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Der Ausflug mit dem Fahrer des Hotels nach My Son war sehr schön und angenehm. Lyn an der Rezeption war immer sehr nett, hilfsbereit und hat sich stets nach unserem Befinden erkundigt. Leider war sie die Einzige… der Koch welcher beim Frühstück die Speisen frisch gekocht hat war auch immer sehr freundlich. An und für sich wären die Zimmer schön eingerichtet gewesen….aber leider hat das nicht über die zahlreichen Mängel hinweg getäuscht…
review.comment_negative:
Wir bekamen leider nicht die gebuchten Suiten mit Flussblick bei unserer Ankunft. Wir mussten zuerst insistiere ….
Wir hatten zwei Zimmer im 7. Stock( oberster Stock) hatte den Nachteil, dass es bei stürmischem Wetter sehr laut war. Zudem wurde bereits am frühen Morgen ( das Putzpersonal hatte im 7.Stock eine Art Lager oder was auch immer) rumhantiert. Die Mehrheit des Personals machte leider einen eher unmotivierten bis lustlosen Eindruck. Inklusive den Vorgesetzten.
Das Essen beim Frühstücksbüffet war leider bis jetzt ebenfalls das schlechteste auf unserer gesamten Vietnamreise.  Das Zimmer war kalt, das Bett zu weich und es fielen Tierchen von der Decke auf unser Bett. Die Lage hat uns ebenfalls nicht überzeugt. Zudem wurde eines unserer Oberteile vom Wäscheservice  ruiniert.
Für uns war das Hotel viel näher bei einem 3 Sterne Hotel als bei einem 4 oder 5 Sterne Hotel.
Wir waren leider auf der ganzen Linie enttäuscht. Hatten wir uns doch aufgrund der sonst  so guten Bewertungen viel erhofft.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

The ambiance is nice , short walking to sapa city.

Most importantly is Jenny Nhung Từ , who recieve us and taking care of us through our 2 nights. Helping and supporting us with our booking of activities,  great suggestion of food! A very lovely , forthcoming lady who goes extra mile.
Even comeby to say bye when she's not on duty  so sweet.
Makes the stay really warmth and wonderful!
Will be back if i have the chance.
Thank you so much Jenny!:D

Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Ideally located in a very quiet area, a few minutes walk away from the hustle and bustle of the old town. The Staff is simply amazing, very welcoming, professional and always smiling! Upon check-in Tracy gave us restaurants recommendations and useful tips to visit Hoi An and the countryside! The room is well equipped with a comfortable king size bed and a lovely balcony overlooking the river. The Breakfast is delicious and it has different choices of food, both Vietnamese and Western. The SPA is very clean and offer cheap and professional treatments.
review.comment_negative: If I have to be critical, I would suggest to add a shelf in the bathroom where you can place your beauty bags and I would also suggest to add a door to the walk-in shower so you don’t get the floor wet when you take a shower. But these are minor things as our stay was excellent.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
From the minute we walked in we were welcomed with a warm greeting, a delicious welcome drink and the best staff. 

The room was amazing as I expected and the bed was so cozy. Breakfast in the morning is more than filling, the selection is beyond. 

We were there a few days before our wedding and the staff were incredible. They knew all the details and arranged so much for us. Their attention to detail and genuine care is really above and beyond. They treated my other guests just the same. I really worried about nothing during my time there. 

The location is perfect, east for others to stay close, a quick walk to old town but not so close that you hear the commotion. A beautiful window view to beat!

A big thanks to Anne and her team, wish we could have stayed longer!

review.rating: Beautiful hotel with great facilities, excellent location to old town in Hoi An, professional staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
This is our second stay in Hoi An. Cozy Savvy was delightful. The decor was beautiful, the rooms were comfortable (and had great light, nice balconies), the breakfast was fresh and delicious. The rooftop pool had wonderful views of the river and the sunset, and the hotel offered food/drink service there too, making it feel very luxurious. The location is good - with the free bike rentals from the hotel, we could bike into the Old Town within 5-10 minutes. There were a lot of clean spas nearby on the same street, where we felt comfortable getting foot massages after a long day of walking or biking. Check-in was smooth and professional. The hotel offers a shuttle to the beach, but we weren't able to try it out during our short stay. The hotel has a convenient location and excellent value, and it certainly felt like 4-star luxury. 

Another note: We were in town to take our friend around (for the first time to Hoi An) and to get some tailoring done in the Old town area. But unfortunately our friend had a medical emergency that had already started prior to check-in but then became much worse while we were checking-in - unrelated to the stay; in response, the hotel staff were professional and efficient about helping us locate a local medical clinic in Hoi An that was still open, and later, an ambulance to a large hospital in Da Nang. We are so glad and relieved that our friend could get medical attention quickly, and the hotel staff checked in with us regularly whenever we were in the lobby and in the restaurant (and they called our rooms promptly) during the emergency time and afterwards to update us and see how she was doing. We are very grateful to the staff's help during that scary time.
review.comment_negative: The street the hotel is on is also full of other hotels - some big ones and some cute small ones. As a result, it feels a little more touristy, but given it's location, that makes a lot of sense.

review.comment_positive:
A charming hotel with a lovely warm welcoming staff that couldn't do enough for you 

The hotel has a cosy feel about it 
It has a rooftop pool which is nice and a gym and spa 

The breakfast was five stars with fresh fruit and a good variety

There is a little bar, and the whole ambience of the place is relaxing and comfortable. 

We had lunch one day and we were served dinner in our room one evening and were very happy with the food and service. It was better than many five-star hotels we have stayed at 

Absolutely faultless. Shout out to Daisy, who always had a smile on her face

They also have free bikes, and the hotel is a short walk into the old town but retains a quiet location 

Don't hesitate, just book it !

review.rating: Superb Stay and best Birthday surprise!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Best hotel I stayed in Hoi An, the room is superb and the staff were amazing and helpful. 
They even got a whole decent and delicious cake for my birthday which was served during breakfast and I was so surprised! I love this hotel and would highly recommend it to everyone who would stay in Hoi An.

The room, the furniture accents and details were great, the room is very aromatic and welcomes you with a relaxing smell. It's very clean as well and the view from the balcony is nice, make sure to request for a room facing the river as the other side isn't much but just a town view. The breakfast is also really good and lots of variety.

We also get to use the rooftop swimming pool and I recommend to catch the sunset from there as it was amazing! There's only few hotels that has rooftop pool/access. The location is a bit far as you have to take a cab or a shuttle because its towards the end of the road but the transport fee in Hoi an is cheap so its not much of an issue.

Would highly recommend this hotel if you want a relaxing and superb experience in the lovely town of Hoi An!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: If you're in Hoi An you HAVE to stay here. Super comfy beds, good breakfast, amazing location 10 mins from the Night Market but on a really quiet street. Special thanks to Hannah who was absolutely wonderful and gave us great recommendations, we loved her.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

The room is clean and the decoration looks nice. 
The have bike renting for free, a good choice to go to the old village.
review.comment_negative:
The scented candle had a strong smell, which is not pleasant. 
The toliet also smells a little bit, possibly the air handling system need improvenment. 
theare was a garbage corner near the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.comment_positive: Chất lượng phòng ở mức khá so với giá. Vị trí thuận tiện đi lại.

review.rating: Delicious breakfast, beautiful room and lovely staff
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 6 nights in Hoi An and this hotel was by far the best experience we had during our 3 week vacation in Vietnam.
I would like to highlight that the staff were exceptionally attentive and spoke very good English.
Ann gave us very tasty restaurant recommendations, Daisy clarified several issues regarding Get Your Guide bookings for us and Chris was our morning sunshine and surprised my partner with a small birthday cake during breakfast. 
The beds are very comfortable, the water pressure was good and the best part was the phenomenal breakfast buffet which varied every morning. Kudos to the staff in the kitchen, you guys do a great job!
We also enjoyed the pool area as the hotel location is central but still in a quiet street. The decoration is tasteful and unique, we liked the lamps and „antique“ tiles.
We would recommend to stay at Cozy Savvy Boutique to anyone. We liked the breakfast much better than in other 5 star hotels we’ve been here.
review.comment_negative: Cushion pads for the sun beds by the pool would‘ve been even better.

review.rating: Das perfekte Hotel für Hoi-An! Wir haben es geliebt!

review.comment_positive: Die Lage war super - ruhig und mit dem kostenfreien Fahrrad in 5 Minuten im Zentrum. Das Personal war spitze und hat unseren Aufenthalt perfekt gemacht!

review.comment_positive: The staff are amazing, the rooms are really nice, and the location is pretty perfect. You are about a 10 minute walk from the old town which makes it very accessible, but you are far enough removed to escape the noise and crowds of people. The rooftop pool is awesome and they have two happy hours with great deals (2-430 and 7-9).
review.comment_negative: It’s a minor thing, but there are a lot of wood features in our room. They used an excessive amount of lemon pledge or a similar product to clean them. It took until after the first night for the smell soften, and while it’s not like lemon cleaner is a terrible smell it was extremely heavy. Unfortunately there aren’t any windows or anything you can open to air out the room so you just have to wait for it to fade. Again, not a dealbreaker by any stretch but if I could give them advice it would be to take it easy with the lemon cleaner

The breakfasts were delicious and l've even taken a few ideas away to make at home. This is one of the best hotels l've stayed in and if l'm in Hoi An again, l'd definitely stay here without hesitation.

review.comment_positive:

Great service: The receptionist was really helpful that they gave us many good recommendations about the city: where to go and where to eat.
review.comment_negative: The hotel room was not soundproofed. We could hear the noise from the hallway, the room upper and the room next door. We unluckily had the very noise neighbors, so it was very annoying and disturbing when we tried to rest at the room. The hotel helped to ask the neighbors to be quieter, but we were still very disappointed since we booked one of the best rooms (deluxe suite with river view), we did not get a pleasant and relaxing experience.

From the welcome drink after a long day travelling to fantastic recommendations for restaurants and coffee shops, along with a tailor (thanks V, Minh and Kathy at reception) we felt taken care of. The room featured a very comfortable king size bed, balcony, shower and bath. The hotel is situated on a quiet street of Hoi An but easy to walk to see all the sights in town. Special shout out to Kathy at the reception who went above and beyond to help us with getting our final fitting of our clothes. We cannot thank her enough for helping to arrange this when we had checked out two days earlier! Would stay again in a heart beat.

review.comment_positive: Great little hotel within walkable distance of the old town but in a quieter area. The staff are wonderful and regularly ask if everything is ok with your stay. On the roof there is a small pool which is fine for a quick dip after a day sightseeing and also a nice spot to grab a beer or cocktail. There is also a small gym and a spa in the basement but didnt try these. Breakfast was great with lots of fresh fruit,pastries, egg station and daily local specialities. Really could not fault the place for the price

review.comment_negative:
De laundry service was wat aan de prijs (70k per kg) maar wel goed!
De kamer was prima, uitzicht goed. Schoonmaak kon beter (ramen waren vies). In Hoi an zit veel ongedierte, helaas vonden we een kakkerlak bij ons op de badkamer. Wij houden hier niet zo van. Personeel kwam hem gelukkig heel snel weghalen, daarna niks meer gezien gelukkig!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.rating: Ideal Hotel for an Incredible Hoi An Stay
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Wonderful hotel away from the hustle and bustle, not to mention noise, of old town. The hotel provided an incredible breakfast buffet offering local vietnamese cuisine along with more western fare. The hotel has a rooftop pool and a smaller pool behind the villas that offer a welcome break. The staff are eager to answer any questions and help with any issues. The hotel has a complimentary pool of bikes for use and also scooters for rent if you want to travel further afield.
review.comment_negative: Nothing I can speak of

review.rating: We were in this hotel for three days. Great location very friendly staff clean rooms, overall great experience. Can only
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Staff are lovely and accommodating. They are actively provide any information or help you need. I like this hotel so much. The location and the vibe here is fantastic. I’ll choose this hotel again for my next trip to Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: phòng đẹp
review.comment_negative: mình thiếu đồ gọi điện nhờ lễ tân nhưng bạn bảo mình xuống lấy vì có mình bạn, mình cũng vui vẻ vì nghĩ các bạn không có người, xuống thì mình thấy tận hai bạn đang ngồi đó, không hài lòng lắm

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Everything. From Vy and her team at reception, all the way through the hotel, they were so friendly and helpful. Brilliant advice on what to see and where to go. Will return and will recommend to everyone.
review.comment_negative: Or stay was too short.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: I really enjoyed my stay here and the staff are so lovely. Very comfy rooms, great walking location to the old down and night market. breakfast was lovely with many options and the pool was always clean which I appreciated a lot!

review.rating: Fantastic staff that made us feel valued , great breakfast, room and view.
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: We had a fantastic stay at Cozy Savy. The staff were amazing especially Hannah and Lin who went above and beyond to make us feel special from the welcoming check-in and throughout the stay. The breakfast was great. We had different options every day which included Vietnamese, Continental and English, plus they had an egg chef. We enjoyed the pool happy hour from 2.00pm until 4.30pm when it was too hot to be in the town. There were not lots of pool beds but there were always enough when we were there. The free bikes were good and there seemed plenty available. It was about a 15 minute walk into the Old Town or 5 minutes on the bikes. We liked our room and the view. Overall the vibe in the hotel was relaxed and the staff made us feel valued, important and cared for.
review.comment_negative: The corridors and lifts were always hot. The sunny side of the building could have had window shades to prevent this.

review.rating: We loved our stay at Cozy Savvy and will happily recommend it to our friends
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was delicious and had great variety
review.comment_negative: More shade on the seats around the rooftop pool

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Quiet location with very comfortable room. Great view from pool & great to be able to hire bikes.  Very helpful staff.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: excellent hotel, great breakfast, very friendly staff. Location is quiet, small bit of a walk but not too bad. excellent recommendations on tailoring and food. Hana was very helpful to us.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Big, comfortable and nicely decorated rooms with a nice balcony, quiet location of the hotel (10min walk from town - perfect for us - or simply use the available bikes the hotel has), really good variety for breakfast and the staff was a 10 out of 10 (special thank you to Lyn for all the extra care and all the fantastic recommendations from coffee places, tailors, to food). Nice little swimming pool on the rooftop (perfect for the very hot days we had). One of the best 4star hotels we stayed in our Vietnam trip

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Daisy, you are amazing! And everyone else also! Thank you for a great stay! We’ll definitely come back.
review.comment_negative: Extra chair on the balcony.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Fantastic location with easy walking or cycling access into the centre. The hotel was immaculate with comfortable rooms and very attentive staff.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: A brilliant hotel, close to the centre, fabulous staff, great food and facilities

review.comment_positive: This hotel was fabulous, the staff were excellent and helpful, nothing was a problem to them. Also, the free bycycles were good to get around Hoi An and outskirts.

review.rating: 住宿位置離古城不遠，晚上很寧靜很放鬆
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 接待人員很親切
review.comment_negative: 無

review.rating: Ruime kamer, met heerlijk zwembad en goed ontbijt
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Zeer vriendelijk personeel, die in grote getale aanwezig was voor een praatje en hulp. Ruime kamer met ruime badkamer. De twee zwembaden waren een groot pluspunt voor ons. Ruime keuze van ontbijtbuffet, met ook versgebakken eieren en pho. Gratis fietsen om de afstand naar het centrum te overbruggen (erg prettig als het heel warm is).
review.comment_negative: Het was ons niet duidelijk dat het hotel uit twee locaties bestond, wij sliepen in de villa aan de overkant van de straat. Voor ontbijt en de rooftop pool moet je dus nog eerst je hotel uit. Zoals meer plekken in Vietnam is de afwerking soms net niet wat je verwacht voor een viersterren hotel.

review.rating: Det må være det bedste hotel i Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Vi elskede alt ved hotellet. Deres anbefalinger til Hoi An var fantastiske. Personalet er venligt og hjælpsomt. Poolen på taget er fantastisk og der er god plads. Morgenmadsbuffeten er rigtig god, dog ikke helt så overdådig som der fremstår på billederne. Værelserne er så lækre. Sengene er bløde og store. Deres familieværelser er perfekte, hvis man er 4 af sted. Det bedste hotel vi har boet på i Vietnam.
review.comment_negative: Ingenting.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

El personal extremadamente amable.
Un hotel con todo lo necesario.
Limpio 
Piscina en la azotea que biene muy bien para el calor de Ho Ian.
Hotel bien situado,  zona tranquila y a 10 minutos andando del puente Japonés.
Muy recomendable.
El desayuno muy bien y rico todo.
El precio del hotel muy competitivo

review.rating: The staff are so wonderful especially Tracy, Cathy, Nie, Mina and Bay (great omelets)!

review.comment_positive: Beautiful boutique hotel with lovely spacious clean rooms and a short distance to Old Town. Excellent breakfast which changed daily. The staff are all so friendly and kind. The rooftop pool is absolutely beautiful and has a great view of the surrounding area.

review.rating: Clean, friendly staffs and walking distance to Hoi an old town.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The hotel is new and decoration is very nice. We didn’t have time to swim at the pool. The pool got a nice view. The hotel location is walking distance to old town. If you are lazy you can grab everywhere at a cheap price. Zoe is the person who helps us to check in and she gave us a lot of good recommendation for the local foods, shows and also which tours to join. The staffs are friendly and are approachable. We glad to choose this hotel, will come back to this hotel if we are back to Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.rating: Amazing hotel and staff, would visit again!
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
On arrival we were really impressed with the staff, Lyn showed us a map of the city, gave us recommendations for activities and dining options. Whenever we saw her during our stay she always made time to chat to us and helped arrange transport etc. 

The hotel was in a great location and the room was amazing - clean, fresh smelling and comfortable. We had a Vietnamese massage at the spa which was fantastic. The bicycles for use were great, and we used them to get out to the beach.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: must stay whenever your in Hoi An amazing staff great location value for money

review.comment_negative: nothing all good

review.rating: Great hotel, a few things need better attention
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Great location, friendly and helpful staff (shout out to Tracy) and comfy airy bright rooms with a nice view.
review.comment_negative: Part of the shower head was blocked, the free bicycles although a great touch could do with a little fixing and the fruit at breakfast was covered with flies. Despite these niggles a lovely place to stay considering the price paid via booking.com

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: The staff were lovely, they sat you down in restaurant next door to lobby with a cooling cup of tea to check you in. They introduce you to hotel facilities and the local area and ask about your plans to recommend different tourist attractions. Location was short walk to ancient town and the had free bikes. The rooms were beautiful, clean and spacious.
review.comment_negative:
Hotel laundry was expensive and the 
pool was small.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Die Lage ist großartig und nur wenige Gehminuten von der Altstadt entfernt. Zudem konnten wir uns unkompliziert und kostenlos Fahrräder bei der Unterkunft ausleihen mit denen man noch schneller in der Altstadt war. Das Frühstück war gut und es gab viele hilfreiche Tipps der Mitarbeiter zur Umgebung. Der Pool auf dem Dach war auch super zur Abkühlung und die Cocktails sehr lecker. Der Wäscheservice hat auch super geklappt und war preiswert und schnell ebenso wie der reibungslose Flughafen Transfer der preislich bei einem Grab lag. Insgesamt hatten wir einen tollen Aufenthalt in Hoi An und kommen gerne wieder.
review.comment_negative:
Leider gab es am Pool keine Liegen mit Schatten. Das war bei einer Temperatur von 37 Grad sehr schnell sehr unangenehm. Es gibt zwar Sitzmöglichkeiten die zum Teil von einer getönten Glasscheibe etwas geschützt sind, dabei handelt es sich aber eher um Sitzmöbel als um Poolliegen und die Plätze sind sehr begrenzt. 

Da wir an unserem Abreise Tag sehr früh los mussten wurde uns netterweise ein Frühstück to-go angeboten. Sehr süß eingepackt stellte es sich am Flughafen aber als sehr unpraktisch und etwas lieblos zusammen gestellt heraus. Zum Beispiel gab es einen Joghurt Becher aber keinen Löffel, 2 Scheiben trockenes Toast mit nur einer dünnen Scheibe Käse. Wir haben es als lieb gemeinte Geste aufgenommen, aber vielleicht sollte die Umsetzung noch einmal überdacht werden.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful for anything we needed during our stay. The breakfast is one of the best I have had.
review.comment_negative: The only thing that was unpleasant is the fact we could hear the people in the next room. But I'm not sure if this is because they were noisy or the walls are thin... 😅

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn

review.comment_negative: la verdad que no le encontré fallo, quizá el gimnasio con un poco más de material pero todo bien.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Everything was amazing, the staff was so kind, the welcome drink was delicious, the room was amazing and clean and I loved the interior. The rooftop pool has a nice view.
review.comment_negative: The walls are a bit thin, you could hear people in the corridor pretty loud.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Loved our stay at Cozy Savvy! Shout out to Cindy at the front desk who checked us in and gave us a  very helpful map with recommendations on restaurants and attractions to go to. The service from the rest of the staff was also great! Everyone is very attentive here. The breakfast buffet was also yummy and had a good mix of Vietnamese and Western cuisine. Great location as well! Not too far from the main town, you can easily walk or get a quick Grab. I wish our stay was longer and would totally stay here again if I come to Hoi An again!
review.comment_negative: The beds were a little firm for my liking, but not terrible. The drinks from the bar were also just ok tasting!

review.rating: Hanna and her team this is the one team you definitely want on every stay you have with a hotel.

review.comment_negative: nothing to complain about

A perfect place to stay in Hoi An

review.rating: Special attention to details + incredible staff

review.comment_positive:

Hotel and room was very tastefully decorated with little special attention added (i.e. scent in the room) that just made you feel very welcome. Location is central but not in the middle of the crowd which we appreciated. The staff organised us a private transport to Hue which was very fair priced and 100% to our satisfaction.
Thank you Linh and the team. You made my birthday in Hoi An very special!

3つのベッドがある部屋はコネクティングルームで、一緒に集まって過ごすソファなどはありませんでした。

ドアの防音がしっかりしてないので廊下の声がひびく。
寝るときに、エアコンの音がうるさく感じました。

review.comment_positive:
The pool was lovely. The staff were amazing! Breakfast was adequate but the juices were great. Bathroom was very spacious.
Unfortunately my mother had a fall at the hotel, no significant injury but so well cared for by hotel staff. Escorted us to doctor and took care of us, so appreciated. Would definitely recommend the hotel. The location was also great as it was just outside of the main hub so a little quieter but a very short walk to everything in the old town.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really! The tiles in the bathroom are very slippery when wet so just be mindful but that seems to be common in hotels in Vietnam.

review.rating: Kì nghỉ là trải nghiệm rất thú vị, và vô cùng hài lòng với khách sạn này!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên vô cùng dễ thương. Ngày mẹ tôi sinh nhật đã được nhân viên đến chúc mừng, tặng bánh kem vào buổi điểm tâm sáng. Mẹ tôi rất bất ngờ và cảm động. Cảm ơn các nhân viên khách sạn!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: El hotel está fenomenal, es bonito y muy agradable. Las habitaciones son preciosas así como el cuarto de baño muy espacioso. Todo muy limpio. A 5 o 10 minutos andando del centro bullicioso en una zona muy tranquila y agradable cerca del río. La piscina no pudimos utilizarla porque estaba gris pero el masaje del spa genial. El desayuno con una variedad muy buena y el que más oferta nos ha ofrecido de todo el viaje
review.comment_negative: Nos tocaron unos vecinos en la habitación de al lado extremadamente ruidosos, lo comunicamos a recepción pero nada cambió. Había puerta que comunicaba con la otra habitación y el primer día cuando subimos con las maletas estaba abierta, la cerramos con llave.

review.rating: Jeg kan varmt anbefale dette hotel.  Dejlige værelser, rummeligt badeværelse og fantastisk personale
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
review.comment_positive: Enestående hotel, kan stærkt anbefales. Personalet var søde tjenstvillige og ikke mindst, havde man en fornemmelse at de kunne lide deres arbejdsplads og hinanden. Altid opmærksomme og hjælpsomme headmasteren hun var så sød og smilende overfor alle. Jeg fik dårlig mave som hun bemærkede. I løbet af et øjeblik havde han bedt køkkenet om at skrælle ingefær til mig som jeg skulle putte i kogende vand og drikke.  Næste morgen var hun der straks igen, om jeg havde bedre, og det havde jeg, men hun mente at jeg aligeles skulle have ingefær i kogende vand til morgenmad i stedet for kaffe, så straks fik jeg en dampende kop ingefær. Det smager stygt, men hjalp.  Morgenmaden var fantastisk, alt hvad hjerte kan begærer også for danske ganer.  Morgenmaden kunne sluttes ag med ikke mindre en 9 slags. Kage og et stor udvalg af frugt.
review.comment_negative: Alt var godt

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
スタッフの方の対応がとても丁寧で、到着早々、近隣の地図に手書きでお薦めのお店やツアーを書き込んでくれて
参考になりました。実際にお店に行ったり、ツアーに参加しましたが、どこも大満足。
自転車も無料で貸し出してもらえたので、移動が楽でした。
ホテルから国際郵便を出すこともサポートしてもらい、サービスは抜群です。
部屋の内装はホイアンの街並みをイメージした作りで、蛇口やタイル、どれもこだわりの仕上がりでした。
まだ是非、訪れたいと思いました。
review.comment_negative: 貸出自転車は中にはパンクしていたり、サドルの調整が出来ないものやペダルの左右バランスが崩れていたものがあったので、乗るときには注意した方が良いと思います。

review.rating: Wunderbares Hotel um Hoi An zu erkunden und sich danach im Hotel erholen
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
review.comment_positive: Super sympathisches, freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal. Die Lage nahe Zentrum und trotzdem etwas ausserhalb des Trubels von Hoi An. Fahrrad benutzen war jederzeit möglich.
review.comment_negative: Die Betten sind sehr weich und für meine Bandscheiben war das zu weich.

review.rating: Bon petit déjeuner et la gentillesse de personnel

review.comment_negative: pas de vue au 2eme étage

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe

review.comment_negative: Breakfast could improve - could offer free coffee and tea, and overall display of foods could improve .

review.comment_positive: Bikes ready to rent at hand for free and so much to do around the area just a 5 minute ride away from the old town! The pool is so lovely and relaxing and The breakfast was amazing

review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel in a central location. Brilliant value very reasonable price. One of the receptionists called V was so helpful and kind and gave us so many recommendations for things to do in Hoi An. All of the staff were really helpful. Would highly recommend.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Очень вежливый персонал, чистота, расположение - все замечательно.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Luxury home base for exploring Hoi An City.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Vee, my concierge and host was incredibly thoughtful and thorough at the checkin process, and made sure I knew all of the best places to visit while staying in Hoi An. My room had stunning views of the river and the city and it felt like something out of a movie (601 if you can get it).

The rooftop pool was great, the breakfast was one of the better included breakfasts of any I've had, with a variety of eastern and western cuisine, fresh egg station and a pho option.

The gym downstairs is a single cable machine and bench setup. You can do a pretty solid workout there but sometimes it feels like the whole thing might just fall apart mid rep.

The bikes out front were key for exploring the town at the proper pace, Hoi An is set up for cycling and walking so take advantage of it.
review.comment_negative: Larger / more water could be offered in the rooms before needing to use the minibar. It was such an exceptional stay, nothing to complain about.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
施設全体の清掃が行き届いている。
二泊しましたが、朝食のメニューに変化があったのは嬉しかったです。
すべてのスタッフがにこやかに接してくれて、こちらが尋ねたり、お願いした事に対して快く対応してくれました。
review.comment_negative: 特になし

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: 엔틱한 분위기, 청결한 룸 컨디션,  맛있는 조식, 조용한 주변분위기, 모든게 만족스러웠습니다. 호이안에 간다면 다시 방문하고 싶은 호텔입니다.

review.rating: Is ok for me, I book one bed room but changed to two bed room when I check in.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The staff was wonderfull. We arrived exhausted and hungry and they offered us to still join for breakfast. We also got tips on where to eat and which tailor to go to - with discount!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Cosy Savvy Hotel with Ms. Kathy and team was exceptional and great value for money. I will recommend to all friends thinking to come to Hoi An. Our stay was faultless. The bedroom is smart, with a beautiful bathroom. The pool is clean and of a very good size, with sun beds and a covered soft seating area.  Breakfast is very generous with many options of Vietnamese, local Hoi An delicacies, fruit, eggs, Croissants, toast, bacon and more. We wish we could have stayed longer. A comfortable 10 minute walk into the old town.

The best hotel we have stayed at in Vietnam so far in 10 days.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Comfortable room. Good breakfast. Friendly staff. Daisy was particularly helpful. Enjoyed the roof top pool. In a quiet spot a short walk from the main tourist hub.
review.comment_negative: Nothing not to like.

review.rating: Very nice, cozy hotel in quite area, 8 mins walk from city center.
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông

Special thanks for Vi for recommending the best seafood restaurant, the best veg restaurant, the best tailor in Hoy An, and for organizing everything we needed. We had nice trips with Tin, driving us to Marble Mountains, My Son, Ba Na Hills; the Spa is excellent too!

The hotel provides bicycles to cycle your way around. the rooms are large and spacious, and very clean. We would stay here again if we return to Hoi An. breakfast is basic but decent.

review.comment_positive:

Tracy and Daisy were amazing and went above and beyond to assist me with a problem I had with a flight the next day. Even stayed back after their shift to help. Amazing service!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Nice interior deco. Nice helpful staffs. Nice pool and cozy pool area. Free bicycles were really helpful!
review.comment_negative: Soundproofing. We were given a connecting room. We should've asked to change it the minute we check-in but thought it'll be alright. It was alright the first night, then came noisy, loud neighbor. It was made worst when the neighboring guests abuse the hotel's trusting policy (minimal to no security staffs) by bringing back "special guests" in the middle of the night (3am-4am!) & created all sorts of unwanted "adult-fun" noise. At first we thought it was a couple staying next door so we didn't complain. When it happened again on our final night there we knew it was "special guest" they had sneaked into the hotel. We informed the hotel. We hope the hotel increase measures on security to eliminate this kind of unwanted disturbance. Especially it seems lots of family with young kids stay at this hotel.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: This hotel really stands out for the pride that the staff taking in making sure that you have the best possible stay. You get the feeling that they really care. Lovely rooms, great location (10 mins stroll to the old town), excellent breakfast. I would happily stay here again!
review.comment_negative: Nothing. The stay was perfect.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

it was an amazing hotel. especially the staff was fantastic (We would like to highlight Zoe in reception, pregnant lady and gentleman making eggs in the Morning.). 
hotel in a quiet area but in walking distance to the Old town. We will absolutely come back.

review.comment_positive: The property was unique and quaint just off the hustle of the Main Street and still close to the old town and river.
review.comment_negative: nothing to note.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Amazing location, situated on the edge of the Old Town. The check-in process was a particular highlight as the staff discuss local attractions, food, shopping and tips while marking on a map for you. You get served delicious biscuits and tea upon arrival as well. They encourage you to nominate interests so they can customise their guidance and advice. Also, we were blown away by the fact that the attendants remember your name, a very nice personal touch.

The room furnishings are traditional and ornate vintage, making the stay feel even more genuine and unique. The staff explained that they purposefully ensured the room furnishings and fittings capture traditional Vietnamese aesthetics and it has achieved that in spades. Highly recommended and would definitely stay here again!

review.rating: Schönes Hotel in Hoi An mit kleinen Defiziten
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

review.comment_negative: Zuerst hatten wir ein Zimmer mit einem Wasserschaden. Das war feucht und die Wände nass. Zum Glück konnten wir in ein "trockenes" Zimmer umziehen. Das Hotel hat einen grundsätzlich gepflegten Rooftop Pool mit Bar jedoch hat uns der Bereich weniger gefallen, er wirkt nicht so einladend.

review.comment_positive:
Ôi khách sạn tuyệt nhất mình đã từng đi. Không nói ngoa đâu. Cozy không phải kiểu khách sạn 5 sao nhưng có nét độc đáo rất riêng và dễ chịu.
Mình ưng từ khi xem hình, mang đậm phong cách kiến trúc và văn hóa Hội An, thổi hồn vào thiết kế và trang trí. Từ bên ngoài đến bên trong, đến cả vòi xịt hay phễu thoát sàn cũng đồng điệu theo tổng hòa thiết kế và được chăm chút tỉ mỉ, phòng tắm chỗ nào cũng cưng. Mình đi từ sự hài lòng này đến sự bất ngờ khác. Dịch vụ cũng tốt, bạn lễ tân nào cũng thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Mình ưng quá nên nhất định quay lại review đây.
Xe đạp cho mượn miễn phí và xe đạp rất nhẹ nha. Các bạn cho mình mượn từ sáng sớm dù 2pm mới nhận phòng.
Từ giờ mỗi lần đến Hội An mình sẽ chỉ đến đây thôi. Sự lựa chọn số 1 cho chất lượng.

review.rating: I really suggest this hotel. I hope to come again in the future
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Our stay in this hotel was wonderful. The room was very nice. The bed is comfy and the furniture is so nice looking. We loved the style of the room and of the building in general. Everything has a perfect Vietnamese and Hoi An style. There is really a big attention to details. It is a real boutique hotel. 
The breakfast is good quality and there is a big choice of food. One day we did a trip leaving early morning and the staff prepared for us a “Taylor made” breakfast take away. 
The position is good because is just 10 mi a walking from the central bridge but it is not in the growled streets with music and the market. It can be easily reached with Grab or Taxy. 
The staff is always at your disposal. Hanna and her colleagues helped us with a lot of suggestions about restaurants, place to visit, where to go shopping and so on. They also helped with taxy and they are available to help you organize day trip around the city. I would say that the staff is really the “plus” of this hotel. 
One of the days of our stay it was the birthday of my boyfriend. The staff organized for me a surprise breakfast at the pool located on the top of the building. They were really helpful on this and they also bring a surprise birthday cake to us. This will be really a good memory for us. 
In conclusion I recommend you to stay at this hotel because the price is really good but the stay and the staff even more! It worth it!

review.rating: A perfect option to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
This hotel is fantastic and for the price it is a steal - we loved it and would go back if we go back to Hoi An! The rooms look just like in the pictures, with beautiful decor, large comfortable beds, they are spotlessly clean with a nice smell (which is not a given in Hoi An) and the wifi works well (I can confirm since we watched a whole World Cup match on streaming :)). The staff is extremely nice and helpful and they made a nice romantic display for us with rose petals when we arrived.  We got a couples vietnamese body massage in the spa, so affordable (12 euros for a 1h massage!) and wonderful - we highly recommend that you try it! 
They also have free bikes to borrow which is a nice touch to get to the old town or visit the surrounding rice fields.
review.comment_negative:
Perhaps there are two details to mention: 
- The breakfast could have more Western options available; currently the hot dishes (with exception of the egg station) are meals that we would not eat for breakfast such as beef, stew, pasta, etc. However, we stayed in 3 hotels in Vietnam and they all had the exact same breakfast, so this is probably not a limitation of this hotel but of many.
- The location is not right next to the old town of Hoi An (where you will likely spend most of your visit), it is about 15 minutes walking from it through a local street. So we would rate the location 8/10. But still convenient and probably much quieter than staying right in the center.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Great location
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Excellent service and location, would recommend!
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had good service. For example, I found a mistake on the menu, and the manager had them all reprinted by the morning and came over to the table to thank us personally. The massages were so nice we got them twice :). Cindy also spent 20 minutes showing us on the maps which places to go they. And the breakfast buffet was excellent! Beautiful central location that is 5-10 min walk from ancient town and all the lively streets, but quiet place to stay as it’s a few blocks away. Hotel has beautiful flowers and lanterns, and the pool on the roof is great as well!
review.comment_negative: The only 2 small things I can think of, which both happen to be food related are: that the noodles on my cau Lao were stale, tough and chewy, rather than crispy. And the salad that came with their stake could be better as it was just 1 piece of lettuce, 2 slices of tomato, and a slice of onion with no dressing (more like the toppings ready to put on a burger). But other than that I would say their food and service was very good! Best breakfast I had during my trip.

Además era el cumpleaños de mi pareja y la sorprendieron con una tarta a la hora del desayuno, fue un detalle muy bonito. Recomiendo totalmente este hotel de Hoian.
review.comment_negative: No tiene culpa el hotel, pero nos tocó aguantar unos rezos o algo así de un templo o casa cercana, que empezaron muy pronto de madrugada y se alargaron horas, con lo que una noche no pudimos dormir bien.

review.rating: Perfect place with amazing team! Wish we stayed longer!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Highly recommend this hotel—amazing and professional team helped with every detail. When we arrived, Cindy gave us welcome drinks and showed us all the best places to go see and eat. Then when we had flight scheduling issues, Lyn Lyn went above and beyond to help ensure we could get where we needed to go (even though it was last minute). The room was BEAUTIFUL and we were very comfortable. The location is great—close to everything (but not in a loud area) so we could walk everywhere. We even borrowed the bikes (for free) for half a day to see the pottery villages. Breakfast had a wide variety of options—yummy! And the rooftop pool was perfect to relax at with a cocktail after a massage. Definitely coming back to stay here.

review.comment_positive:
Auf unserer Rundreise durch Vietnam haben wir für drei Nächte im Cozy Savvy eingecheckt.

Wir wurden freundlich von Cindy begrüßt die uns detailliert über das Hotel und Hoi An aufgeklärt hat.

Wir haben nur gute Erfahrungen gemacht! Ein sehr netter Empfang, ein geräumiges Zimmer und Bad und die Nähe zur kleinen Stadt waren perfekt.

Ausserdem kann man gratis Fahrräder mieten, haben wir zwar nicht genutzt, aber super Option und in Hoi An kann man Im Gegensatz zu anderen Städten Fahrrad fahren. ;)

Bislang das beste Hotel auf unserer Reise!
review.comment_negative:
Eigentlich gibt es kaum was zu bemängeln. 
Vielleicht dass das Zimmer etwas hellhörig ist, a ansonsten haben wir uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

review.rating: Excellent hotel, perfect location, amazing staff. We will be back!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
The Cozy Boutique Hotel is fantastic. 
The location is excellent; close to everything at the end of a quiet street, lots of restaurants close by, easy walk into old town, and peaceful nights so you can sleep. 
The room is wonderful; very comfortable beds, lovely river view, big bathroom, cold fridge, clean great sized room, and lots of hot water. 
The breakfast is fabulous; freshly made eggs, a selection of other delicious breakfast foods, hot and cold beverages, fresh fruit galore, and a lovely large, bright restaurant to eat in. 
The staff here is the best part, even after all the other wonderful things about this hotel. They pride themselves on taking excellent care of the customers and it shows. From the moment you walk in the door the front desk staff envelop you in their Hoi An charm and make sure every second of your stay is perfect. Miss Vy was the reason we had such an amazing stay at this hotel, making wonderful suggestions on where to eat, where to go and what to see. Everything she arranged or suggested for us was perfect! She is the star of the show at the front desk and her colleagues are just as wonderful. Miss Ling is another staff member who is a rising star at this hotel and will make sure you are well taken care of. Miss Emily in the restaurant is hilarious and awesome. You will not go hungry or thirsty or want for anything while she's working, she is on top of everything. 
Honestly, the staff are remarkable and made our stay one of the best experiences we've ever had.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: From the moment we arrived we were made to feel so welcome especially from Cindy. She was so kind and helpful recommending places to eat etc. Totally recommend Cozy Savvy
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Una fantástica opción de alojamiento en Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
El hotel cumplió con todas nuestras expectativas. Las habitaciones son muy bonitas y nuevas. La piscina en la terraza del hotel estaba genial y todo el hotel es muy agradable. La ubicación también muy buena, puedes ir andado al centro histórico, pero estás a un par de calles de donde empieza el bullicio y por tanto es bastante tranquilo. El desayuno también nos gustó.
La ciudad de Hoi An es muy bonita, seguramente la más bonita de Vietnam, y por la noche con las barquitas en el canal y los farolillos por todas las calles, está realmente de cuento.
review.comment_negative:
Llegamos a una hora en la que todavía no estaban listas las habitaciones, ya que el check in en este hotel se hace bastante tarde, y a la que ya estaban a punto de cerrar los restaurantes de los alrededores. Lo que nosotros queríamos en ese momento era poder ir rápido a comer, y así se lo dijimos a la chica que nos hizo el chek in, pero ella se pasó de amable y estuvo como 15-20 minutos dándonos explicaciones y consejos sobre qué visitar en la ciudad,. Por cortesía no nos atrevimos a cortarla y casi nos quedamos sin poder comer en el restaurante al que queríamos ir. Se agradecen las explicaciones, pero deberían darse cuenta de cual es la prioridad del cliente en cada momento. :-)
A la mañana siguiente me prestaron una bici para recorrer la ciudad, pero los frenos no funcionaban bien y no me di cuenta hasta que me había alejado bastante del hotel.

review.comment_positive:
1. 아침에 오믈렛 만들어 주는 남자분이 정말 친절하다(직책이 조금 높은듯)

2. 서양쪽 사람들이 훨씬 많다

3. 자전거 무료렌탈 설명등 1팀의 고객에게 시간을 길게들여 설명을 자세하게 잘 해준다.

4. 체크아웃할때 문제사항을 이야기 했는데, 진심으로 대해주는 느낌이 들어 좋았다. 단지 듣기만 하지않고 적극적인 보완 피드팩을 해줬다.
(문제가 있을시 바로 문의 하는것이 좋을것 같다)

5. 올드타운 안에 있는것이 아니라 조용하고 시골느낌을 원하는 사람들에게 좋다.

6. 냉장고에 냉동실까지 있어서 정말 너무 좋았다.
review.comment_negative:
그래도 제일 저렴한 곳이 아닌, 스위트룸 - 강 전망이었는데 숙소 컨디션이 기대보다는 이하였네요,,

1. 들어가자마자 커텐에 눌러 죽은 벌레 시체랑 핏자국이 있었는데 생각보다 커서 좀...
<살아있는 날벌레도 1마리 더 있었음, 스스로 치우고 그냥 뒀음..>

2. 샤워기에서 물이 샌다

3. 딱 사진같은데 사진 보다는 조금 퀄이 떨어지느 느낌은 있다(개취)

4. 실제 올드타운에서 제일 끝이기 때문에 걸어다니기는 멀다.

5. 주위가 좀 난잡해서 뷰가 좋은 느낌은 아니다.

6. 위에서 쿵 거려서 방음이 조금..

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Vlakbij het oude centrum.
Leuke locatie vlakbij het meer en lekkere restaurantjes.
Kamer is groot, netjes en hygiënisch.
Service is super!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: nice hotel with good amenities and beautiful roof top pool, free bike rental
review.comment_negative:
the staff was super nosy, asking too many questions like “where are you going?” “do you know how to go there?” etc. the questions were really beyond being just polite and at some point it was so annoying that we were hiding from the staff. 
i would wish for more space as a guest cause if i don’t know how to go somewhere i would ask. 
also we had our laundry done and after we came back all of our clothes were hung into the closet; which we found also a bit invading. we would have preferred that they just told us the laundry is ready and we can pick it up at the reception.

so generally: give the guest more space!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Amazing staff, so accommodating and went out of their way to help us and enjoy Hoi An. really gorgeous room and beautiful bath and amenities. TV Chanel selection was superb and pool was amazing too!
review.comment_negative: We loved everything, the breakfast was maybe slightly more basic than other places but they were so accommodating with our options

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

review.rating: Very modern and friendly small hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
This hotel has lovely spacious rooms that were nicely decorated. My friend and I booked the family room and we basically got two separate rooms with our own bathrooms and just an interconnecting door. 

Breakfast was very good and the staff were super friendly and helpful. When we arrived we were greeted with some tea and biscuits and Lyn sat down with us and gave us a map of Hoi An and lots of good recommendations for things to see, do and eat. 

The hotel is about a km from the old town but there are plenty of free bicycles available to borrow. We even used those to get ourselves to the beach one day. 

We also used the massage service (they had a two for one deal in the afternoon) and the laundry service was reasonably priced as well (by the kg not per item).

review.comment_positive: Buena atención del personal. Las instalaciones estaban muy bien, bonitas, limpias y amplias. El desayuno muy bueno. También nos ofrecieron un par de bicicletas gratis para visitar la ciudad.

review.comment_positive: Sehr schön eingerichtete Zimmer. Bad mit Dusche und Badewanne. Das Personal ist überaus freundlich und sehr hilfsbereit. Die Lage ist super und die Ausstattung gepflegt und modern. Vielen Dank an Daisy für die gute Beratung und Empfehlungen. Wir können das Hotel sehr empfehlen.

review.comment_positive: 올드타운 걸어서 가기에 조금 거리가 있지만 오히려 조용해서 좋았습니다. 숙소에서 자전거도 빌려주고 세탁서비스도 늦은 밤 신청해서 아침에 뽀송하게 잘 받았어요! 그리고 체크인 할때 친절한 미소로 반겨준 Alice!! My friend!! 담에 꼭 다시 만나요!!

review.comment_positive: 酒店的Joy很详细的为我们介绍了会安的餐厅和景点，还为我们建议接下来的行程，非常热情。酒店距离日本桥步行15分钟，属于闹中取静的地段。房间干净舒适，早餐异常丰盛可口，游泳池也很干净。最后酒店为我们安排的机场接送和巴拿山的行程也是很满意。

Es gab wirklich nichts am Zimmer zu beanstanden. Personal sehr freundlich. Pool auf dem Rooftop wirklich schön. Abholung vom Flughafen mit Shuttle habe ich über booking dazu gebucht und hat bestens funktioniert.

breakfast was lovely and plenty of choice.

great stay.

review.comment_positive: The staff were great, especially Cindy Anne, Alice) they gave us suggestions for places to go which were all great! And also helped arrange transport for trips

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
The staff was simply delightful and offered so much help in everything from booking tours to car service to just offering tips to get to know Hoi An. The room was excellent, so clean, airy, well-lit and comfortable. The breakfast had everything you could ever want and more, the pool area was a treat to relax in, and the spa services were so nice! 

We loved everything about Cozy, but above all the staff made us feel so taken care of and the location was unbeatable -- right outside the old town, which offers a bit of relaxation away from the fun chaos, but still close enough to everywhere you want to go.

review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
The room was beautiful, bright, spacious and felt luxurious. The air con was great and cooled down quickly when we needed to get away from the heat

The staff were exceptional. Cindy in particular helped us out massively, marking out all of the best restaurants, lantern making classes, tailors, night markets etc on a map. She also helped us organise a My Son sanctuary tour at a reasonable price. 

The breakfasts were varied and incredibly tasty. They incorporated a lot of local and national dishes that we had already intended to try during our visit, so that was great! 

We can't say much more than our family (2 adults + 1 two year old) stay was perfect!
review.comment_negative: Nothing to say - it was great!

review.rating: one of best places we’ve stayed for staff care

However, Zhou can still reach the city centre in 5 minutes walk. Our room and especially the bathroom were very large and had a nice view to the river. We will definitely stay here again at our next Hoi An trip.
