review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We loved everything about our stay at Cozy Savvy. The staff were all wonderful and provided us with great recommendations and advice. The food options they provided were definitely the best food in Hoi An as we tried other Cao Lao and Com Ga and they were not as good. The room is spacious and clean. The tour recommendations were great too. We did the My Son tour and the tour guide spoke clear english and had useful information for our tour. The breakfast is delicious with a variety of local and western cuisines. The menu also changed everyday so its always exciting to see what is being served.
review.comment_negative: Location is a 10 minute walk from old town. For us that was okay as it is quieter but just an fyi.

review.rating: Prima verblijf, vriendelijk personeel, aan de prijs
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Wij vonden het interieur van de hotelkamer en badkamer erg mooi. Simpel, sfeervol met de lampionnen aan de muur en de badkamer had een luxe uitstraling met al zijn keramiek. Het personeel was vriendelijk en zachtaardig.
review.comment_negative:
Op Booking.com stond aangegeven dat er facaliciteiten waren voor mensen die minder mobiel waren. Dit was dan ook de reden dat we voor dit hotel hebben gekozen, ik verstuikte namelijk mijn enkel tijdens de vakantie en kon niet meer lopen. Het terras / zwembad op het dak waren echter niet toegankelijk, dus toch met de krukken twee trappen op. Ook was er geen rolstoel aanwezig, wat in ons hotel erna, met vier sterren in plaats van vijf, gelukkig wél aanwezig was. 
Het eten in het restaurant was matig, aan de prijs en het kostte ruim een uur om een pizza te serveren..

Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location about ten minutes walk from the old town. Rooms are incredibly spacious, the BEST bath and good range for breakfast. We’re celiac and the chef was really knowledgeable once we showed a gluten free info card. There are bikes you can borrow if you want to explore further afield.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Great location, nice, clean hotel. Lovely welcome on arrival with super useful advice and tips on food and local sights. Vy spent almost 30 minutes with us, thanks for the great tips! Excellent breakfast with eggs made to order. Rooftop pool seemed nice but we didn’t get a chance to use it.
review.comment_negative: Unfortunately, there was a mix up with the extension of our stay that was to be processed through their internal system and our reservation was double booked. We wanted to stay longer but had to leave. The staff were apologetic but unhelpful. We were a little shocked, having left our bags at the hotel while we went on a day trip. This doesn’t take away from the fact that we had a nice stay.

review.rating: また来たい！！　気遣い溢れるホテル。
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
スタッフの方はフレンドリーでかつ礼儀正しい。聞く前に必要な情報をくれたり、少しでも困っていると、大丈夫か尋ねてくれる。気遣いが素晴らしい。
お部屋もちょうどいい広さと素敵な趣味のいいインテリアで、滞在中、癒やされた。
旧市街までは少し歩くが、風景を楽しみながら行けるので、まったく苦にならない。むしろ夜の街歩きから戻ると、喧騒から距離をおけるので静かにゆっくり眠れる。
review.comment_negative: しいて言えば、お風呂のお湯が溜まりにくい。がこれは、日本人が湯船につかることを楽しみにしているという国民性の問題かもしれません。

review.rating: Veldig hyggelig opphold til en god pris. Anbefales!
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
Veldig hjelpsomt og hyggelig personale. Hjalp oss med fler tips som viste seg å være gode. Hjalp med booking av utflukt på kort varsel. Var veldig oppmerksomme under hele oppholdet og virket genuint interessert at vi skulle være fornøyd. 

Rommene var fine og rene, god aircondition, dusj og seng. Kort gåvei inn til sentrum og hotellet lå i et stille område. 

Vil absolutt anbefale hotellet, da totalopplevelsen var veldig god sammenliknet med prisen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Wonderful stay! The receptionist who checked us in was amazing! (I'm sorry I don't remember her name). She looked after us the whole stay, recommended us places to eat, what to see - she was from Hoi'An and was giving us plenty of tips! The hotel is 5-10min away from the center and the main attraction so it's peaceful. The hotel offers everything you need.
I would highly recommend it.

review.comment_positive:
Excellent service! The staff were very helpful, friendly and considerate. We received a very warm welcome, with Lyn giving us a detailed sharing of the activities we could do, and a map of the popular shops in the Old Town. 

The location of the hotel was also great, within walking distance of the Old Town where the core activities were located.

We also enjoyed the daily hotel breakfast, with great food coupled along with the local salted/coconut coffee.

review.rating: Beautiful, comfortable and well located hotel in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Our stay at the Cozy Savvy Boutique Hotel was amazing. We had two had two adjoining rooms for our family of 4 and they were both large, luxurious and spotlessly clean. The bathrooms were huge and very well appointed. The buffet breakfast had decent variety and our kids loved it. We also heavily utilised the rooftop pool area which was a great space to chill out and order some drinks and snacks after a day of sightseeing. The location of the hotel is very convenient with only a short walk into the old town, yet in a relatively quiet street. Last but not least the staff were lovely, attentive and super helpful; particularly Zoe and Anne who assisted us many times during our stay. Overall I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Hoi An.

Kathy was a star

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Property was lovely - large room that came with a bathtub. with extensive facilities such as a spa and swimming pool. Service was so helpful and wonderful - they helped us with everything from start to end, including making early recommendations for food, activities and even tailors, as well as helping us book transportation to the coconut farm. We would love to commend Alex/Alice for her top notch service and recommendations!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: 위치는 올드타운, 야시장에서 13분 정도? 산책으로 걸어 들어가기 좋아요. 숙소 주변에 마사지샵들 있어서 간단하게 마사지 받기 좋더라구요. 동네 마사지샵이라그런지 밤에 가니까 좀 더 싸게 해주셨어요. 그랩도 잘 잡히구요. 조식도 나이스합니다:) 뷔페식이고 조용하고 진짜 휴양지느낌! 건물 자체가 휴양지 느낌 낭낭해요! 청결상태도 너무 마음에 들구요! 수영장도 엄청 크지는 않지만 친구랑 이리저리 놀기좋아요. 근데 서양인되게 많은 숙소에요.ㅎㅎ 그리고 여기 직원분들 되게 친절해요! 체크인할때 올드타운 지도주면서 유명한 가게들 추천해주시고 지하에 스파있는데 바우처 쓰셔서 마사지 받으세요! 꼭 긴걸로 받아요... 시간 진짜 순삭입니다.... 미쳤어요...
review.comment_negative: 아쉬운 점은 딱히 없는데 그래도 골라보자면 위치..? 시끄럽지 않고 조용해서 좋은데, 약간 동네쪽이라서 밤에 조용하고 어두운? 분위기?(가로등은 다 있어요!) 그래도 위험하거나 그러진 않지만... 발마사지 받고 친구랑 지나가는데 동네에 앉아서 술드시는 분들이 베트남말로 저희한테 뭐라뭐라 하시더라구요. 조금.. 무서웠달까... 근데 숙소 진짜 좋아요 여러분...

review.rating: 物超所值的舒適住宿，適合想要放鬆行程的人
review.room_type: Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
- 飯店服務人員相當地熱心，在入住時提供了許多的景點與餐廳推薦
- 迎賓飲料很好喝
- 早餐的越南特色餐點都不錯吃
- 屋頂的游泳池望出去的景色優美，大小也適中
- SPA 按摩有優惠時段，價格不貴甚至可以說是低廉，按摩的品質也不錯
- 房間內的備品齊全，整理得也相當乾淨
- 雖然處在較安靜的地區，位置距離會安古城與夜市並不會太遠
- 喔，我有提過飯店的服務很棒了嗎？例如租借腳踏車時，工作人員會協助調整座椅高度
review.comment_negative:
- 大床是由兩張雙人床拼湊而成，中間會有縫隙，雖然不至於整個人陷下去，但睡到那個地方時會有所感覺
- 淋浴區沒有浴簾，蓮蓬頭的方向沒有注意的話很容易灑出來
- 雖然前面有稱讚租借腳踏車時，工作人員的服務，但另一方面來說腳踏車都有些老舊了，很難自己去調整座墊高低，騎起來也不是很舒服，只能說是聊有勝無

review.rating: Best hotel in Vietnam and value for money!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Everything was great! The welcoming, that made us feel really welcomed, the important information reception gave us concerning some tours, the receptionist's patience to answer all our questions and the calls she made to resolve our matters with local tour operators, the spacious rooms, the great breakfast, the location, the friendliness of the staff...everything! Totally worth it and recommended! I would love to stay here again!

Rooms were spacious and the bathroom had an autonomy, ie in every other place we visited in Vietnam and Cambodia rooms were somehow small, there was not enough space for our stuff as international visitors with big luggage and the doors of the bathrooms were either from glass (?!?!) or with openings at the bottom of the doors?! Here the greatest asset was the comfortable beds, the space in the room, so that we could move with no restrictions and open our luggage easily and the bathroom was big, well equiped, with a shower WITH a glass, so that everything does not get wet! 

The staff was very kind, very attentive, very helpful and speaking excellent english!

We didn't try the breakfast, but our friends that did mentioned the great variety and that everything was very tasty and well made!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, everything was great!

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Staff is very kind and helped us to arrange transporte, move through the city and looked after us every day. Breakfast was impressive, so many options! The hotel offer free bikes, but It is waiting 20 min walk to the city centre and 10 min from the night market. There is a restaurant at the hotel but you can find many more within 10 min walk. One of the best hotels we enjoyed in Vietnam

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: Amazing quality price for this hotel, everything was perfect. Clean, spacious, great breakfast, nice pool on the roof, kind staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: 일단 직원분들 서비스가 너무 좋고 친절하셨습니다. 객실과 루프탑 수영장도 청결하고 가져간 샤워기 필터 색이 거의 변하지 않을 정도로 물도 깨끗했습니다. 조식도 맛있었어요~ 추천합니다 :)
review.comment_negative: 호이안 중심 관광지에서 걸어서 15~20분 정도 거리가 있긴 하지만 너무 더운 날씨만 아니면 다닐만 했습니다.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
따뜻한 분위기의 편안한 호텔. 직원들이 친절하고 세심하게 안내해주셔서 편했고요. 객실,욕실,로비 다 예쁘고 쾌적해서 좋았어요. 조식도 맛있었고 적당히 다양하게 나오는 편. 
올드타운에서 몇분 떨어져서 한적한 거리 뷰가 맘에 들었고 여유가 생기는 느낌이라 좋았어요. 여행동안 좋은 기억으로 남은 숙소여서 추천합니다. 호이안 가면 또 묵고 싶은 숙소.
review.comment_negative:
올드타운 중심에서 거리가 조금 있는 것. 걷는데 무리없고 오히려 동네가 한적해서 전 개인적으로 좋았어요.
욕실문에 반투명 유리가 있는 것. 종이를 붙여서 임시로 가릴까도 생각했는데ㅋㅋㅋ 생각보다 많이 안 비치는 스타일이라 그냥 썼어요. 일행에 따라 신경쓰일 수 있으니 커텐이나 블라인드가 같이 있으면 더 좋을듯.

review.rating: high quality hotel and brilliant staff

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Hôtel très bien placé, à peine à 10 mn à pied du centre ville mais du coup à l'écart de la foule, au calme près de la rivière. La décoration de cet hôtel est absolument sublime, c'est frais, gai, pimpant. les chambres sont si jolies, claires avec balcon, la nôtre avec vue sur la rivière. Tout est beau, les salles de bain sont à la fois ergonomiques, modernes , raffinées et dans le style du pays. La piscine sur le toît bénéficie d'une vue splendide. Et le plus remarquable, l'accueil avec un thé absolument délicieux. Puis Daisy (mille mercis à elle) qui a pris le temps avec sourire et gentillesse de bien nous conseiller pour notre séjour : visites à faire, restaurants, cafés et boutiques recommandés (on a suivi ses conseils et on s'en est félicités). Les petits déjeuners aussi sont copieux et délicieux (si bons phô). Vraiment un hôtel fantastique et inoubliable !
review.comment_negative: En cherchant bien... juste un peu plus de place pour ranger ses affaires serait appréciable.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: We arrived just after a typhoon hit the city and many parts are without electricity or Internet but the staff was very reassuring, kind, helpful and sweet. We really love it here! The breakfast is beyond amazing, too! 💕

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: el hotel está genial, la arquitectura del edificio en la misma línea de la ciudad, con madera de teca, farolillos, etc. el personal es muy atento y amable, en especial Tracy, fue muy atenta y amable con nosotros desde el momento de la bienvenida aún con la barrera del idioma (no hablamos mucho inglés), se esforzó mucho para que nos pudiéramos comunicar, estando tan lejos de tu país es una maravilla que alguien así te cuide y se preocupe por tus necesidades en cada momento. el desayuno está bien, tienes de todo, la fruta sobre todo es buena, la piscina no es muy grande pero con ideal para refrescarte (en Hoi An hace calor) y nadar un poco, tienes vistas al río, nos dimos unos masajes en el spa del hotel y los precios son muy asequibles, el trato de las chicas del spa es inmejorable y el masaje perfecto. en el hotel te dejan unas bicis, que para visitar la zona de arrozales de los alrededores está muy bien, de este modo ves la zona no turística y cómo viven en zonas más rurales, este servicio (bicicletas) es gratuito. en resumen el hotel es de 10, tanto los empleados, como la habitación, instalaciones, desayuno, etc. sin duda repetiría de nuevo y lo recomendaría., además la ubicación está muy bien, lejos del ruido pero cerca andando del centro, no se tarda nada.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cozy Savvy - Morning Glory
review.comment_positive: We stayed 8 nights and really enjoyed the hotel. Breakfasts were delicious with a wide, mixed and varied selection of Vietnamese dishes (noodle soups and eggs a favourite), European options, fruit, cereals, you name it. Great restaurant staff and food constantly replenished. Room was so good, housekeeping thorough and very regular. Spacious lounge areas and lots of nice spaces and beautifully kept gardens. Two attractive pools (one on the roof top with fab views). Reception staff really top notch. Immediate response to any questions. Also, that indefinable quality of friendly, caring yet professional staffing at all levels. Lovely location outside the tourist madness of the old town yet only 5/10 minutes to walk into it to sample it and then escape back to the sanctuary of the hotel. Highly recommend.

review.comment_positive:
Vamos começar pela receção, foi a melhor de toda a viagem. Numa meia hora organizaram a estadia, aconselharam-nos locais para comer e visitar, atividades fora da cidade e transferes para outras cidades. Atendimento perfeito. O quarto bastante confortável, com tudo o que necessitamos. Limpeza imaculada e cama e almofadas fantásticas. A localização poderia ser um contra, mas pelo contrário é a melhor possível, longe da agitação do centro e da música dos bares. 
Ajudaram a organizar os nossos dias em perfeição. Não hesitem em marcar este hotel.

review.rating: Excellent hotel for family with kids
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
The staffs are very nice and helpful. We come as a family with 2 young kids and felt warm welcomed by their excellent hospitality especially Tracy. She introduced the places and recommended some good local food. She also helped to book the “tuk tuk” for us to go to ancient city as we have small kids so we not need to walk.
The hotel room is spacious and clean, we enjoyed our stay and definitely will stay again when back to Hoi An.
review.comment_negative: Everything is good and worth every single penny.

review.rating: Relaxed stay and incredible service, excellent value for money.
review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive:
We spent two weeks travelling in Vietnam and Hoi An and the Cozy Savvy hotel were definitely a highlight. 

Such good value for money for a beautiful room, although central, it was quiet too, just a short walk into the town and night market. The breakfast was excellent and very relaxed. Staff couldn’t have been more helpful.

We loved it so much that we wanted to stay longer before moving on to Danang but unfortunately there were no rooms available.
review.comment_negative: Nothing :-)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel ist sehr geschmackvoll, schöne Zimmer und gutes Frühstück.
review.comment_negative: Die Zimmer waren leider sehr hellhörig. Unseres war direkt unter dem Rooftop Pool und nachts war ein permanentes Summen / Brummen davon zu hören. Das Personal war aber so freundlich und hat uns sofort ein anderes Zimmer gegeben.

review.rating: Totally surprised, in a positive way.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: This hotel was the surprise of our holiday. Such a great boutique hotel with lovely staff, great interior, clean, good food and laidback vibe. We were welcomed by Hanna and she made us feel right at home, showed us best places to eat in the city and what to visit during our stay.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, we just had an amazing time here. You can't go wrong booking this place. This is better than staying in the large well-known hotels, because it feels more personal and home-like.

review.room_type: Biệt Thự Cove Savvy - Sunset Cove
review.comment_positive: El hotel es maravilloso. La habitación súper bonita y tranquila con todo lo que puedas necesitar. Vi nos hizo muchas recomendaciones que fueron un acierto total. El desayuno está muy bien

review.rating: Super hôtel , bonne localisation , staff charmant
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
Tout , l’accueil, les chambres , le Roof top , le petit déjeuner, beaucoup de choix et bon .
Les salles de bain , la propreté, les prix des cocktails … 
Le staff est très sympathique et prêt à aider pour tout! 
Essayez le Spa ! J’ai eu un fabuleux massage 😃Localisation à 10 mn de la vieille ville , parfait

review.comment_positive: The staff were excellent. Very helpful, informative, and kind. The location was good, only a 5-minute walk from the centre and nice and quiet. The facilities were great.

review.rating: Close to the old town, yet very quiet. Attentive staff. Great breakfast too.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Great location. Wonderful staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Upon check in, one of the workers sat down and gave me great recommendations for food, shopping, etc. The hotel rooms are very nice. It's a bit of a walk to the old town but the street is quiet and there are bikes you can use.
review.comment_negative: The first night I stayed in the only room on the first floor, which is located between the elevators and the kitchen. This room was very loud - I could hear all the guests talking as they came into the elevator and every dish being moved in the kitchen. They kindly switched my room the second night and tried to make up for the inconvenience with a free taxi ride to my next accommodation. Avoid this room if possible.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: facility hotel bicycle
review.comment_negative: Nice hotel good service from staff

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: The rooms were beautiful and spatious and the breakfast was amazing! Also, the staff was very friendly and we loved the swimming pool on the roof. The old quarter was just a 10-15 minute walk and with the bikes you could borrow for free you could be there in 5 minutes. Definitely would recommend!
review.comment_negative: The showers were cold, which we did not really expect from a luxurious hotel like this. We were also a bit surprised because both the sink and the bath tub did give warm water. We had to switch rooms at some point because of another plumbing problem, but unfortunately the shower there was cold too. But other than that, everything was amazing!

review.rating: 正解であると思いました。
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive:
スタッフの対応が良かった。特に女性。
朝食バイキングが美味しかった。
部屋のデザインや特にお風呂のデザインや石の浴槽が良かった。
ウェルカムドリンクも頂きました。シナモンの味が印象的でした。
入口のお花のアーチをはじめ、テーブルにもお花が飾ってありました。落ち着いた雰囲気。
バルコニーは小さめですがイスとテーブルが置いてあり景色も良かった。
プールの良かった！
review.comment_negative:
メインのエリアから少し離れている。
男性にもう少し笑顔があると良いですね。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: the staff were fantastic! We were greeted very warmly and given lots of excellent food recommendations

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: My husband and I had such a pleasant and comfortable stay here. The staff were friendly, breakfast was delicious, and the location was ideal. Not at all far from the night market. We loved our stay in Hoi An!

review.comment_positive: Das Hotel hat eine schöne ruhige Lage. Das gesamte Gebäude ist sehr geschmackvolle eingerichtet. Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen und über alle Tage immer wieder nach unserem Befinden und Wünschen gefragt. Das Personal ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Besonders möchten wir uns bei Anne und Daisy für den tollen Service bedanken

review.rating: loved our stay! would happily come back!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: - good location - good breakfast (sometimes not enough savoury options for vegetarians) - comfy bed (the double we had were two singles pushed together however) - really great staff, nothing was too much - felt well looked after - easy check in/out
review.comment_negative: - black mould on the ceiling of our bathroom and by the window outside of our room door (room 201) -

review.comment_positive: Tạm ổn, buffet không đa dạng
review.comment_negative: Nước yếu, mở nước nóng một lát lại chảy ra nước lạnh

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
Suite Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Ấm Cúng Nhìn Ra Thị Trấn
review.comment_positive: Die Lage ist ruhig und dennoch zentral. Die Mitarbeiter sind sehr freundlich und bemühen sich sehr um die Gäste. Man kann kostenfrei Fahrräder mieten und es gibt das ein oder andere nette Cafés in der Nachbarschaft. Auf unser Feedback bzgl. des Housekeepings wurde sehr freundlich und professionell reagiert.
review.comment_negative: Zimmer war bei Ankunft nicht richtig sauber (viele lange Haare auf dem Sessel). Die Pool-Area auf dem Dach ist nicht sehr einladend, wir waren zwei mal oben und es sah immer etwas verwahrlost aus. Wir hatten zudem ein Zimmer mit Connecting Door und konnten jeder Wort unserer Nachbarn hören, haben uns allerdings hierzu nicht beim Hotel beschwert. Alles in allem war es zwar ok, aber das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis stimmt nicht so ganz.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Cozy Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Location, excellent breakfast, swimming pool with deckchairs and rest area, free rental of well-maintained bicycles
review.comment_negative: laundry service and scooter rental quite expensive, much cheaper a few meters away
